title: ULTIMEA 5.1ch Sound Bar for Smart TV, Virtual Surround Sound System for TV, App Control, Home Theater Sound System, TV Soundbar with Subwoofer, 2 Surround Speakers, Peak Power 250W, Opt/AUX, Aura A30
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 5.1ch Virtual Surround Sound System for TV: This 5.1ch sound bar includes 3 main channels for clear dialogue and 2 surround sound speakers for a virtual surround sound field. SurroundX technology delivers precise audio with 99.99% detail accuracy. AI optimizes sound for lifelike audio, coordinating speakers to simulate accurate sound movement, enhancing your home theater experience.

Wired Connection between 2 Surround Speakers: Connect 2 surround speakers with the surround cable, and power the right speaker to pair the surround speakers wirelessly with the sound bar. If pairing fails, place 2 surround speakers and sound bar within 1.5 ft. Hold the SURROUND button on the remote for 5s until "SUR" blinks. Then hold the PAIR button on the right surround speaker for 5s until its light flashes. When paired, the light will stay on and the speakers can be moved as needed.

4-inch Wired Subwoofer with BassMX Technology: The Aura A30 soundbar for tv features a subwoofer with Ultimea BassMX technology for enhanced low-frequency sound. Its optimized magnetic circuit and diaphragm deliver fuller, resonant bass. Immerse yourself in rich low frequencies and feel the impact of every beat. BassMX enhances action scenes and explosions with powerful low-end response, boosting your bass performance.

Ultimea Smart App Control: Ultimea is dedicated to making life more intelligent through the Ultimea Home. Ultimea smart App of this 5.1 tv sound bar for smart tv can switch multiple EQ, adjust bands and matrix. Stay ahead with regular OTA upgrades to ensure a seamless premium audio experience with Ulitmea 5.1 virtual surround sound system for TV.

121 Preset EQ Matrices: The Ultimea App caters to the ultimate audio enthusiast with 121 preset equalizer matrices, tailored for four distinct sonic preferences: Bass, Pop, Classical, and Rock. Explore precision tuning and fine-tune your listening experience with dynamic adjustments to achieve your desired effects.

10-Band Equalizer Settings: Elevate your audio experience with 6 tailored EQ modes: Movie, Music, Voice, Sport, Game, and Night, each finely tuned for optimal performance. Further refine your listening with the Ultimea App's advanced "Customize", allowing you to dial in the perfect personalized sound to match your preferences and environment.

manufacturerAttributes.value: Take your home theater experience to new heights with the T Series as your mainstay setup. Whether you’re locked into that brand new action flick or swooning over the latest romantic-comedy, this home theater system expands the boundaries of what entertainment should sound like. What’s more, it’s easy to setup, supports Dolby and DTS, and connects to most home theater receivers, stereos or home theater processors.

Built for more than your viewing pleasure, the T Series hits the mark on great-sounding audio for all the music that fills your life. Playing host and entertaining friends with a solid soundtrack in the background? The T Series has you covered. Unwinding with only your thoughts and that favorite album? Turn up the T Series and let the good times roll!

Glued to the TV on game day? Victory is always yours no matter the outcome with the T Series calling the action. Make every tackle, home run, or slam dunk pop with real-time audio that puts you at the center of every play. Those live sporting events that you can’t live without get a major upgrade in sound that never felt so alive and captivating.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

Great Sound Should Be Affordable 
Having built our reputation as 'The Speaker Specialists' for more than 40 years, we take pride in our superior sound and build quality, which features many patented and award-winning audio innovations. For the people of Polk, building audio products is not just a job—it’s a passion. And if you’re going to remember one thing, remember this: We live by the truest principle of what audio should deliver—great sound at an affordable price for everyone! 
Polk T Series T15 Home Theater and Music Bookshelf Speaker 
The Polk T15 home theater and music bookshelf speakers are as versatile as they come, bringing incredible home theater sound and concert-quality music all in a classic look—and at a price that won’t break your budget. 
We took the DNA from Polk's instant-classic Monitor Series loudspeakers and re-imagined them for today's audio lover. With one 0.75-inch silk dome tweeter, a 5.25-inch composite driver, and a performance tuned front-firing bass port—all engineered with Polk’s proprietary Dynamic Balance technology—your sonic visions of brighter highs, a wide-open mid-range and surprising bass response are now a reality. The acoustically-inert, furniture-grade MDF cabinet construction also reduces resonance and distortion, so you get rich, detailed audio the way it's meant to be heard—minus the muffled noise and rattled disruption inherent in low-quality, lesser-than audio equipment. 
Designed to produce a wide dispersion sound, setting up your T15 bookshelf speakers is super straightforward and easy no matter where you place them. You can even use them as front or rear speakers in your home audio setup, too. Their five way binding posts provide an array of secure wire-hookup options. Plus, they’re designed to work with most home theater receivers, stereos or home theater processors. Whether you’re settled in for a little tube time on the couch or you’ve got the music turned up, the T15 is performance tuned to enhance the experience—that’s a fact. Premium sound paired with affordability never sounded this awesome! 
The Home Theater High Life 
Take your home theater experience to new heights with the T Series as your mainstay setup. Whether you’re locked into that brand new action flick or swooning over the latest romantic-comedy, this home theater system expands the boundaries of what entertainment should sound like. What’s more, it’s easy to setup, supports Dolby and DTS, and connects to most home theater receivers, stereos or home theater processors. 
	
Make Your Music Come Alive 
Built for more than your viewing pleasure, the T Series hits the mark on great-sounding audio for all the music that fills your life. Playing host and entertaining friends with a solid soundtrack in the background? The T Series has you covered. Unwinding with only your thoughts and that favorite album? Turn up the T Series and let the good times roll! 
	
Get In The Game 
Glued to the TV on game day? Victory is always yours no matter the outcome with the T Series calling the action. Make every tackle, home run, or slam dunk pop with real-time audio that puts you at the center of every play. Those live sporting events that you can’t live without get a major upgrade in sound that never felt so alive and captivating. 
	
Grille Off 
One 0.75-inch tweeter, one 5.25-inch driver and a front firing bass port—all built with Polk’s proprietary Dynamic Balance technology—translates into great sound for movies, TV and music. 
Grille On 
Available in a black oak finish with an acoustically inert, furniture-grade MDF cabinet construction, your T15 bookshelf speakers blend seamlessly into any home environment no matter where you listen. Plus, they double as rear surround speakers, too! 
Back Panel 
The best part is that your T15 bookshelf speakers are easy to set up and connect to most home theater receivers, stereos or home theater processors. And, they’ve got a built-in keyhole slot for wall mounting.

modules.title: Polk T Series T15 Home Theater and Music Bookshelf Speaker

centerColumn.text:
The Polk T15 home theater and music bookshelf speakers are as versatile as they come, bringing incredible home theater sound and concert-quality music all in a classic look—and at a price that won’t break your budget. 
We took the DNA from Polk's instant-classic Monitor Series loudspeakers and re-imagined them for today's audio lover. With one 0.75-inch silk dome tweeter, a 5.25-inch composite driver, and a performance tuned front-firing bass port—all engineered with Polk’s proprietary Dynamic Balance technology—your sonic visions of brighter highs, a wide-open mid-range and surprising bass response are now a reality. The acoustically-inert, furniture-grade MDF cabinet construction also reduces resonance and distortion, so you get rich, detailed audio the way it's meant to be heard—minus the muffled noise and rattled disruption inherent in low-quality, lesser-than audio equipment. 
Designed to produce a wide dispersion sound, setting up your T15 bookshelf speakers is super straightforward and easy no matter where you place them. You can even use them as front or rear speakers in your home audio setup, too. Their five way binding posts provide an array of secure wire-hookup options. Plus, they’re designed to work with most home theater receivers, stereos or home theater processors. Whether you’re settled in for a little tube time on the couch or you’ve got the music turned up, the T15 is performance tuned to enhance the experience—that’s a fact. Premium sound paired with affordability never sounded this awesome!

rightColumn.title: Great Sound Should Be Affordable
rightColumn.text: Having built our reputation as 'The Speaker Specialists' for more than 40 years, we take pride in our superior sound and build quality, which features many patented and award-winning audio innovations. For the people of Polk, building audio products is not just a job—it’s a passion. And if you’re going to remember one thing, remember this: We live by the truest principle of what audio should deliver—great sound at an affordable price for everyone!

title: Sound Bar for Smart TV 2.1CH 190W Peak Power Soundbar with Subwoofer Detachable 2-in-1 BT 5.4 Newest Surround Sound System 12L Deep Bass for PC Game with HD-ARC/Opt/USB/AUX Home Theater
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 2024 Launched Newest Detachable Sound System - Enhance your listening, viewing, and gaming experience with the INFITBO D40-4M soundbar and subwoofer. Upgraded to a peak power of 190W, featuring the latest BT 5.4 chip and added PC mode with USB audio cable transfer support. Perfect for home theaters and gamers.
Deep Bass On Demand - The 12L capacity subwoofer delivers deep, powerful bass. Feel the action and rhythm with the 5.25'' subwoofer. Adjustable Bass+/- to suit your needs.

Maximize Connection Compatibility - Surpassing other soundbars on the market, plug in any audio source via BT 5.4, HD-ARC, Optical, AUX, or USB (all cables included). Compatible with smart TVs, projectors, and supports USB audio transfer for PCs, laptops, and gaming equipment.
Tailored Sound Modes - Optimize audio performance for movies, music, sports, games, and more. Easily adjust with the remote using 3 preset sound modes and Bass/Treble controls.

Ultra Slim & Separable Design - Just over 2" tall, designed to fit most TVs. Easily wall-mount or place in front of your TV, or position on the left and right sides of your TV or PC for 360° surround sound. Doesn't block your TV's bottom edge or IR sensor, saving space.
Quick Setup - Includes all accessories: HD-ARC cable, optical cable, 3.5mm audio cable, USB cable, wall mounting kit, and Quick Start Guide. Connect your TV and enjoy premium sound in minutes.
Before purchasing, ensure your device's audio interface is compatible with our soundbar. For HD-ARC mode, make sure your TV interface has the ARC/eARC logo.
Please note: The INFITBO D40-4M soundbar does not support Dolby. The left and right parts of the soundbar require wired connections, not wireless, and the subwoofer is also wired.

Immersive sound, brought to you by people who love sound. - Dolby Atmos and DTS:X audio technologies captivate your senses with realistic sounds above and behind you for performance that completely immerses you in the world of your entertainment.

It’s psychoacoustics, but you can call it magic. - An optical illusion for your ears, DTS Virtual:X technology delivers the sensation of speakers placed throughout your room, above and behind you, for a sonic landscape that’s remarkably lifelike.

Your favorites, the way they were meant to be heard. - Lean in and get lost in your favorite content with 98dB of premium audio powered by 6 high-performance speakers. With integrated tweeters and woofers, this sound bar delivers clarity, spaciousness, and impact down to an impressive 50Hz.

Minimalist design. Maximum impact. - Thanks to built-in dual subwoofers and a fully integrated design, the M-Series All-In-One sound bar needs no external components to sound its best. And at just 36 inches in width, it’ll fit just about anywhere.

This bar keeps a low profile. - Enjoy the show without obstruction. At just over two inches in height, the fabric-wrapped, low-profile design serves to reduce the visual weight of the system as it sits discretely beneath your TV.

inStockText: In Stock

description: Combining stunning true 4K resolution with Wi Fi enabled streaming functionality, the ViewSonic® X2000B 4K smart laser projector delivers a cinematic experience with the ease and convenience of ultra short throw projection. With a 0.22 ultra short throw lens, this laser projector can be placed just a few inches away from a wall or screen. project an immersive image up to 100”. Setup is a breeze too; no matter how your home theater is configured, this projector delivers immersive images on flat screens, curved walls. everything in between thanks to its flexible 4 corner adjustment capabilities. Whether simply placed on a media stand or mounted to the ceiling, this projector delivers vivid and razor sharp images thanks to HDR/HLG support, Rec. 709 compatibility. stunning true 4K Ultra HD 3840 x 2160 resolution. Dual integrated Harman Kardon customized speakers deliver room filling audio for an immersive home theater experience. Embedded Wi Fi connectivity enables screen mirroring directly from smart devices to the big screen, making content streaming easier than ever. Built with 2nd generation laser phosphor technology, the X2000B 4K is geared for instant entertainment and ready deliver up to 20,000 hours of stunning home entertainment.
features: SUPERSIZED MOVIES AND GAMES: 4K UHD (3840x2160) laser projector with 2000 lumens and 0.22 ultra short throw lens
VIVID COLORS: Cinema SuperColor technology with 125 percent Rec. 709 wide color gamut, also HDR and HLG which produces lifelike colors
PREMIUM AUDIO: Built in Dual Harman Kardon Bluetooth speakers with Dolby and DTS support
EASY SETUP: With warping and 4 corner adjustment for flexible setup you can project on flat and curved sufaces
STREAMING SIMPLIFIED: Livestream sporting events, binge shows on Netflix or Disney Plus by adding a dongle (not included)
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: Supports most media players, PCs, Macs, and mobile devices with inputs such as Wi Fi, Bluetooth, HDMI ARC, USB

Home Theaters Will Never Be the Same

True 4K Ultra HD Resolution

Ultra-Short Throw Projection

Perfect Images on Nearly Any Surface

Project images onto flat screens, curved walls and everything in between.

【Wide Application】Compatible with mobile phones, computers, tablets, notebooks, TVs and projectors with AV audio etc. Recommend for home TV audio, computer audio system-game, tower Speaker, garden speaker. Small simple compact design also for car audio system.

inStockText: In Stock
features: Amp up your audio - Fire TV Soundbar enhances TV audio with dual speakers for fuller sound, clearer dialogue, and deeper bass—all in a compact design.

title: Denon AVR-S660H 5.2 Ch AVR - 75 W/Ch, Advanced 8K Upscaling, 3D Audio - Dolby TrueHD, DTS:HD Master & More, Wireless, Built-in HEOS, Alexa, Receiver
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Home Theater › Receivers & Amplifiers › Receivers
description: The Denon AVR-S660H 5.2 Channel AVR redefines your home theater experience with exceptional sound quality and advanced features. Supporting Dolby TrueHD, Dolby Surround, DTS-HD Master Audio, and DTS Neo:6, this AV Receiver delivers immersive audio for music, movies, and games. Its cutting-edge 8K video section with 6 HDMI inputs ensures stunning visual performance, including 8K/60Hz or 4K/120Hz video pass-through, HDR, BT.2020, and 3D support. Enjoy versatile playback options with high-resolution file support for FLAC, ALAC, WAV, and DSD 2.8/5.6MHz formats. The built-in HEOS technology enables seamless music streaming throughout your home, connecting with other HEOS-enabled speakers for a multi-room audio experience. Take control of your AVR-S660H effortlessly with voice commands via Alexa, Siri, and more. With wireless streaming capabilities through Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and HEOS, you can enjoy your favorite music from popular streaming services like Spotify, Tidal, TuneIn, Deezer, and Pandora. The Denon AVR-S660H combines exceptional audio performance, advanced video features, flexible voice control, and effortless wireless streaming, making it the ultimate AV Receiver for an elevated home entertainment setup.
features: NEW 8K READY 5.2 CHANNEL AVR - Upgrade your expectations with the high-performance AVR-S660H that lets you build the best 4K home theater and supports 8K video & latest 3D audio formats like Dolby TrueHD, Dolby Surround, DTS-HD Master Audio and DTS Neo:6

ADVANCED HDMI VIDEO SECTION WITH 8K UPSCALING - Features 3 dedicated 8K inputs that support 8K/60Hz or 4K/120Hz video pass-through. All HDMI inputs support 4:4:4 Pure Color Sub Sampling, HDR10, HDR10+, Dolby Vision & HLG for exceptional color and clarity

SEAMLESS, LAG-FREE GAMING EXPERIENCE - Enjoy Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Quick Frame Transport (QFT), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), which reduces lag and frame tearing for a smoother gameplay with stunning visuals and hi-resolution sound effects

EXTEND THE REACH OF YOUR MUSIC to any room in the house via Wi-Fi, Airplay or Bluetooth with HEOS MULTI-ROOM WIRELESS SPEAKERS - No Command Center or extra hardware required. Get Hi-Fi sound around your home with Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, Deezer & more

FULL VOICE CONTROL COMPATIBILITY WITH ALEXA & OTHER MAJOR VOICE AGENTS lets you sit back and enjoy music without having to reach out for the remote Adjust the volume, change the track, or switch the inputs absolutely hands-free

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Full Surround Sound Experience 
Dolby TrueHD, Dolby Surround, DTS-HD Master Audio and DTS Neo:6 support let you set up a 5.2 surround system and enjoy audio streams like Dolby TrueHD or DTS HD Master Audio from Blu-ray, streaming services and TV, or upmix standard stereo signals through Dolby Surround or DTS Neo:6. 
	
Powerful 5-Channel Amplifier 
Discrete high-current amplifiers on all channels help the AVR-S660H deliver high-power performance of 75W per channel (8 ohms, 20Hz-20kHz, THD: 0.08%, 2 channels driven). Low impedance capability supports your beloved speakers, enabling powerful yet balanced, tonal sound. 
	
Advanced 8K HDMI Video Section with eARC Support 
For the best picture quality available, the AVR-S660H features an advanced 6 in/1 out High Dynamic Range HDMI section with three 8K inputs supporting 8K/60Hz and 4K/120Hz video passthrough at 40Gbps. eARC (enhanced Audio Return Channel) is included to support 3D audio formats from smart TV apps on the receiver. 
	
The Latest Technology in Movie Experiences 
The new AVR-S660H brings the latest technology available to your entertainment. Enjoy movies in unrivaled clarity thanks to 8K with 8K/60Hz pass-through and upscaling, as well as the latest in AV receiver technology like Dynamic HDR and Quick Media Switching (QMS), which eliminates video delay in movies. 
	
The Next Generation in Gaming 
The new AVR-S660H, takes gaming to its full potential. Enjoy 4K/120Hz pass-through, as well as Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), Quick Frame Transport (QFT), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM), which reduces or elimates lag and frame tearing for a smoother, lag-free gaming experience. 
	
HEOS Built-In Multi-Room Streaming 
Enjoy your favorite music in any room of your home wirelessly with HEOS Built-in technology supporting free and premium Spotify, Pandora, Amazon Music HD, TuneIn, SoundCloud, SiriusXM, TIDAL, and more. Also works with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Apple Siri, and Josh.ai to provide cutting-edge voice control and incredible sound for all your home entertainment. Connect your Denon Home spekaers for a whole-home audio experience. (Not all music services available in all regions.)

description: All the sounds. All the feels. Experience our greatest of all time-level audio synchronized to your TV’s sound and customized to your living space—no wires attached. A wearable home theater made for U 
Wireless Wearable TV Speaker

Yamaha YHT-4950U Home Theater System offers a complete entertainment solution with immersive surround sound, 4K Ultra HD and HDR support, and Bluetooth connectivity for seamless audio streaming. With its ability to reproduce HD audio formats and CINEMA DSP technology, it delivers natural and expansive sound imaging, while YPAO sound optimization ensures optimal audio performance in any room. Enjoy your favorite movies, TV shows, music and video games, all with one, easy system. The system's discrete amplifier configuration and rich bass reproduction technology enhance audio clarity and depth, complemented by convenient features like SCENE buttons, an AV setup guide app, and energy-efficient ECO Mode. Whether enjoying movies, music, or gaming, the YHT-4950U provides a superior home theater experience with easy setup and versatile placement options.Bundle Includes: Yamaha Audio YHT-4950U 4K Ultra HD 5.1-Channel Home Theater System with 8" 50W RMS Powered Subwoofer Speakers, AV Receiver And Bluetooth.Cable TiesDiginerds Cleaning Kit

title: 5.1 CH Surround Sound Bar with Dolby Audio, Sound Bars for TV, Wireless Subwoofer & Rear Speaker, Dolby Digital Plus, Bluetooth 5.3, Surround Sound System for Home Theater, 4K & HD TVs| HDMI & Optical
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 5.1-CHANNEL SURROUND SOUND EXPERIENCE - Fully enjoys the thrill of DOLBY DIGITAL PLUS with the newest 5.1 Surround sound Engine, DSP technology, and impressive 400W of total system power. Dolby Audio adds room-filling excitement with floor to ceiling virtualized surround sound experience. Immerse yourself with 360° room transforming sound that adapts to your environment with included wireless rear speakers, taking TV, movies, and music into a whole new dimension.

IMMERSIVE NEXT-GENERATION BASS - The premium sound bar with 16” wireless subwoofer blends seamlessly into your living room or bedroom. The robust and dynamic bass grabs your attention in every room corner down to 50 Hz. Unleash powerful bass to turn your living room into an IMAX theater. Enjoy remarkable clarity and room-filling 5.1 surround sound with Dolby Audio to create a realistic audio experience like planes flying overhead and rain falling from above.

OPTIMIZE ENTERTAINMENT WITH UPGRADED EQUALIZER MODE - Personalize different equalizer modes: Music, Movie, News & 3D mode, and more advanced setting by using the Smart remote control for hearing and feeling every musical, explosion, dialogue, and detail with transparent and ear-pleasing loudness up to 120 dB. The remote also increases or reduces Treble and Bass Levels based on your sounding preference. So, you can sit back, relax, and enjoy the best budget 5.1 surround sound system!

ADVANCED CONNECTIVITY & CONTROL - Our 5.1 sound bar adopts Bluetooth 5.0 & DSP technology to ensure faster transmission speeds and stable connectivity up to 50 ft with low consumption from your Smartphones, Tablet, PC and other Bluetooth-enabled devices; You may also connect the sound bar to TV, Projector, Computer, XBOX, PS5, Amplifier, and more via HDMI ARC, RCA, or Optical input connection. All cables are included. You may control the sound bar using your TV remote in ARC input mode.

ALL ACCESSORIES INCLUDED, EASY TO SET UP IN MINUTES - The 5.1 sound bar is ready to be used right out of the box! The surround sound system must only be plugged into separate wall outlet with no cable between each speaker. Press the button on the back of the speakers until the light stops blinking. Ensure all speakers have a solid red light on the back to remain connected. All accessories are included. Premium HDMI Cable, Optical Cable, RCA Cable, Smart Remote, and mounting kits are all included

title: Emerson EHS-2004 42-Inch Bluetooth Soundbar with Built-in Subwoofer, 2.1 Channel Audio, USB/AUX Inputs, FM Radio, Wall Mountable, Remote Control, and Digital LED Display
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 42-INCH SOUND BAR FOR IMMERSIVE AUDIO EXPERIENCE -- The Emerson EHS-2004 delivers rich, powerful sound through its 42-inch sound bar and built-in subwoofer. Perfect for enhancing your home entertainment, the wide soundbar design ensures clear and crisp audio that fills the room, making your movies, music, and gaming sessions more immersive.

BLUETOOTH CONNECTIVITY FOR WIRELESS MUSIC STREAMING -- Easily connect your Bluetooth-enabled devices, such as smartphones, tablets, or laptops, and enjoy wireless streaming with the Emerson EHS-2004. Experience high-quality, cord-free audio at your convenience.

2.1 CHANNEL AUDIO FOR BALANCED SOUND WITH BUILT-IN SUBWOOFER -- Featuring 2.1 channel audio, the Emerson EHS-2004 soundbar delivers balanced sound across all frequencies. Enjoy enhanced dialogue clarity and dynamic sound performance, making it perfect for movies, music, and TV shows.

HDMI ARC FOR SEAMLESS TV INTEGRATION -- The Emerson EHS-2004 is equipped with HDMI ARC (Audio Return Channel), allowing you to control both the TV and soundbar with a single remote. Enjoy a simplified setup and high-quality audio directly from your TV, reducing the need for multiple cables.

MULTIPLE INPUT OPTIONS FOR VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY -- This soundbar offers a range of input options, including Optical, AUX, and USB ports, allowing easy connectivity with a variety of devices such as gaming consoles, media players, and televisions. Enjoy versatile and flexible home entertainment.

SLEEK WALL-MOUNTABLE DESIGN -- The slim and sleek design of the Emerson EHS-2004 makes it a perfect addition to any living room or entertainment area. It can be easily wall-mounted, saving space while complementing your modern home décor.

INCLUDED REMOTE CONTROL FOR EASY OPERATION -- Effortlessly control your soundbar with the included remote control. Adjust volume, switch inputs, and manage playback without needing to leave your seat, providing a convenient and user-friendly experience.

ENERGY-EFFICIENT FOR REDUCED POWER CONSUMPTION -- Designed with energy efficiency in mind, the Emerson EHS-2004 reduces power consumption while still delivering high-quality sound. Enjoy a more eco-friendly and cost-effective home entertainment setup.

title: PHILIPS B8507B 3.1-Channel Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer and Dolby Atmos - Black
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Philips B8507 Soundbar brings true cinema sound into your living room. With 3.1 channels and dedicated center-channel speakers , you get great vocal clarity and a more impactful movie watching experience. The special geometry and the two extra angled tweeter speakers widens the soundstage and gives you a clear separation of instruments. The system thumps out a total of 600 W max output that delivers rumbling explosions that you can feel. Dolby Atmos’ spatial sound technology makes everything you watch breathtakingly real. Whether it's spaceships flying overhead or the crowd in an arena, you'll feel the drama flow above and around you. Stream playlists from your mobile device via Bluetooth. Your media sounds richer, deeper and clearer through this phenomenal soundbar and subwoofer. You can also connect via Audio in, Optical in, HDMI eARC or use a USB drive for music. You can control your Soundbar directly with your TV remote. No extra remote needed. And thanks to Play-Fi compatibility, this soundbar can also be synced with other Play-Fi compatible devices to create a multiple-room audio system, just the way you like it.
features: TRUE CINEMA SOUND: This 3.1-channel soundbar with 600 W max power takes your listening experience to a new level. You get incredibly rich sound and scintillating details. The impressive 6.5" wireless subwoofer delivers room-rocking bass.

WIDEN THE SOUNDSTAGE: Uniquely designed angled tweeters at either end of the soundbar broaden the audio and send soundwaves rippling across the room, so you can hear the distinct textures of different instruments as if you’re really in the hall.

HEIGHTEN THE EXCITEMENT: Dolby Atmos’ unique 3D sound technology pulls you deeper into the story. 3 channels reproduce height as well as depth, so you feel soundwaves ripple above your head every time a helicopter passes on screen.

HOME SOUND MADE EASY: Expand into a true surround-sound system by setting up additional Play-Fi speakers (sold separately). You can sync and group your devices with the DTS Play-Fi app and stream your favorite playlist to every room without dropping a beat.
EXPERIENCE FRONT-ROW SOUND: Stadium EQ Mode transforms your living room into a live sports stadium. Feel the crowd’s intensity, immerse yourself in the game, and still hear crystal clear commentary.
WORKS SEAMLESSLY WITH ROKU TV: Roku TV Ready means you'll enjoy a smoother setup, easy access to sound settings, and compatibility with your Roku remote when connecting this soundbar to your Roku TV.

THE PERFECT MATCH FOR YOUR HDR TV: High-speed HDM1 eARC can transmit advanced audio formats like Dolby Atmos and DTS:X. For movies and gaming, 4K pass-through lets you connect 4K HDR video sources with no loss of resolution.

STREAM HIGH QUALITY MUSIC: This soundbar lets you enjoy amazing music as well as movies. You can stream your favorite songs via Bluetooth, Spotify Connect or Apple AirPlay 2. Wired options include audio-in, optical in and USB.

CONNECT WITH AMAZON ECHO OR DIGITAL ASSISTANT DEVICES: Ask Alexa-enabled devices or any speaker that works with Google Assistant to play music through the soundbar. Skip tracks and control playback hands-free. This works with Apple AirPlay 2 too.

INCLUDED ACCESSORIES: Remote control (with battery), power cord, wall mount bracket, quick start guide, World Wide Warranty leaflet. Scroll down on this product page for downloadable Manual and Quick Start Guide

title: [Electric Focus/Auto Keystone] Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, Native 1080P 20000L 4K Supported, FUDONI Outdoor Movie Projector for Home Theater UP to 300", for HDMI/USB/iOS/Android/TV Stick/Laptop
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
features: 【Auto Keystone & Electric Focus】 Portable projector is equipped with auto keystone correction and motorized focus technology, which provides you with great convenience in using the projector. When "Automatic Trapezoid" is turned on, you will get a rectangular image in 2 seconds, eliminating the need for tedious manual adjustments. Electric focus allows you to get a clear picture in 2s, simply press the "F+" and "F-" buttons on the remote control, eliminating the need to manually rotate the focus ring and greatly simplifying the operation process.

【Full HD Native 1080P Projector & 300'' Giant Display】Movie projector features a full HD native 1080P resolution, support for 4K movie playback, which gives you high quality and exceptional clarity, restore the authenticity of color to the maximum extent. Excellent brightness 600 ASIN LM and 20000:1 high dynamic contrast ratio for brighter, richer images with sharper detail. Home projector provides 30-300 inches projection display, at 3.2-29.6 feet projection distance. The oversized screen is perfect for movie nights and backyard parties.

【Ultra-fast WIFI6 Connection】Home projector has WiFi wireless connectivity. 5G+2.4G dual-band WiFi technology, capable of receiving WiFi signals from 2 frequencies at the same time, provides greater flexibility and smoother, faster transmissions. So you can enjoy screen mirroring, movie and and gaming with your mobile devices. Easily project content from smartphones, tablets and other devices onto the big screen. Whether it's an HD movie or an office presentation, and instantly synchronize it.

【High-fidelity Stereo & Bi-directional Bluetooth Connection】Bluetooth projector has built-in 5W speaker with stereo surround sound, giving you a stunning and loud listening experience and enjoying a theater-like experience. Bluetooth projector can not only be paired with external speakers/stereos to enhance the audio effect, but can also be paired with a cell phone/computer to be used as a speaker.

【Wider Application】Outdoor projector has built-in HDMI, USB, AV and 3.5mm audio jack to connect with TV sticks, Roku, computers, laptops, tablets, external speaker, and USB flash drives. USB flash driver connection makes it easier to enjoy your videos and pictures or display your office documents in meetings. Supports desktop, ceiling and tripod mounting, strong compatibility, flexible use, to meet the immersive big screen experience of various occasions, is the perfect choice for home theater, outdoor camping, garden parties, camping and meeting.

inStockText: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.

description: "Enhance your home theater with state-of-the-art projection. Featuring proprietary core technologies, the Home Cinema 1080 delivers an astounding 1080p picture up to 320"" on virtually any blank wall or screen. Whether you’re binge-watching your favorite TV show or watching the big game, this dynamic, versatile projector provides a stunning, larger-than-life viewing experience with true 3-chip, 3LCD technology, Best-in-Class Color Brightness (1) and fast data processing. features: Stunning picture quality — provides stunning detailed 1080p images and fast data processing that’s optimized for fast-action sports, gaming and more
Ultra bright images — 3,400 lumens of color and white brightness deliver outstanding-quality images in a variety of lighting conditions (3)

Best-in-Class Color Brightness (1) — advanced 3LCD technology displays 100% of the RGB color signal for every frame. This allows for outstanding color accuracy while maintaining excellent color brightness, without any distracting “rainbowing” or “color brightness” issues seen with other projection technologies
Versatile connectivity — features two HDMI ports, so you can connect your cable/satellite box, Blu-ray Disc player, gaming console or streaming device
Easy setup — built-in speaker and easy setup for HD entertainment right out of the box
Built-in picture skew sensor — automatically analyzes the picture and instantly corrects the keystone for a square image
Dynamic contrast ratio — up to 16,000:1 for rich detail in dark scenes
Convenient color mode adjustments — four easy selectable color modes to optimize projection content: Dynamic, Bright Cinema, Cinema and Game
Award-winning service and support — standard 2-year limited warranty, full-unit replacement, along with free technical phone support for the life of the product

title: ULTIMEA 5.1ch Sound Bar for Smart TV with 2 Surround Speakers, Virtual Surround Sound System for TV, App Control, Home Theater Sound System, Wired Subwoofer, Peak Power 250W, Opt/BT/AUX, Aura A30
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: 5.1ch Virtual Surround Sound System for TV: This 5.1ch sound bar features 3 main channels for crisp dialogue and 2 surround sound speakers, creating a virtual surround sound field. With SurroundX technology, it offers precise audio with 99.99% detail accuracy. AI enhances the sound for a lifelike audio experience by coordinating the speakers to mimic realistic sound movement, elevating your home theater experience.

Wired Connection between 2 Surround Speakers: Connect 2 surround speakers using a cable and power the right speaker to pair it wirelessly with the tv soundbar. If pairing fails, place 2 speakers and sound bar within 1.5 ft of each other. Press the SURROUND button on the remote for 5s until “SUR” flashes. Then press the PAIR button on the right surround speaker for 5s until its light flashes. Once paired, the light will stay on, and you can reposition the speakers as needed.

4-inch Wired Subwoofer with BassMX Technology: The Aura A30 sound bar for smart tv includes a subwoofer featuring Ultimea BassMX technology for improved low-frequency sound. Its optimized magnetic circuit and diaphragm produce deep, resonant bass, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in rich low frequencies and experience the impact of every beat. BassMX amplifies action scenes and explosions, enhancing your overall bass performance.

Ultimea Smart App Control: Ultimea is dedicated to making life more intelligent through the Ultimea Home. Ultimea smart App of this 5.1 tv sound bar for smart tv can switch multiple EQ, adjust bands and matrix. Stay ahead with regular OTA upgrades to ensure a seamless premium audio experience with Ulitmea 5.1 virtual surround sound system for TV.

121 Preset EQ Matrices: The Ultimea App caters to the ultimate audio enthusiast with 121 preset equalizer matrices, tailored for four distinct sonic preferences: Bass, Pop, Classical, and Rock. Explore precision tuning and fine-tune your listening experience with dynamic adjustments to achieve your desired effects.

10-Band Equalizer Settings: Elevate your audio experience with 6 tailored EQ modes: Movie, Music, Voice, Sport, Game, and Night, each finely tuned for optimal performance. Further refine your listening with the Ultimea App's advanced "Customize", allowing you to dial in the perfect personalized sound to match your preferences and environment.

title: ULTIMEA 5.1 Sound Bar Compatible with Dolby Atmos, Peak Power 410W, Surround Sound System for TV with Subwoofer, Sound Bar for Smart TV, Surround and Bass Adjustable Home Theater, Poseidon D60
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
features: Dolby Atmos Enabled: The Ultimea soundbar, compatible with Dolby Atmos, offers a more immersive 3D sound experience compared to Dolby Digital and Dolby Audio. This advanced surround sound system for your TV allows sound to move around the listener, creating a heightened sense of direction, space, and depth. With the Ultimea home theater sound system, you can enjoy a cinematic audio experience right in your living room.

2 Adjustable Surround Speakers: This 5.1 soundbar system features two surround speakers with a 20-foot extended cable for easy connection to the subwoofer, allowing you to place them according to your preferences. The adjustable surround speakers and subwoofer provide a customizable and immersive sound experience. You can effortlessly adjust their levels with a single click on the remote control, tailoring the audio to your ideal setup.

5.1 Immersive Surround Sound System for TV: The Ultimea soundbar delivers a crystal-clear dialogue with its three main sound channels and includes two surround speakers and a subwoofer. Equipped with Dolby Atmos technology, this soundbar precisely pinpoints sound sources, creating a breathtaking surround sound experience that envelops you from all angles. Enjoy cinematic audio that truly surrounds you with the ULTIMEA soundbar for your smart TV.

Deep Bass: The Ultimea subwoofer features a 5.25-inch driver and connects to the main soundbar via Bluetooth. The speaker is positioned at the bottom of the subwoofer, directing the bass downward for a more powerful rumble. For optimal sound effects, we recommend placing the subwoofer close to the listening area.

Customized Sound EQ Software: At Ultimea, we understand the importance of personalized audio experiences. Our customizable sound EQ software allows you to tailor audio settings to your preferences. This includes options for balanced bass, enhanced bass levels, treble adjustments, improved sound clarity, clearer vocals, EQ fine-tuning, and volume control. If you’re interested in a customized sound experience, please contact us for more details.

The Highest-Level Audio Transmission: HDMI eARC offers superior bandwidth and advanced audio transmission capabilities, supporting high-resolution, Dolby Atmos multi-channel audio effects. With the included HDMI cable, you can enjoy lossless sound quality for a truly immersive experience. (Please note: The Poseidon D60 does not support DTS decoding.)

features: Compatible with Bluetooth: 120W standalone 2-channel wall-mounted amplifier, specifically designed for ceiling speakers, delivers a distinctive stereo experience. It is also compatible with all the latest smart devices of today, including iPhones, iPads, iOS and Android smartphones & tablets, PCs, laptops, desktops, and more, offering a wireless range of over 30 feet.

150 Watts Each 8Ohm: PNWCZ Bluetooth ceiling speakers boasts a maximum power handling capacity of 600 watts. The standout feature of this 6.5-inch speakers lies in its incorporation of a DSP chip, which endows it with virtual bass enhancement and virtual 3D surround sound capabilities. With a DSP-equipped speaker renowned for its stability and precision, it is ideally suited for a variety of applications such as music and dance gatherings, commercial spaces like malls, and diverse domestic settings: home theaters, bathrooms, offices, kitchens, living rooms, and beyond.

More Functions with Amplifier: MIC IN /USB /AUX IN,This dual-independent 2-channel in wall amplifier is equipped with a USB flash card reader, enabling media playback and doubling as a charging port for devices. A 3.5mm AUX audio input jack facilitates the connection of external audio equipment and sound systems. The wall-mounted receiver further enhances convenience with an integrated microphone paging function and sample source audio control capabilities.

Easy Install & Dimension: The ceiling speakers use flush mount design, allowing for effortless mounting on walls or ceilings, ensuring both ease of use and setup. With their sleek white finish, they blend seamlessly into their surroundings, providing you with unobtrusively clean and tidy walls.Total Speakers Diameter 7.48 Inches (19 CM),Cut Out Diameter 6.5 Inches(16.5 CM),Speakers Depth: 3.15 Inches (8CM).

manufacturerAttributes.value: Built with an elevation channel integrated into the top, the R-625FA Dolby Atmos floorstanding speaker not only delivers stereo sound towards the listener, but also reflects sound off the ceiling to deliver the immersive, overhead Dolby Atmos experience.  Take Your Movies And Music To New Heights Our proprietary speaker technologies are ideal for delivering the most immersive, impactful 360 Degree Dolby Atmos listening experience. Controlled directivity and high-performance have been an integral part of Klipsch acoustic design principals for the better part of a century.  Built-In Elevation Speaker Not just your typical full-range tower speaker, the R-625FA features a high performance up-firing Dolby Atmos speaker integrated in the top for an enveloping soundstage. It's a perfectly matched set up that virtually disappears. The integrated speaker terminals are placed low on the cabinet for convenience and an unobtrusive connection.

90x90 Tractrix HornOur exclusive Tractrix horn technology delivers the power, detail and emotion of the live music experience with the cleanest, most natural sound possible.  Linear Travel Suspension (LTS) Aluminum Tweeter With Kapton Suspension  The exclusive Linear Travel Suspension (LTS) minimizes distortion for enhanced, detailed performances. Kapton is an extremely light and rigid material used in the tweeter suspension to provide high efficiency and improve resolution and detail. LTS tweeters are a hallmark of Klipsch speakers, making it a core component of some of the best speakers in the world.  Spun Copper Img Woofer Injection Molded Graphite (IMG) woofer cones are exceptionally light while being extremely rigid - providing remarkable low frequency response, with minimal cone breakup and distortion. When paired with the Tractrix Horn-loaded LTS tweeter, it provides speaker efficiency highest in its class.

Sleek, Contemporary Appearance Exposed fasteners, angled feet and low profile magnetic grilles give the speakers a polished, modern appearanc  MDF Cabinet With Scratch-Resistant, Textured Wood Grain Vinyl Stylish aesthetic with absolute durability that results in a seamless integration into any decor.  High Quality Cabinet Design Reinforced MDF construction reduces cabinet vibration for less audible coloration and improved sonic accuracy.  Rear Tractrix PortThe rear Tractrix port is perfectly matched to the cabinet and woofers, creating ideal airflow with minimal distortion or turbulence even at the lowest frequencies.

inStockText: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.

features: The Seatcraft experience is where craftsmanship meets functionality. Engineered for unparalleled quality and ergonomic comfort. Sit with us and experience the decades of mastery and passion we’ve put into our seats. Don’t settle for less.

Experience the epitome of comfort and convenience with our home theater seating. Packed with a comprehensive range of functionality, ergonomic adjustments, and an elevated quality of life. Elevate your cinematic experience.

Not all furniture is created equal. The Seatcraft approach is different, with decades of knowledge we’ve masterfully crafted enduring furniture designed last. With a meticulous selection process for top-grain leather and hardwood frames, we know our seats will stand the test of time.

Transform your living spaces or home theater into havens of comfort and style. Visualize the timeless designs elevating the aesthetics of your living spaces. Whether entertaining guests or creating a cinematic retreat, make a statement.
Assembling furniture can be a pain, we know. That’s why we’ve designed our furniture with a simple assembly that takes only 30 minutes or less.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The Seatcraft Anthem Collection 
A chair worthy of its own audience, we welcome you to enjoy one of our most luxurious sectionals ever, built with one of our most exceptional leathers. The Seatcraft Anthem comes in a prestigious Leather 7000 upholstery, a high grade, quality leather to complement the construction of this chair. If it wasn't enough, cool gel foam layers are weaved through its build, yielding one of our most masterfully crafted chairs yet, allowing us at Seatcraft to present you the finest home theater sectional available on the world market today. 
Home Theater Seating Features 
Top Grain Leather 
Quite simply, the very finest leather you can pick for your home theater seat. This exclusive, luxury material is painstakingly hand-picked from the top 30% of all raw materials, chosen for premium look and texture. 
	
Adjustable Powered Headrests 
These powered headrests can adjust to a number of different positions at the push of a button, reducing neck and shoulder strain. 
	
Fold-Down Table 
The middle backrest of this sofa reveals a beautiful table with two cup holders, an overhead light, and two USB and a 110V AC power outlet and will also include our NEW wireless charging feature. 
	
Power Recline Control 
Recline your seats and headrests into your favorite position simply by pushing a button on each end seat’s power control panel. A handy USB port is included to conveniently charge your phone or other electronic device. 
	
NEW Wireless Charging 
Place your QI-enabled device onto the wireless charging ring and let the power flow. 
	
Hidden In-Arm Storage 
The armrests of this seat open up to reveal plenty of storage room for the placement of essential items such as your tray table, remote controls and even books. 
	
Lighted Cupholders 
These cupholders emit a gentle azure glow that allows you to find your beverages easily in the dark and can be turned on and off easily with the push of a button. 
	
Ambient Base Lighting 
Ambient base lighting under the seat provides a discreet means for guests to find their way in a darkened room. Plus it looks cool! 
	
Stages of Motion - Upright Position 
Chair in default upright sitting position. 
Stages of Motion - Adjustable Powered Headrests 
Use power controls to adjust headrest to always be in optimal viewing position 
Stages of Motion - T.V. Position 
Recline to a comfortable T.V. viewing position. 
Stages of Motion - Full Recline 
Full recline to achieve maximum relaxation.

Who We Are 
The Seatcraft story begins in 1978 in California as a manufacturer of automotive seating. The company soon expanded into RV seating and furniture, where it developed a solid reputation in the industry. In 2001, its horizons broadened to the world of home theater seating. The expertise and skill honed over 35 years in the automotive business are carried through into our vision for home theater seating.

title: Polk Audio PSW10 10" Powered Subwoofer – Power Port Technology, Up to 100 Watts, Big Bass in Compact Design, Easy Setup with Home Theater Systems, Timbre-Matched with Monitor & T-Series Polk Speakers
inStockText: Only 10 left in stock (more on the way).
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Subwoofers
description: Add deep bass excitement and extended dynamic thrills to your music or movie sound system with the easy-to-connect and easy-to-use PSW 10. Its 10" Dynamic Balance composite cone driver and non-resonant enclosure produces deep, smooth response with superior detail and accuracy, while limiting distortion. The sub is powered by a high-current amplifier producing 50 Watts RMS/100 Watts dynamic power. A rotary volume control adjusts the volume of the subwoofer relative to the other speakers in the system and the unit offers a continuously variable low-pass filter, adjustable from 80-160 Hz. Easily accessible, professional-grade line- and speaker-level inputs, and speaker level outputs, allow easy connection to any system.
features: POWERED SUBWOOFER FOR EXTRA BASS and PUNCH – A 10-inch Dynamic Balance woofer and a uniquely configured directed port provides accurate bass with added depth that brings your music and movies alive. A perfect solution for your small-to-mid size room.Waterproof : No

LOUDER CLEARER SOUND EVEN AT HIGH VOLUME – Enjoy a thrilling yet balanced music experience with rich, deep sound, even at low frequencies. BLENDS EASILY WITH ANY SPEAKER and plays the most demanding nodes effortlessly without any distortion

DOUBLE THE AMPLIFIER POWER TO 100 Watts of Dynamic Power with its in-built 50-watt RMS amp. Sophisticated engineering with best in class resonance-free driver materials make this sub highly durable and FIT FOR EXTENDED USE

EASY TO INTEGRATE WITH EXISTING SYSTEMS – Hook up this sub to the receiver and upgrade your music sound instantly. Features continuously variable 80-160 Hz crossover and 40-160 Hz (-3dB) frequency response

A sleek detachable grille on the front, speaker and line-level inputs as well as speaker-level outputs on the back, and a Phase Toggle Switch for multiple subwoofers, make this sub cohesive and complete.
Amplifier Distortion: <1 percent

PSW Series subwoofers outperform the competition with durable, resonance-free Dynamic Balance driver materials that stay stiff and move fast. You experience deep, musical low frequencies and thrilling effects with superior system blending.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Single 10" Subwoofer 
PSW enclosures are designed and engineered for perfect volume, minutely tuned for distortion-free low frequencies, and internally braced and damped to eliminate internal standing waves and other performance-robbing resonances.
This unique configuration uses a specially tuned and directed port to more efficiently produce maximum bass impact.
	
100 Watts 
Unique design keeps your subwoofer stable and steady even at radical volume levels, for more efficient use of power. No more "escaped washing machine" syndrome. 
	
Laser-Based Klippel Measurement Technology 
Our state-of-the-art Klippel distortion analyzer optimizes the woofer's motor structure, voice coil alignment and suspension for smooth, unimpeded movement over a broad spectrum of the lower frequencies to ensure the best, most efficient performance even at extreme listening levels. 
	
Resonance-Free Dynamic Balance Driver Materials 
PSW Series subwoofers outperform the competition with durable, resonance-free Dynamic Balance driver materials that stay stiff and move fast. You experience deep, musical low frequencies and thrilling effects with superior system blending. 
	
Easy Connection to Any System

title: Hisense AX5125H 5.1.2Ch Sound Bar with Wireless Subwoofer, 500W, Dolby Atmos, Bluetooth 5.3, EzPlay, 4K HDMI Pass Through, Roku TV Ready, DTS:X, HDMI/AUX/ARC/Optical/USB, 7 EQ Modes
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: Upgrade your audio experience with the AX5125H 5.1.2 channel soundbar with a wireless subwoofer and wireless rear speakers. The AX5125H’s 500 watts of sound fills the room with a 9- speaker array that also projects sound overhead, making the most of Dolby Atmos. The dedicated wireless rear channel speakers create an immersive, true surround sound experience. 7 audio enhancement modes, including movie, music, game, news, sport, night and AI mode, optimize sound specifically to the content or time of day. And, eARC provides a simple one cable connection with the included HDMI cable. Bluetooth audio makes it easy to connect your phone, tablet or laptop wireless to enjoy music and more.
features: 5.1.2 SURROUND SOUND: 9 speakers built into the soundbar. Left and right front channel, center channel, left and right rear surround channel, surround the listener in 3D audio for room filling sound that delivers a true Dolby Atmos experience.

WIRELESS SUBWOOFER: A wireless subwoofer delivers the robust low-end frequencies that punctuate your favorite movies, music, and games, without any messy wires. You’ll feel the “boom” while the two front-facing speakers project bright, clear high- and mid-range frequencies.
QUICK TOUCH EQ MODES: Get the best audio performance from music, movies, and news with a simple touch of the remote with 7 preset EQ settings.

DOLBY ATMOS: Whether you’re gaming, watching your favorite movie or show, or listening to that new track on repeat, Dolby Atmos enhances the entertainment you love across all of your devices. It goes beyond ordinary listening by transporting you with the breakthrough spatial sound experience that draws you in deeper, so you hear and feel more.

ROKU TV READY: As Roku TV Ready device, the Hisense AX5125H Soundbar is fully compatible with any Roku TV through the HDMI (eARC) connection. You can even use the Roku TV remote to control both the TV and soundbar for easier setup and better navigation experience.

WIRELESS REAR SPEAKERS: While some soundbar packages can create a “virtual” surround sound experience by manipulating frequencies, the AX5125H comes with a pair of dedicated wireless rear speakers that truly immerses the listener and make set up a breeze.
WIRELESS MUSIC STREAMING: Wireless Bluetooth technology easily connects to smart devices so the listener can enjoy their favorite playlists from their phone or other wireless devices.

EASY CONNECTIVITY: With HDMI (eARC), the Hisense AX5125H can connect to your TV through a single HDMI cable (included) connect wirelessly via Bluetooth, and control both with one remote. You’ll be enjoying better TV sound in minutes.

description: Experience immersive sound anywhere delivered with Sony’s portable theater system with 360 Spatial Sound Mapping
features: 360 SPATIAL SOUND MAPPING TECHNOLOGY ENVELOPS YOU IN SOUND: Even stereo sound is transformed into immersive spatial sound using our advanced up-mixing algorithm – no matter what you're watching
COMPACT AND PORTABLE: Take your cinematic sound anywhere to enjoy 360 spatial sound wherever you are, straight from your tablet, phone, laptop or projector
STAMINA BATTERY FOR ALL DAY USE: With 30 hours of battery power. A 15W or higher USB PD compatible AC adaptor is required for charging (not included)
SLEEK DESIGN THAT BLENDS WITH ANY ROOM: Lightweight, with one-handed portability, place this Sony Bluetooth home speaker is designed to suit any interior
EASY SET-UP AND CONTROL: The Sony | Home Entertainment Connect app provides guidance and allows you to control the device from your smartphone, whilst Bluetooth makes it easy to connect and play

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
HT-AX7 
Portable Theater System 
Experience immersive sound anywhere delivered with Sony’s portable theater system with 360 Spatial Sound Mapping 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Transform your sound into total spatial immersion 
The HT-AX7 uses 360 Spatial Sound Mapping technology to envelop you in spatial sound by creating multiple phantom speakers at the front and rear. Simply place the three speakers around you, and you'll feel completely immersed. 
Fill any room with rich sound 
When Sound Field effect is off, place the three speakers in the corners of your room and the HT-AX7 will create the perfect atmosphere with a high-quality, room-filling sound. 
Design and audio in harmony 
With no wires to disrupt your room's layout, this speaker is the perfect addition to any home. Its sleek and versatile design seamlessly blends with any interior decor for a stylish and cohesive look. 
Small in size, big in performance 
The HT-AX7 has two front speakers and two passive radiators on the side. The front speakers are powered by X-Balanced Speaker Units that give a powerful and clear sound. 
Experience more, everywhere 
Upgrade every listen to a surround sound experience, no matter where you are. The speaker uses multiple phantom speakers to create a fully immersive Spatial Sound. 
Free yourself from wires 
The HT-AX7 is a Bluetooth enabled device with wireless connectivity between the front and rear speakers. It's easy to move around and integrate into your life and home. 
Perfectly portable 
The HT-AX7 is small and battery powered, making it easy to move between rooms, take to a friend's house or on holiday. 
Uninterrupted audio experience 
With over 30 hours of battery life and a quick charging feature that gives over 2.5 hours of play with a 10-minute charge, you can enjoy your favourite content without worrying about power. 
Switch seamlessly, stream effortlessly 
The HT-AX7 allows you to simultaneously connect and instantly switch between two devices and it automatically links to your last connected device when you turn it on. 
Three in one – ultimate simplicity 
Ready to use straight out of the box, you can charge the rear speakers by placing them on the front speaker. Plus, with a light-weight design and one-handed portability, the detachable rear speakers can be conveniently placed wherever you like.

From the manufacturer
Room-filling sound 
3-way 3-driver Bookshelf Speaker System 
Introducing a speaker series versatile enough to deliver an unprecedented and real audio experience, and with a soundstage so expansive you can feel the energy and passion of the original performance, all while staying in harmony with your existing living spaces-no special listening room or setup required.

Experience the latest in cinematic sound innovation in the comfort of your home 
Wooden finish 
This speaker has a smart black finish that blends with most contemporary interiors. 
High quality structure 
These speakers are built on sound foundations. A strong, ported enclosure allows for rich, resonant acoustics. 
Compact bookshelf design 
These small, bookshelf speakers are very compact and space-efficient for easy installation in tight spots. 
Premium components 
Air-core inductors in the tweeters, a silicon steel plate in the woofer, the thickest possible winding materials, and high quality film condensers. 
High-Resolution Audio 
Take your digital music collection to another level with High-Resolution Audio. 
3-way, 3-driver speakers 
The 3-driver bookshelf speakers include a rigid 5.12 in MRC woofer for dynamic bass, along with a 0.98 in tweeter and 0.75 in super-tweeter. 
Super tweeters 
These speakers include super tweeters with wide directionality. High-frequency notes are reproduced precisely across an expansive soundstage. 
High precision tweeter 
The 0.98 in soft dome main tweeter features polyester fiber for a more faithful, authentic sound. 
5.12 in Woofer 
This speaker system incorporates a 5.12 in woofer for deep, stable bass. 
Tapered faceplate edges 
With slightly tapered faceplate edges, edge diffraction is suppressed for a clear and natural soundstage. 
Rich acoustics 
The ported, all-wood enclosures are built for resonant acoustics. 
Mica Reinforced Cellular cone 
Mica Reinforced Cellular (MRC) fiber woofers are rigid, holding their shape even when moving at high pressure and speed.

title: Pioneer VSX-534 Home Audio Smart AV Receiver 5.2-Ch HDR10, Dolby Vision, Atmos and Virtual Enabled with 4K and Bluetooth
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Home Theater › Receivers & Amplifiers › Receivers
description: Pioneer VSX-534 Home Audio Smart AV Receiver 5.2-Ch HDR10, Dolby Vision, Atmos and Virtual Enabled with 4K and Bluetooth. The VSX-534 comes in a user-friendly new design, with 12% slimmer size than the previous model for easy installation, 4K indicator and personal preset and Bluetooth input buttons on the front panel. Immerse in enveloping sound with Dolby Atoms and DTS: x Audio formats. Or even without height or surround speakers, you can still enjoy virtual 3D surround effect with Dolby Atoms height vitalize* and DTS virtual: x. The AV receiver is compatible with Ultra HD, HDR10, HOG and Dolby visions with support for HDCP 2. 2, so you can fully appreciate premium content such as 4K videos.
features: DTS:X PLAYBACK. Dolby Atmos and DTS:X is the next-generation audio codec from DTS that leverages object-based audio to enable new immersive and interactive audio experiences.

BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE. Seamlessly connect your phone, tablet or PC and stream to the receiver with Bluetooth Wireless Technology. This smart receiver remembers your device and starts playback whenever it detects an incoming Bluetooth audio stream.

DOLBY ATMOS. Dolby Atmos Height Virtualizer provides an immersive listening experience, creating a virtual surround and height effect without employing additional surround or height speakers. 5.1.2ch Dolby Atmos.

PERSONAL PRESET. Press the personal preset button on the front panel for three seconds and your current settings such as volume level and listening mode. Up to three presets can be registered and called up from the front panel button or remote control.
RANGE CONTROL. With this unique mid-range sound control feature, you can make independent volume adjustments to the range including dialogues in films, with the up/down key on the remote control.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
VSX-534 5.2-CHANNEL AV RECEIVER 
REAL LIFE SOUND 
With Dolby Atmos capability on the VSX-534 you can get lifelike, object-oriented sound in smooth, curving movements or realistic overhead height effects without employing additional surround sound or up-firing speakers. 
SMOOTH & EASY BLUETOOTH 
Whatever audio is playing on your phone, tablet, or PC app can be streamed to the receiver with Bluetooth wireless technology. Once the receiver has paired with and remembered your device, it will start playback automatically whenever it detects an incoming Bluetooth audio stream. 
4K HDR READY 
Enjoy support for HDR (High Dynamic Range) video including HDR10, HLG, Dolby Vision, and BT.2020. The 4:4:4 color space is also supported. Six HDMI inputs, ARC-ready MAIN OUT, and SUB OUT pass 4K/60p and HDR video from player to compatible TV and projector and all terminals are HDCP 2.2 compliant. 
CUSTOMIZED TO YOU 
MCACC auto room tuning uses a custom microphone to automatically compensate for differences in speaker size, level and distance, and equalizes response, so you get the even sound you’re supposed to. Coupled with dialog enhancements and customizable volume and listening presets, you can really personalize the sound coming from your home theater setup.

title: Mini Projector, VISSPL Full HD 1080P Video Projector, Portable Outdoor Projector with Tripod, Kids Gift, Home Theater Movie Phone Projector Compatible with Android/iOS/Windows/TV Stick/HDMI/USB
inStockText: In Stock  Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
features: 【Smallest & On-the-Go Entertainment】Measuring a mere 6.1*5.08*2.4’’, equivalent to the size of two Coke cans, mini projector can easily fit in your pocket or bag. Weighing only 1.1 lb, even child's tiny fingers can effortlessly grasp the smallest projector. Its sophisticated design and exquisite handheld packaging makes it a perfect gift choice for all ages. Just enjoy the freedom of taking this lightweight and handy projector with you wherever you go.

【Full HD 1080P & Eye Protection】The VISSPL 2024 projector supports 1080P resolution for stunning visuals. Powered by advanced LED technology and a uniform illumination method, our projector guarantees exceptional image quality, delivering a dynamic and color-vibrant effect, minimizing the impact of blue and direct light. Perfect for safeguarding children's eye health! For optimal performance, we recommend using video projector in a dark environment to fully enjoy its capabilities.

【Mini Tripod & Powerful Sound】VISSPL movie projector supports a screen size of 35-160’’, perfect for creating a cinematic atmosphere. ±15°Keystone correction and included projector tripod offers the freedom to position your projector at the ideal height, eliminating the need to adjust to screen or table limitations. With its built-in HiFi speaker to enjoy powerful and dynamic audio that enhances your entertainment experience whether it's at home, or during kids' parties.

【Multiple-device Connection】VISSPL outdoor projector provides multiple input source interfaces, catering to a wide range of equipment requirements. With HDMI, USB, AV, and Audio ports, it seamlessly connects to devices such as smartphones, laptops, TV stick, PS5, and external speakers. ***Due to HDCP copyright issues, Netflix / Disney / Hulu prohibits playing movies directly from the projector, please use a TV Stick to play.***When connecting with phone, an extra HDMI adapter is needed.

【Long Lamp Life & Technical Support】With high-efficiency cooling technology, it reduces fan noise by 50% compared to other projectors, extending lamp life to over 55000 hours. If you have any problems while using, please let us know at once. VISSPL projector team offers Lifetime Technical Support for all our products.

Is the projector compatible with smartphones? 
Yes, when connecting with phone, an extra HDMI adapter is needed. (HDMI adapter not included) It is not compatible with Google phones. Due to mirroring protocol, Google phones do not support screen mirroring 
Can I play Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc? 
Due to HDCP copyright issues, the apps like Netflix / Disney / Hulu prohibits playing movies directly by mirror screen with smartphone. Please use a TV stick to connect to watch it. 
Can I use it for business presentation? 
Not recommended for business presentation, it is a home theater projector. We recommend using video projector in a dark environment to fully enjoy its capabilities. 
What is the optimal viewing distance and projection size of this mini projector? 
The best viewing distance is 6.56ft (2m) and the size is about 70 inches.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Sound Bars for TV & Hear Your TV Better 
OXS S3 soundbar for TV with stylish design and dialogue enhancement technology，supports bluetooth 5.0, COAXIAL & multi-wired connections，and you can tune your sound bar to 3 different modes via the remote control. 
Immersive 3D Sound Experience 
OXS S3 compact home audio sound bars is a 2.0 Channel soundbar, and can produce 3D sound effects that will take you into an immersive space and make your living room into a Home Theater. *Recommended audition distance：8.2 - 11.48ft. 
OXS S3 Key Features 
Full Range And Poweful Bass 
The soundbar is designed with 4 full-range speakers and dynamic bass with a special port tube reflection designed to deliver a soft and flexible bass effect. 
	
Two ways to control 
You can control the sound bar with remote or directly with feature buttons control on it. The LED indicator shows the current mode you choose. Note: remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes. 
	
Multiple Connections 
The OXS S3 TV speakers supports USB flash drive, AUX, OPTICAL, and COAXIAL wired audio input for TV. With Bluetooth 5.0 wireless transmission, you can easily connect OXS S3 to wireless devices . 
	
Movie Mode 
Make Your Home Theater 
OXS S3 TV speakers sound bar can increase the stereo and layering of movie audio with DSP digital audio processing technology. 
Game/News Mode 
Rich Sound Configured For Gaming 
The entire game scene naturally expands, filling the entire real space, making the limit between real and virtual no longer exist. 
Music Mode 
Make Your Immersive Concert 
OXS S3 speakers for TV will make sure you won't miss a single note in any musical performance and make you immersive concert. 
User Tips 
When you use optical or coaxial cable to connect the soundbar to a TV, DVD, Blu-ray player or other suitable equipment, please change the Audio Output Settings of TV, DVD, Blu-ray player into the PCM form.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
SPUN-COPPER IMG WOOFER 
Injection Molded Graphite (IMG) woofer cones are exceptionally light while being extremely rigid – providing remarkable low frequency response, with minimal cone breakup and distortion to give you the deepest, cleanest bass possible. 
All-Digital Amplifier 
The built-in, all-digital amplifier of the Reference Series subwoofer delivers ample power with high efficiency and true-to-source accuracy reproduction - thus providing maximum output, detail, and power that fills your home. 
CUSTOMIZED BASS 
The Reference Series subwoofer gain, low pass crossover, and phase controls ensure the low-frequency tones blend with other speakers and establish the ideal level of bass for your room. 
Line level/LFE RCA inputs provide maximum compatibility with standard home theater receivers. 
FLEXIBLE PLACEMENT 
The high-performance, front-firing driver was designed to provide deep bass regardless of its location in the room to give you more placement options.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
HT-A9 
A new frontier of surround sound 
High Performance Home Theater System 
360 Spatial Sound Mapping that adapts to your environment 
Sony’s proprietary technology which provides a much wider and immersive sound field. Sound Field Optimization calibrates the sound to your room for a listening environment which seems to expand beyond the walls. 
Flexible layout for any situation 
HT-A9’s speakers wirelessly connect to the control box, allowing you to place them anywhere in the room. Sound Field Optimization allows you to have the speakers at different heights and distances and will measure the position of each speaker to create the best sound for your room. 
Customize your setup with two optional subwoofers 
Take your HT-A9 experience to the next level with Sony’s optional subwoofers. The SA-SW3 or the SA-SW5 subwoofers allow you to tailor how much extra bass you want to add to your setup. The subwoofers automatically pair to the HT-A9 for seamless and easy setup. Subwoofers sold separately. 
HT-A9 Home Theater System 
Immerse yourself in a multi-dimensional audio experience. 

Unique 360 Spatial Sound Mapping technology calibrates sound to your room for an environment that seems to expand beyond the walls. Support for 8K HDR, 4K/120 passthrough, and Dolby Vision video passthrough make your favorite movies and games sound out of this world.

Previous page
Easy UI 
An OLED front panel display is on the control box for quick viewing of the volume level, sound mode, or input. An onscreen user interface helps you make detailed adjustments to your settings easily. 
Effortless control & immersion 
An integrated UI with select Sony TVs allows you easy access to all the home theater system controls. The HT-A9 also features an Acoustic Center Sync using the TV to enhance and uplift the dialogue. 
Sony’s 360 Reality Audio technology 
Music is engineered to sound like its coming from all around you, making it seem like you’re on the stage or in the recording studio with the artist. 
Next page
Try it free 
With purchase of this product, receive a code for four months of unlimited access to over 75 million songs via Amazon Music. With HD audio available for all Amazon Music subscribers, streaming never sounded so good. 
Movies and games feel so real 
With 8K HDR, 4K/120 and Dolby Vision video passthrough support, your favorite movies and games are even more thrilling. 
Easy Listening 
HT-A9 supports audio streaming via Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Chromecast built-in, Spotify Connect, and Apple AirPlay2. 
Stream music 
Use the Sony | Music Center App to group selected Sony soundbars and speakers together, then stream music in multiple rooms. 
Voice Assistant Compatibility 
Connect to your home’s other devices with Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa.

Why it is not work or no sound from sound bar after plugging into the cable? 
1. Please ensure the cable you plug into your TV is Output Port and not Input Port. 
2. Ensure change the TV audio format setting to PCM. 
3.Please follow the Setup Tips or Manual, or send email to us, we will answer without 24 hours. 
Why don't I get audio from apps like Netflix, Hulu and Disney+? 
First of all, please switch your TV sound setting to PCM/Stereo and then turn off Dolby or DTS function in the app sound settings.APPs like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube.After that it will work perfectly. 
Connection Tips: 
The audio cable is connected to the TV audio output and the soundbar audio input. 
Please set your TV to PCM mode. Please disable the Dolby and DTS on your TVs . 
The USB interface only suitable for the U disk, not as supply power.

Description: 
The Rockville HTS45 is an all in one 5.1 channel complete home audio system. It includes a powered subwoofer that has a loud and clean bass response. The subwoofer also has a built in receiver and amplifier that will power the 5 wall mounted speakers. 
The subwoofer has Bluetooth built in as well as USB and SD playback. There are also 2 sets of RCA sux inputs to connect any other audio devices to this system. There are also 6 DVD inputs to allow you to integrate with a DVD player. 
The main goal when developing this item was to get the best sound quality. This item delivers. The sound is very well-tuned and balanced. This has 800 watts peak output and when you crank the volume it gets extremely loud! The best part is that even at max volume there is no noticeable distortion. The sound is clean at all volume levels.

features: 【180°Rotatable Design & 130'' Giant Screen】 Experience the ultimate flexibility with the Mentech mini Projector’s 180°rotatable design, enabling projection onto any surface, including ceilings, without the need for fixed installation. Enjoy a massive 130'' screen, turning any space into an immersive theater. With a long-lasting light source of up to 50,000 hours, it’s perfect for movies, gaming, and sports.

【Native 720P | Support 4K Decoding | 200ANSI Lumens | 10000:1 Contrast Ratio】The Mentech portable projector supports 4k decoding (please make sure to connect 4K devices such as TV sticks via HDMI. With native 1280x720 resolution, 1080P support, 200 ANSI lumens 8500 lumens brightness, and a 10000:1 contrast ratio, you’ll get sharp, detailed visuals and vivid colors.

【Built-in Android 11 & Dual-Band WiFi 6】 Experience seamless entertainment with our smart projector, featuring a built-in Android 11 operating system for instant access to a vast array of content without needing extra devices. Stay ahead with the latest tech and software updates, ensuring future compatibility. This small projector built-in dual-band 2.4/5G WiFi 6 ensures reduced latency and enhanced responsiveness, perfect for video conferencing and real-time applications, delivering smoother, more immersive experiences.

【Mini Low Noise & Built-in Speaker & Bluetooth 5.2】 Weighing just 0.99 lbs and roughly the size of a can, this portable projector is incredibly portable. The integrated speakers deliver clear audio, and Bluetooth 5.2 allows wireless connections to external speakers or headphones for a clutter-free setup and enhanced sound quality.

【Multiple Compatibility & Advanced cooling system】 It features HDMI, USB, and audio ports for easy connectivity with laptops, Switch, iPad, TV Stick, USB flash drives, and more.Designed with a unique cooling system, this tv projector operates quietly at below 25 dB, providing a peaceful viewing environment. Package includes: projector, remote control (batteries not included), manual, power cord, and HD cable.

【Software Updates】On July 15, 2024, we released a software update to improve performance. Updates are automatically pushed via OTA when connected to the internet. If you haven’t received the update, contact our customer support for assistance.
