title: Power Recliner Chair Set of 2 Overstuffed Home Theater Seating w/Heat Massage Faux Leather Movie Gaming Sofa Reclining Sleeper Chair w/LED Light/Lumbar Pillow/USB Port/Cup Holders/Pockets
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Home & Kitchen › Furniture › Living Room Furniture › Chairs
features: Classic Wingback Design for Any Decors. The faux leather electric recliner chair features a wingback design, with luxurious and exquisite details. It is perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, and theater rooms. The chair provides comfort with its cushioned support and padded armrests that envelop you in a cozy feeling

Home Theater Seats with LED Light. No matter what type of home theater seating you have in mind, creating the right ambiance is crucial for your space. Electric recliners with LED lights bring a touch of brightness in the dark, allowing you to experience the feeling of a home theater at all times. The two built-in cup holders are perfect for holding your drinks, providing a dinner theater experience at home. Two large side pockets can be used to store books or other items, saving space

Full-Body Vibration & Lumbar Heat. This power reclining sofa chair is equipped with 8 vibration points and a lumbar heating point. It offers 5 modes and 2 intensity levels for you to customize the most suitable combination. These features can help alleviate muscle soreness and fatigue, which is suitable for relaxation and recovery after long hours of work (Please note that the heating function can be used separately)

Built-in USB Port. We have designed the control center on the outside of the armrest so that it doesn't obstruct your movement while you connect your USB charger. This powerful home theater recliner allows you to charge your tablet or phone while relaxing at home or in the office. You don't have to worry about your phone or electronic devices running out of battery, which is convenient for your long-term use (Note: The USB port is ONLY suitable for low-power devices such as iPhone and iPad.)

Easy To Assemble. There are detailed installation instructions inside the box. The installation of the electric recliner is very simple, and each chair takes about 10 minutes. If you have any questions, our 24/7 professional service team will provide you with a solution within 24 hours

inStockText: In Stock

features: 【𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐜 𝐖𝐨𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐧 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐛𝐚𝐫】 The wood grain look of Saiyin sound bar suits a variety of home decoration styles, such as European, modern and retro Style, etc. Soundbar's hand-polished round corner design also adds a touch of sophistication to your living room or bedroom.

【𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐢𝐥𝐤 𝐃𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐇𝐨𝐫𝐧 𝐓𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬&𝐃𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝟑.𝟓'' 𝐖𝐨𝐨𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐬】 The sound becomes cleaner and smoother with the help of the silk dome, and the horn greatly improves the extension of the sound too. Dual 3.5'' woofers produces a richer and powerful bass which give you a wonderful music experience like never before.

【𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬】 Saiyin soundbar supports wireless Bluetooth connection and a variety of wired connections. Sound bar can connect to your streaming device conveniently via the Bluetooth 5.0. Wired connections such as AUX, Optical, TV ARC are also great choices. Optical connection is recommended.

【𝐓𝐡𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐬】 Three equalizer modes(music mode, news mode and movie mode) are pre-set in sound bar, which gives a better viewing experience for different programs. You can switch between the three sound effects through the remote.

【𝐒𝐞𝐭 𝐔𝐩 𝐢𝐧 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬】 The package contains 3.5mm to 3.5mm AUX cable, Optical cable(the HDMI ARC cable is not included) For optical and HDMI ARC connections, please change your TV audio output to PCM. For HDMI ARC connection, please make sure HDMI-ARC and HDMI-CEC (if this option is available) is on. Sound bar dimensions are: 16.5''*5.4''*6.2''(L*H*W)

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
*Frequently Asked Questions: 
Q: When I use apps such as Netflix on the TV, the soundbar has no sound.
A: Does not support Dolby and DTS, please kindly disable the Dolby and DTS on your TVs, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, HBO, Hulu, Youtube, and other streaming video APPs. 
Q: How to quickly disconnect the current Bluetooth device connected by Soundbar?
A: Press and hold the BT button for about 2 seconds to disconnect the current Bluetooth device. 
Q: If the remote is broken, how do I get a replacement?
A: We can provide you with a free remote replacement. We can help you with any product questions. 
*Please Note: 
The IR code of remote control is not compatible with universal or TV remotes. Free replacement remotes can be provided lifetime.
For optical connections, please change your TV audio output to optical, and change the audio format setting to PCM. Please make sure the protective caps at the ends of the optical cable are removed before plugging it in.
HDMI ARC Cable is not supplied. Optical connection is recommended.
HDMI ARC for TV connection only, not for PC, monitor or DVD/Blu-ray player.
For Optical/HDMI ARC connections, please change your TV audio output to Optical/HDMI ARC, and change the audio format setting to PCM.

From the manufacturer
SA-SW5 
Amplify your entertainment with powerful, booming bass 
Wireless Subwoofer for BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 and STR-AN1000. 
Add powerful bass 
Experience powerful cinematic sound taken to a new level with the SA-SW5 premium subwoofer. This subwoofer is specifically designed to pair with BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 and STR-AN1000 to enhance the home theater experience. 
Direct wireless connection 
The SA-SW5 wireless subwoofer makes a Bluetooth connection with BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 & STR-AN1000. so that the subwoofer can be placed in the most desirable locations without the hassle or worry that worry that long, winding wires bring. 
Deep, explosive bass 
With deep bass sound from a powerful 180mm driver and passive radiator, this subwoofer boosts the impact of everything you watch and listen to. Enjoy booming explosions and the deepest beats you've ever heard without distortion. 
Σ Magnetic Circuit for deep, powerful bass 
The Σ Magnetic Circuit enables deep powerful bass by maximizing the magnetic force that drives the voice coil. Separated Notch Edge improves vertical amplitude symmetry, resulting in clear sound quality. 
Omnidirectional Block Design 
Sophisticated round edges represent a single solid block of room-filling sound. The rich materials and minimalist design fits seamlessly into any living room environment. 
Set up in seconds 
SA-SW5 wireless subwoofer is built specifically for use with the BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 and STR-AN1000. setup is quick and easy. Simply power up and connect to supported Audio Products.

Experience wireless convenience and audio clarity like never before. Your ultimate sound experience awaits. 
Sound Unleashed 
Powered by WiSA technology. Unmatched in its wireless capabilities, WiSA delivers a superior audio experience that Bluetooth can't compete with, ensuring zero compression, ultra-low latency, and high fidelity. With WiSA, enjoy the purest form of audio, crafted for those who accept no compromises. Sit back, relax, and just chill with the finest sound that has no equal 
	
Gain Complete Control 
Gain complete control of your audio experience. Seamlessly adjust settings with your TV remote or dive deeper and fine-tune to perfection with the WiSA app. Your sound, your way. 
	
Experience the Joy Your Entertainment 
Hear the spaceships over your head, feel the rush of the dragons through the air, and feel like rain and snow are falling all around you. No simple soundbar can match surround sound. 
	
Set up Monaco in minutes. 
Step 1

Step 2

Step 3

features: 7.1Ch Smart Surround Sound System: The Ultimea Poseidon D80, a premium smart soundbar upgraded from the acclaimed D60, features 2 additional front surround speakers to provide a wider sound field and a more enveloping soundscape. With 8 high-performance drivers, including a powerful 6.5” wireless subwoofer, D80 creates an immersive 3D surround experience. (Note: The D80 does not support DTS decoding.)

Dolby Atmos Creates True Three-dimensional Soundscape: The Poseidon D80 is not a simple copy of 2.0 channel stereo audio to surround speakers; it dynamically adapts using Dolby Atmos technology. Whether you’re watching a movie or streaming your favorite show, built-in 3D positioning algorithms precisely place each audio element around you, crafting a full 360° sound environment that puts you right in the middle of the action. Experience sound as it was meant to be heard.

2 Pioneering Technologies: The sound bar for smart tv equipped with 2 rear and 2 front speakers, ensuring precise sound projection from the front, back, and sides, enhancing audio spatiality and immersion. Advanced SurroundX System and 360° Aural Spatial Localization Technology algorithms accurately position elements throughout your room, custom-designed waveguides project sound from wall to wall, so you feel like you’re at the center of the story.

1-in/1-out 4K HDMI with eARC: Streamline your setup with high-speed, high-bandwidth 4K HDMI connectivity featuring eARC. Switch effortlessly between gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, and TV sets, all while enjoying crystal-clear audio. For older devices, the Poseidon D80 includes additional optical and AUX inputs, ensuring compatibility across the board.

Smart Control at Your Fingertips: With the ULTIMEA Smart App, elevate your listening experience by customizing your sound system to match your style. The app not only meets all your audio needs but also keeps your soundbar up to date with regular OTA upgrades. This means your Poseidon D80 is always equipped with the latest features for a superior audio experience.

Precision Audio Tuning Redefined: Tailor your audio experience like never before with the ULTIMEA App. It offers 121 expert EQ presets across genres like Bass, Pop, Classical, and Rock, plus 10-band and 6 tailored EQ modes including Movie, Music, Voice, Sport, Game, and Night. title: Sony VPL-XW5000ES 4K HDR Laser Home Theater Projector with Native 4K SXRD Panel, Black
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
description: Bring true 4K HDR entertainment to your home with the VPL-XW5000ES, a native 4K laser projector with 2,000 lumens of high brightness and a compact, cost-effective design. Our newly developed technologies, including the all-new Native 4K SXRD panel, delivers a wide dynamic range, high resolution, and vivid color, even if you're watching in a well-lit space.
features: Up to 2,000 lumens of brightness, generated by a long-lasting laser light source, for vibrant images even on a large screen.
All-new Native 4K SXRD panel provides full 4K resolution with 3,840 x 2,160 pixels
Flagship-level X1 Ultimate for projector brings you the best of Sony’s image processing
Ultra-pure and reliable laser light source, which lets you enjoy perfectly clear 4K pictures at optimal brightness for up to 20,000 uninterrupted hours.
See over a billion colors come to life with TRILUMINOS PRO. Our unique TRILUMINOS PRO algorithm can detect color from saturation, hue, and brightness to reproduce natural shades in every detail.
Enjoy spectacular brightness and stunning realism, thanks to new Wide Dynamic Range Optics that achieve a 95% DCI-P3 wide color gamut and 2,000-lumen high brightness.

Our new Wide Dynamic Range Optics contribute to a compact design with better light control by maximizing the potential of the laser light source. The resulting higher color volume means naturally colorful images, even at high brightness levels, and stunning, immersive contrast.
This laser projector is about 20% smaller in volume and about 30% lighter than the VPL-VW915ES—with a new modern exterior designed to blend into any room
The powerful video processor in the VPL-XW5000ES offers Motionflow for smooth and clear motion, even when viewing 4K content.
The VPL-XW5000ES supports 4K 60 Hz input with an input lag under 21 ms, and 2K 120 Hz input with an input lag under 13 ms.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
About us 
In the late 20th century, Pyle established itself as a premium source for replacement speakers and car audio. By the year 2000, Pyle had undergone a massive transformation, expanding into the nascent market spaces of competitive car audio, home audio, marine audio, and professional audio & musical instruments - our Pyle Pro line. As you sit in your car, you are isolated from outside noise and surrounded by speakers. You become enveloped in sound. We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. You’d be surprised at how much better your music can sound with an upgrade from the factory speakers and amplifier. 
Pyle Car: 
We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. And we don’t just focus on audio at Pyle Car. Cars are a big part of our lives, and we offer a variety of products and accessories that can enhance your experience and turn your car into a modern media system on wheels, including navigation systems, DVD players, and iPod interfaces. At Pyle, we also care about your safety. That’s why we’ve also got a full line of rear and front-facing cameras that can be wired to a monitor in your car – so you can park in those tight spots or see around corners with ease. 
Pyle Home: 
Start with your home theater, a stalwart of any modern house. We’ve got projectors, TVs, mounts, and stands, just to get started – all fully equipped with state-of-the-art HD technology, compatible with beautiful video game consoles like Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Wii, as well as your favorite Blu-Ray players, for crisp, hi-res images that explode in your eye on a mind-blowing scale. Of course, Pyle Home also carries all the cables and adaptors you need for a fully operational setup that’s sure to be the envy of your neighbors. 
There’s plenty more to keep you entertained. Bass-expanding mini speakers that run on rechargeable batteries and play your digital music, wherever you go. Perfect for the dorm room or sitting by the pool. Headphones. Vintage turntables – get the look of yesterday’s classic phonographs with today’s high-quality manufacturing standards. Power amplifiers, horn speakers, and waterproof speakers for your garden. Tripods and speaker stands. 
Pyle Pro: 
features a huge range of musical instruments, DJ equipment, and accessories for your every need. All of our products have been designed with the professional in mind. You don't just see or hear the quality - you feel it. And whether you're a hard-working musician, studio engineer, or even a budding amateur, Pyle Pro has something to offer. 
Among Pyle Pro’s most popular items are our PA Systems. Pyle is constantly modernizing these powerful devices to meet the demands of the modern user. Our flagship PAs include wireless microphones, rechargeable batteries, and iPod/iPhone docks. They’re great for use in large areas and events – at churches for weddings, at schools, gyms, birthday parties – anything indoor or outdoor where your voice needs to be heard loud and clear. And they’re easily transportable, thanks to caster wheels and telescoping handles. Use it for any audio – voice, guitar, CD, MP3 player – they handle everything. 
Pyle’s emerging guitar line is also grabbing the attention of the music industry. Models are available in double-cutaway and Les Paul styles, with solid rosewood bodies in a variety of colors. Rounding out Pyle Pro’s line are our USB-to-analog converters, including a 2-channel mixer with USB input and output.

modules.title: About us
modules.text: In the late 20th century, Pyle established itself as a premium source for replacement speakers and car audio. By the year 2000, Pyle had undergone a massive transformation, expanding into the nascent market spaces of competitive car audio, home audio, marine audio, and professional audio & musical instruments - our Pyle Pro line. As you sit in your car, you are isolated from outside noise and surrounded by speakers. You become enveloped in sound. We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. You’d be surprised at how much better your music can sound with an upgrade from the factory speakers and amplifier.

Pyle Car:

Cars are a big part of our lives, and we offer a variety of products and accessories that can enhance your experience and turn your car into a modern media system on wheels, including navigation systems, DVD players, and iPod interfaces. At Pyle, we also care about your safety. Of course, Pyle Home also carries all the cables and adaptors you need for a fully operational setup that’s sure to be the envy of your neighbors. 
There’s plenty more to keep you entertained. Bass-expanding mini speakers that run on rechargeable batteries and play your digital music, wherever you go. aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
CoolEeve Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth! 
Introducing our state-of-the-art projector, designed to bring your presentations, movies, and games to life with stunning clarity and vibrant colors. 
Our projector features high-resolution display, easy connectivity options, and advanced image processing technology, ensuring a seamless and immersive viewing experience. 
Whether you're in a boardroom, classroom, or home theater, our projector is the perfect companion for all your visual needs. 
Say goodbye to dull and blurry projections, and say hello to the future of visual excellence. 
Upgrade to our projector today and see the difference for yourself. 
CoolEeve cutting-edge projector with built-in WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities. 
With seamless wireless connectivity, you can easily stream content from your smartphone, tablet, or laptop, eliminating the hassle of tangled cables. 
The WiFi feature allows for effortless access to online content, while the Bluetooth connectivity enables convenient pairing with external speakers or other devices. 
Enjoy the freedom to project your favorite media with ease and convenience, making this projector the perfect choice for modern presentations, entertainment, and more. 
Experience the next level of versatility and connectivity with our WiFi and Bluetooth-enabled projector. 
Our projector offers versatile installation options to suit your specific needs. 
Whether you prefer desktop mounting for easy access and portability, ceiling mounting for a streamlined and space-saving setup, or bracket mounting for a secure and stable display, our projector can be effortlessly configured to accommodate your preferred installation method. 
With its adaptable design, you have the flexibility to customize the placement of the projector to best suit your environment, ensuring a seamless and optimized viewing experience. 
Enjoy the convenience and freedom to install our projector in the manner that best fits your requirements! 
CoolEeve versatile projector is the ultimate companion for a wide range of activities and events. 
Whether you're hosting an outdoor sports viewing party, enjoying a movie night under the stars, or giving a professional presentation at work, our projector is the perfect solution. 
Its portable design makes it easy to take anywhere, while its high-quality display ensures crisp and clear images in any setting. Additionally, it makes an ideal gift for friends and family who appreciate the latest in entertainment technology. 
With its ability to adapt to various usage scenarios, our projector is the go-to choice for all your projection needs!

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
SMOOTH, CLEAR HDMI 2.1 WITH 8K 
We're setting the bar for reference sound while bringing 8K video to your compatible display over HDMI 2.1 with 8K and eARC. Now your system is ready for the clearest and cleanest picture available, supporting a range of high video resolutions and refresh rates including 8K60, 4K120 and Dynamic HDR formats. 
8K delivers an immersive viewing experience with 4 times as many pixels as 4k at 2x the horizontal and vertical resolution. And combined with a 60Hz refresh rate the TX-NR6050 enables smooth, sharp viewing of any high-speed action. 
MULTI-ZONE CAPABILITY 
Set up ultra high-definition* entertainment in two different rooms with the same source, or two different UHD sources in two different rooms with your Onkyo receiver*. Watch a movie in the home theater room while the kids watch cartoons in their playroom.* 
ULTIMATE 4K GAMING EXPERIENCE 
Own your opponents with HDMI 2.1 enhancements for gamers: 4K/120Hz HDR pass-through enables ultra-fast motion -VRR (Variable Refresh Rate) eliminates lag, stutter, and frame-tearing for fluid gameplay. - ALLM (Auto Low Latency Mode) optimizes latency from source to screen - QFT (Quick Frame Transport) limits lag for a smoother experience. 
DOLBY ATMOS 
Dolby Atmos and DTS:X wrap the audience in the latest films and games by moving audio effects from speaker to speaker. No surrounds? No problem – use the Dolby Atmos Height Virtualizer to ensure a more immersive listening experience, creating a virtual surround and height effect from traditional speaker layouts. 
STREAMING & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE 
Access to Spotify, TIDAL, Deezer, TuneIn, and Pandora are built into the system. Use dedicated apps (where available) or the free Onkyo Control App for Apple and Android devices to find and play music. The TX-NR6050 also easily integrates into your existing Smart Home ecosystem, including Apple Airplay, Alexa, Google apps, and more. You get a highly capable and compatible network device that can operate seamlessly in your multi-room ecosystem.

title: Monoprice 5.1 Channel Home Theater Satellite Speakers And Subwoofer - Black
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Surround Sound Systems
description: Get everything you need for a great sounding home theater speaker setup in a single box! You get four satellite speakers and a center channel speaker for the mid- and high-range audio signals, plus an 8-Inch powered subwoofer to handle the low frequencies. All the speakers come with an attractive black finish and convenient spring-loaded signal connectors. The center speakers use two 3-Inch shielded mid-range cones, while the satellites employ one 3-Inch cone and a 1/2-Inch dome tweeter. However, don't let the small size fool you! These 8 ohm speakers will handle up to 125 watts of power from your home theater receiver at frequencies from 150 Hz to 20 kHz. The subwoofer is powered by a 60 watt (RMS) amplifier, driving a downward firing 8-Inch cone. It can take either line or speaker-level inputs, so can be used with any amplifier, even older amps without dedicated subwoofer outputs. The subwoofer handles frequencies between 50 Hz to 250 Hz and includes adjustable crossover frequency and volume balance controls. Also included in the box are four C brackets for mounting the satellite speakers to the wall and the necessary hardware for mounting the speakers to the brackets. A pair of plastic feet to properly orient the face of the center speaker is also included. Note that you will need to provide your own hardware for mounting the C brackets to the wall or other vertical surface. Don't let the low price fool you! This speaker system sounds great and will fill your room with high-quality, full-spectrum sound! Note: The speaker wire connectors on each unit comfortably accept a maximum 16 gauge speaker wire. For best results use pin-type speaker plugs to make the speaker connections and banana or pin-type plugs to connect the wires to your amplifier.
features: Surround yourself in high-fidelity with the Monoprice 5.1-channel Home Theater Speaker System!

This speaker system features four satellite speakers and a center channel speaker for the mid- and high-range audio signals, plus an 8" powered subwoofer to handle the low frequencies. All the speakers come with an attractive black finish and convenient spring-loaded signal connectors.

The center speakers use two 3" shielded mid-range cones, while the satellites employ one 3" cone and a 1/2" dome tweeter. However, don't let the small size fool you! These 8 ohm speakers will handle up to 125 watts of power from your home theater receiver at frequencies from 150 Hz to 20 kHz.

The subwoofer is powered by a 60 watt (RMS) amplifier, driving a downward firing 8" cone. It can take either line or speaker-level inputs, so can be used with any amplifier, even older amps without dedicated subwoofer outputs. The subwoofer handles frequencies between 50 Hz to 250 Hz and includes adjustable crossover frequency and volume balance controls.

Also included in the box are four C brackets for mounting the satellite speakers to the wall and the necessary hardware for mounting the speakers to the brackets. A pair of plastic feet to properly orient the face of the center speaker is also included. Note that you will need to provide your own hardware for mounting the C brackets to the wall or other vertical surface.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Monoprice 5.1 Channel Home Theater Satellite Speakers And Subwoofer - Black 
This headphone amplifier features a USB input and a professional level Texas Instruments Digital to Analog Converter (DAC), effectively replacing your sound card without requiring you to open your PC and installing a new card. The high-current output allows it to drive headphones with a wide range of impedances, from 16 ohms to 600 ohms. 
The RCA line outputs allow you to send the output to a stereo amplifier or powered speakers for those times when you don't want to use headphones. A set of RCA line inputs allows you to connect an external audio source, such as a CD player, so you can enjoy the advantages of the high-current headphone output with other audio sources.

modules.text:
This headphone amplifier features a USB input and a professional level Texas Instruments Digital to Analog Converter (DAC), effectively replacing your sound card without requiring you to open your PC and installing a new card. The high-current output allows it to drive headphones with a wide range of impedances, from 16 ohms to 600 ohms. 
The RCA line outputs allow you to send the output to a stereo amplifier or powered speakers for those times when you don't want to use headphones. A set of RCA line inputs allows you to connect an external audio source, such as a CD player, so you can enjoy the advantages of the high-current headphone output with other audio sources.

description: Complete Home Theater System! In the old days a home theater system consisted of many speakers, a subwoofer, a receiver, an equalizer, wires all over the place, a separate radio module and lots of other devices. Introducing the Rockville TM80B home theater system! You will not need to purchase anything else. This has everything built in! Each tower speaker has a tweeter, (2) full range speakers, and a 8" subwoofer built in. These have Bluetooth, USB, SD, FM radio, and all of the inputs and outputs you will ever need. We also added (2) " mic inputs so you can use these for karaoke. But is the sound good? Includes a noise rejection cable to connect the 2 speakers together (This is a proprietary cable we use that connects the 2 speakers together without any unwanted noise). We also use a special cable tip that will not allow the user to plug the cable in backwards. title: Small Subwoofer Home Theater for TV Surround System 5 Wired Speakers Amplifier 4 inch Woofer Built-in Receiver Support HDMI ARC Optical Bluetooth Input for Projector
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Television & Video › Home Theater Systems
features: Our home theater system speakers. Equipped with a 4-inch subwoofer and a built-in receiver, these speakers offer exceptional sound quality and powerful bass, all while maintaining high volume levels. Experience professional-level audio performance optimized for your entertainment needs. Small sound systems are compact and designed to fit well in small spaces. This flexibility of surround sound system allows you to optimize the sound quality based on the room you are in.

Surround Sound System is the perfect solution for immersive audio in a small apartment or small room. This compact and versatile audio setup offers a dynamic and balanced sound experience that will elevate your entertainment and listening activities to new heights, all while fitting seamlessly into limited space. For such a small speaker system it works amazing it's light compact and loud perfect for TVs, computers, projectors.

The Surround Sound unit consists of a central speaker, 2 front speakers, 2 rear speakers, and a main speaker/ subwoofer, creating a multi-channel audio configuration that reproduces audio from all directions. It connects to Bluetooth hassle free and are very loud with great sound quality in every speaker. This setup provides a realistic and enveloping soundstage, making you feel like you are right in the middle of the action, whether you are watching movies, playing games, or listening to music.

Despite its compact size, the home theater sound system delivers powerful and clear sound quality, with crisp highs, rich midrange, and deep lows. The combination of multiple speakers and a subwoofer ensures that every sound detail is reproduced with precision, creating a truly immersive audio experience that will enhance your enjoyment of all types of media. The home theater sound system can be placed strategically around your small or medium-size room to optimize audio dispersion and create the perfect listening environment. This product for a small studio or apartment setting, not too powerful but just right for the size.

EASY TO CONNECT AND SET UP Step 1: Wired Connection - 5 small speakers with built-in cables are wired to connect to the "AUDIO OUTPUT" slots of the Subwoofer. (NOT wireless). Step 2: Test the System to Make Sure it Set Up Properly - Turn on the subwoofer which is under the power supply, and test the remote control and Bluetooth connection (Connect Bluetooth named "Bobtot B38" on "BT" mode) to ensure everything is working properly.

Step 3: Connect with the External Device - Choose Input Mode and Connect with the Correct Cable, connect the subwoofer to your device (such as TV) via the matching audio cables (included). Connect the cable to the correct "AUDIO INPUT" Slot of the subwoofer and choose the "INPUT" mode you want to use.

Product Description
Home stereo system with 5.1 surround sound speakers 
5.1 home theater system speakers, delivering an impressive 200W of peak power. Bluetooth speaker with a built-in receiver subwoofer. The surround sound speakers offer exceptional sound quality and powerful bass. Experience professional-level audio performance optimized for home stereo system. 
With a comprehensive setup 
Bobtot surround sound systems, elevate your home theater experience to new heights. Surround sound system for tv, projector, pc, DVC ect. Each speaker is equipped with a long built-in cable, allowing you to position them anywhere in your room to create the perfect surround sound experience. 
Previous page
Next page
Bobtot 5.1 Surround Sound System for TV. From thunderous explosions to delicate whispers, this system captures the nuances and delivers them to your ears with fidelity. 5.1 and 2.1 channel, easily switch between them using the convenient remote control or the front panel on the subwoofer. 
Amplifier Channels 	5.1 / 2.1 	
Dolby Vision/4K HDR Pass-Throu 	No

Dimensions (L X W X H) 	Subwoofer Size:(W*D*H) 5.51" x 12.32" x 10.15"; 5 Satellite Speaker Size:(W*D*H) 3.54"x3.74"x5.11"; Box size: 17.1"*14"*13.3", weight: 15 lbs. 	
Will this work with a Bluetooth projector? 
Yes, the surround sound system would work with a Bluetooth projector. If the projector has no BT function, it still can work via wired connection, just need to connect with an AUX to RCA cable(included). Switch the INPUT to the proper mode. 
Will this work with the new smart fire TV or Roku smart tv? 
Yes, it is compatible with universal TV with the match ports. You may need the correct cable to connect the home system speaker with your TV. 
If I play music on Bluetooth will it cast from all speakers? 
Yes, it would cast from all Home theater system speakers. Please setup your unit first, first connect the 5 wired speakers to the subwoofer. And select BT mode by press INPUT on the subwoofer. 
Will these speakers work with other receivers? 
This 5.1 surround sound system has a built-in receiver, you don't need to connect another external one.

title: Auto Focus Projector, VOPLLS 4K Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, Native 1080P Outdoor Home Theater Movie Projector, Auto 6D Keystone, Compatible with HDMl, USB, AV, Smartphone/Tablet/Laptop (25000L)
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
features: 【Native 1080P, 4K Supported, 700 ANSI Brightness】With 700 ANSI brightness and native 1080P resolution to support 4K film playback. Its 20000:1 high contrast ratio allows for the presentation of delicate image details on a massive 300-inch projection screen. The VOPLLS 4k projector delivers at least 95% more brightness and clarity than other 1080P projectors. You can enjoy the awesome visual experience of projection anytime, anywhere, day or night, at home, outdoors or in a business meeting.

【Innovative Auto Focus & Keystone Correction】The home theater projector is equipped with autofocus, auto 6D keystone correction, automatic obstacle avoidance and automatic screen fit (off by default). State-of-the-art AI focus and displacement gyroscope technology detects in real time and automatically corrects within 3 seconds to ensure images remain sharp. Automatically adapts to any wall surface, eliminating placement restrictions and bringing flexibility to front/side/ceiling projection.

【Achieve Zero-Latency 2.4G/5G Dual-Band WiFi Connection】The Wifi 6 projector is compatible with both 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks, seamlessly connecting to your mobile phone or computer to ensure instant and stable transmission.Wifi6 is faster, smoother and lower latency compared to 5G network, which greatly enhances the gaming and the wireless projection experience, especially during Switch/PS4/5/X-box gaming. Outdoor Projector is perfect for those who love the big screen movie/gaming experience.

【Upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 & Hi-fi Stereo Sound】VOPLLS video projector with built-in hi-fi stereo speakers. The unique sealed core technology reduces noise by up to 80% for a 360-degree home theatre sound experience. In addition, bluetooth projector can also connect to external speakers or use it as a standalone speaker via Bluetooth 5.2. The upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 chip transmits stable audio more efficiently and minimises damage to the sound quality.

【Wide Compatibility & Professional Tech Support】VOPLLS Movie projector is equipped with AV/USB*2/HDMI*2/audio ports for easy connection to mobile phones/computers/TV sticks/switches. Office documents such as PPT, EXCEL and WORD can be played from USB stick or laptop in a slightly dim environment. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will respond quickly within 24 hours and provide professional after-sales technical support.

【NOTE】Make sure to connect 4K devices (such as a TV stick) via HDMI to play the video. Tip: Videos labelled as 4K will be displayed at the original resolution of 1080P. As mentioned in the text, "4K supported".

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
RIOWOIS Passive Bookshelf Speakers for Record Player 
"Dynamic Wood Grain Appearance: Transforms with Changing Light" 
RIOWOIS bookshelf speakers boast a sturdy MDF build and a distinctive wood grain finish that brings an air of elegance and sophistication to any space. Moreover, this special wood grain's appearance transforms with varying lighting and angles, creating a visually captivating effect.
"Special 3D Wood Grain Appearance: 3D Touch Experience" 
When you run your fingers over the wood grain, you can feel the ridges and grooves of the texture, which can be a satisfying sensory experience. The wood grain finish also help to reduce fingerprints and smudges on the bookshelf speaker's surface, as the texture helps to hide any marks or blemishes.
"Compact But Powerful" 
Speaker Dimensions: 6.6*4.7*4.3 inch
RIOWOI passive bookshelf speakers enhances audio with 2-inch tweeter and 2.75-inch woofer for fuller sound, clearer dialogue, and deeper bass—all in a compact!
Please note that the speaker wire is not included, and the passive speakers require an amplifier or receiver to function properly.
Super Size Rounded Corners by Manual Polishing 
The four rounded corners on the bookshelf speakers make a bold visual statement, drawing attention to the bookshelf speaker and making it a focal point in any room. Beyond their aesthetic appeal, the rounded corners also serve a practical purpose by reducing diffraction and sound distortion.
The angled edges break up sound waves, resulting in a clearer and more accurate sound. Moreover, the rounded corners enhance the speaker's durability by protecting it from bumps and reducing the risk of scratches or dents.
Wall Mount in Minutes 
In addition to the pair of passive speakers, the package includes all the necessary wall mounting accessories(Screws, wall anchors) including a wall mounting bracket that comes with the speakers, as well as anti-vibration cushions. 
Enjoy Your Favorite Music 
Due to their space-saving advantages, the RIOWOIS passive bookshelf speakers are an ideal choice for desktop computer setups. Simply pair them with an amplifier, and you'll have your very own two-channel desktop audio system.
Please note that the speaker wire and remote is not included, and the passive speakers require an amplifier or receiver to function properly.
Specifications of Bookshelf Speakers 
Impedance: 	6 ohms 	
Rated Power: 	5~20W 	
Maxium Input Power: 	30W(Peak Power) 	
Sound Pressure Level: 	75dB 	
Frequency Response: 	65Hz~20KHz 	
Speaker Dimensions: 	6.6*4.7*4.3 inch 	
Please note 	the speaker wire is not included, and the passive speakers require an amplifier or receiver to function properly.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Rockville BASS BLASTER 10 10" 750w Powered Home Audio Subwoofer Theater Sub+LED 
Description: 
The BASS BLASTER 10 by Rockville is a powered 10" subwoofer perfect for any home theater system or studio application. It will also work for pro audio use in smaller venues. It is built rugged and tough with metal corners, and high quality MDF wood wrapped in a vinyl leather finish. The LED will pulsate to the sound of your music. It also will pulsate to the sounds of gun shots or explosions in a movie or video game. The louder the music the brighter the LED will get. There is also an LED on/off switch on the back of the speaker if you decide you want to turn it off. What is really cool about this is during the day time you can't notice the LED, but when you turn off the lights it is an instant party! This is perfect for movie night, karaoke, and house party's. 
This product uses high grade components from the ground up and delivers clean sound with tight and thumpy bass you can really feel. 
We use a highly efficient class "D" amplifier that is engineered to be perfectly matched with the woofer and enclosure. 
The woofer is top quality with foam surrounds and features a Y30 grade magnet, and a 4-layer voice coil. 
Our subwoofer has RCA inputs and outputs as well as high level speaker inputs and outputs to support any setup.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
STEP 1 
Cut the Speaker Hole 
Use the included cutout template to mark the mounting position. Cut all the way around the circle with a cutting saw. 
	
STEP 2 
Wire the Speaker 
Route the wire to the input connectors. Insert the conductor into each spring loaded connector. 
	
STEP 3 
Install the Speaker 
Insert the speaker into the hole until the frame is flush with the ceiling. Tighten all four screws to mount the speaker. 
	
STEP 4 
Attach the Grill 
Install the grill by simply pushing it evenly into the hole until it snaps in place.

How to access Netflix/Prime Video/YouTube of this video projector? 
WiMiUS K9 movie projector equiped with officially-licensed Netflix/Prime Video/YouTube. No need for TV stick anymore,simply access these apps quickly with hotkeys on the remote control. 
How about this movie projector's sound quality? 
The WiMiUS K9 WiFi Bluetooth projector featuring built-in authentic Dolby Sound. With Dolby Audio, rain in a movie sounds like it’s actually falling on your roof, we make the sound you hear more spacious and true to life. 
Is it unable to automatically adjust the keystone correction? 
If the keystone setting is set to Auto and it is out of the standard projection angle (front/ceiling 20 degrees), proper correction may not be possible. In this case, please check the installation status of the product and the projection angle.

From the manufacturer
SA-SW3 
Add deep, rich bass to your home theater 
Wireless Subwoofer for BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 and STR-AN1000. 
Add deep rich sound 
The SA-SW3 subwoofer is designed to pair to Sony’s BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 and STR-AN1000 to further the immersive sound experience 
Direct wireless connection 
The SA-SW3 wireless subwoofer makes a Bluetooth connection with the Sony’s BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 9, BAR 8, QUAD), HT-A9, HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000 and STR-AN1000 so that the subwoofer can be placed in the most desirable locations without the hassle or worry that long, winding wires bring. 
Rich, deep bass 
With deep bass sound from a powerful 160mm driver, this bass reflex subwoofer boosts the impact of everything you watch and listen to. Feel the deep rumble of thunder and heavy bass beats without distortion. 
Σ Magnetic Circuit for deep, powerful bass 
The Σ Magnetic Circuit enables deep powerful bass by maximizing the magnetic force that drives the voice coil. Separated Notch Edge improves vertical amplitude symmetry, resulting in clear sound quality. 
Omnidirectional Block Design 
Sophisticated round edges represent a single solid block of room-filling sound. The rich materials and minimalist design fits seamlessly into any living room environment. 
Set up in seconds

title: Bose CineMate GS Series II Digital Home Theater Speaker System
inStockText: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.  Only 6 left in stock - order soon.  Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Television & Video › Home Theater Systems
description: From the ManufacturerBose® CineMate® GS Series II home theater systemThe best CineMate system from Bose delivers dramatic audio for your HDTV and existing video sourcesThe best CineMate system from Bose delivers dramatic audio for your HDTV and existing video sourcesPremium Gemstone speakers, the smallest 2.1-channel speakers from BosePremium Gemstone speakers, the smallest 2.1-channel speakers from BoseUniversal remote controls the system and most components connected to your TVUniversal remote controls the system and most components connected to your TVSimplified setup, with only a few connections to makeSimplified setup, with only a few connections to make The simplest way to add dramatic Bose home theater performance to your HDTVBring your favorite movies, shows, games and music to life with the Bose CineMate GS II system. Two powerful yet compact Gemstone speakers provide wide, immersive sound, while a hideaway Acoustimass module delivers deep notes for a more dramatic home theater experience. Proprietary TrueSpace® technology creates spacious, multichannel sound. The system connects easily to your HDTV, and you can control all your entertainment sources with a programmable universal remote. Gemstone speakers are the smallest, most powerful 2.1-channel speakers from Bose. A small interface module houses the audio input from your TV and displays on/off status for your system. Digital 5.1 decoding provides improved realism from 5.1-encoded DVDs, DBS or HDTV. Combine that with Proprietary Videostage® 5 decoding and post-processing circuitry, and you'll enjoy a high quality, multichannel surround sound experience from almost any source—such as DVDs, stereo CDs and MP3 discs.  Gemstone speakersThe smallest, most powerful 2.1-channel speakers for a CineMate system. Patented Gemstone speaker array design works in concert with TrueSpace digital surround processing circuitry to deliver the exciting depth and resonance of home theater sound.  Acoustimass modulePatented Bose design produces low frequencies for all channels, with no audible distortion. Small size allows you to place it out of the way, so the sound seems to come directly from Gemstone speakers. The Acoustimass module works in concert with the small speakers to deliver the full range of home theater sound.  Proprietary TrueSpace digital processing circuitryDelivers a spacious, multichannel sound experience with strong center imaging from just two visible speakers and a hideaway Acoustimass module.Interface moduleHouses two LED indicators and connectors for your audio input. Receives IR commands for speakers, connects directly to your TV and provides on/off information.Universal infrared remoteDelivers seamless system operation and controls most video components attached to your TV.Easy system setupJust four simple connections—eliminates the guesswork of more complex systems. The interface module (front and back views) receives infrared commands for your system. It has connectors for your audio input and connects directly to your TV. Videostage 5 decoding and post-processing circuitryProprietary technology, combined with digital 5.1 decoding, delivers a high quality, multichannel surround sound experience from DVDs, CDs and MP3 discs.Product Dimensions CineMate GS II speaker arrays: 2.5 x 5.5 x 4.1 inches ; 1.0 pound Acoustimass Module: 14.5 x 8.8 x 19.1 inches ; 23.3 pounds Interface module: 1.1 x 3.3 x 2.2 inches ; 0.99 pounds Shipping dimensions: 12.88 x 19.63 x 24.25 inches ; 31.58 pounds  The CineMate GS system delivers a level of realism that can't be matched by TV speakers alone. SSCS3 
3-way 4-driver Floor-Standing Speaker System-Sold Individually 
Experience authentic, full-frequency audio with this versatile three-way coaxial, four-driver speaker system. The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Experience the latest in cinematic sound innovation in the comfort of your home 
5.12 in Woofer boosts low end frequencies 
This speaker system incorporates a newly developed 5.12 in woofer for deep, stable bass. Utilizing a foamed mica-cellular diaphragm, it produces both powerful bass and the finer detail required for clear vocals and dialog in the mid-range. 
Tapered faceplate edges keep sound clear 
Eliminating unnecessary noise from the baffle board and cabinet is essential for a high quality performance. With slightly tapered faceplate edges, edge diffraction is suppressed for a clear and natural soundstage. 
High-Resolution Audio 
Take your digital music collection to another level with High-Resolution Audio. 
Mica Reinforced Cellular cone 
Mica Reinforced Cellular (MRC) fiber woofers are rigid, holding their shape even when moving at high pressure and speed. 
Super tweeters 
These speakers include super tweeters with wide directionality. High-frequency notes are reproduced precisely across an expansive soundstage. 
High precision tweeter 
The 0.98 in soft dome main tweeter features polyester fiber for a more faithful, authentic sound.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer

Yamaha knows music. 
As the world's largest musical instrument manufacturer and home theater innovator, Yamaha knows how to make your TV, movies and music sound their absolute best. 
Powered Subwoofer 
NS-SW100 
Excellent Bass for Movies and Music. 
This subwoofer incorporates a number of Yamaha advanced, high-performance bass technologies, such as Twisted Flare Port, Advanced YST II (Yamaha Active Servo Technology II) with discrete amp circuitry and a high-quality 10" woofer unit. The resulting bass response is powerfully rich and impactful. 
New Twisted Flare Port contributes to clear and tight bass 
Advanced YST II (Yamaha Active Servo Technology II) 
10” Cone woofer 
Stylish addition to any room 
Clear and Tight Bass 
The new Twisted Flare Port takes advantage of extensive subwoofer development experience. The gently twisting flared shape creates a smooth flow of air around the edge of the port versus the turbulent air flow around a conventional port. This reduces extraneous noise not present in the original input signal and provides clear, accurate low frequency reproduction. From special effect sounds in movies to the atmosphere of a live venue, you hear bass that is clear, tight and realistic. 
Deep Lows 
Developed by Yamaha, the Advanced YST II (Yamaha Active Servo Technology II) combines negative-impedance and constant-current principles to drive the speaker cone with even tighter control than the previous version. Using Advanced Negative Impedance Converter (ANIC) circuits, this system dynamically optimizes effective speaker impedance to maintain excellent linearity. This means more stable and accurate low range response, not to mention higher sound quality. 
More than a Black Box 
The gently rounded form with a slanted front surface is stylishly elegant. Designed to be unobtrusive, it’s sure to look beautiful in a living room or home theater room and will match a wide range of speaker systems. More than a black box, it’s the heartbeat of your home theater system.

The power amplifier is connected correctly, why is there noise such as electric current? 
Please check whether there is current sound when no load. And confirm that the surrounding current signals will not cause interference. Please make sure all the cable completely pushed into the device, incompletely connections will create distorted. 
Can bluetooth function and wired connection be used simultaneously? 
Please note that the Bluetooth function and the wired function cannot be used at the same time, so when you want to use the amplifier via the Bluetooth function, do not connect any devices to the jacks (except the microphone jack). 
Can you connect two devices with bluetooth? 
No, connecting two at the same time will cause the audio stream to be disrupted. It can only be disconnected and then connected to other devices. 
If you find that the Bluetooth connection is unstable, you can try the following steps to solve it. 
Make sure there are no obstacles (especially metals) blocking the signal. Turn off the power amplifier, disconnect and clear the connection of the Bluetooth transmitting device, and try to reconnect. 
Why only one channel work ? Is it defective? 
Since the amplifier is not used alone, it needs to be used together with other electronic equipment, so it needs to be ruled out one by one! Are the positive and negative wires connected to the speaker connected together?

Designed for the way you live, LG televisions (the world's most intelligent TVs), audio and video technology can truly make life good. And whether you love movies, sports, the latest TV shows, documentaries, indie films, music, or podcasts, creating the home theater that delivers your favorite entertainment flawlessly has never been easier. From OLED and NanoCell TVs with amazing picture quality and super-smart LG ThinQ® AI, to sound bars that deliver the ultimate in surround audio, our home electronics collection gives you the power to create a cinematic experience in your living room, your den, or wherever you like to kick back and watch your favorite entertainment. Discover some of the ways that LG home theater technology will transform your space. LG TelevisionsWhether you choose an 8K or 4K OLED TV, or a 4K television featuring LG's NanoCell technology, you'll get rich color, deep blacks and stunning detail that will transform everything you watch. And with Dolby Vision™¹ and Dolby Atmos®¹, you'll get advanced image and sound technologies inspired by the cinema. By combing these two advancements into our OLED and NanoCell TVs, they work to not only optimize your picture, but your sound too—delivering ultra-vivid images and powerful, moving audio that seems to flow all around you. In addition, with the new Apple AirPlay 2, you can access one of the largest libraries of Dolby Vision content, and you can effortlessly cast anything from your Apple iPhone or laptop to your LG TV. And you can even sync music with other AirPlay 2-compatible speakers anywhere in your home. Plus, with WiSA2 compatibility, your LG OLED TV is designed to work seamlessly with WiSA-enabled speakers to deliver high-fidelity sound wirelessly to wherever your WiSA-enabled speakers are—which can dramatically elevate the cinematic sound of everything you watch. Along with that, our TVs come equipped with the latest HDMI3 ports, which means they support wider bandwidths for higher frame rates—so it's easy to enjoy fast-paced games, fast action scenes and high-speed sports with minimal input lag and enhanced responsiveness. Of course, all our premium televisions also include ThinQ AI (and they're the first with the Google Assistant4 and Alexa built in)—which means that they'll not only become the centerpiece of your home entertainment system, but they'll become the center for your smart home. And, in order to help you make the most of your smart TV, LG televisions include our simple, award-winning webOS5 platform and our intuitive Magic Remote5—giving you a convenient home dashboard that puts all your smart home devices front and center, and a fun, easy and intuitive way to find the best entertainment recommendations for the way you watch—and control your TV and compatible smart home devices. LG Sound BarsWhether you choose a single sound bar or an entire audio system, LG gives you access to the leading audio processing technology—with sound quality that surpasses CDs, and stunning 24-bit/192kHz audio resolution—which is as close to original sound as you can get. (Compatible high-resolution music files required, sold separately.) In addition, with Dolby Atmos, our audio devices will transport you into the story with moving audio that flows all around you with breathtaking realism. And because DTS:X places sound where it would occur naturally in space, you'll feel like you're in the middle of a car chase or hear a storm thundering above you—and get an even more lifelike experience. LG Video Of course, no LG home entertainment system would be complete without a video component (or two). With projectors and Blu-ray players that allow you to watch streaming content in larger-than-life size, as well as DVDs and Blu-ray discs, it's easy to play the content you own already—and new movies or shows that you've rented or b

title: Sanus Adjustable Height Speaker Stand - Extends 28" to 38" - Holds Satellite & Small Bookshelf Speakers (i.e. Bose, Harmon Kardon, Polk, JBL, KEF, Klipsch, Sony and Others) - Set of 2 - Model: HTBS
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Home Audio Accessories › Speaker Accessories › Stands
features: Built from heavy-gauge steel for superior performance and a wide stable base to deliver a high-quality audio experience, the SANUS height-adjustable pair of speaker stands are the ideal addition to your home theater setup.

To ensure a perfectly customizable sound, the extendable tube is adjustable from 28" to 38". The easy-to-use collar makes height changes a breeze without the need for additional tools. For a clean look, the SANUS HTBS surround sound speaker stand features a concealed wire path, this built-in cable management channel helps keep your speaker wire out of the way.

Truly universal, this pair of speaker stand is engineered to hold small satellite and bookshelf speakers up to 3.5lbs. Compatible with Bose, Harmon Kardon, JBL, Sony, Samsung speakers, and more. The set features three mounting configurations including L-shaped brackets, top plate, and keyhole adapter to maximize compatibility with your speakers.
The installation is as easy as 1,2,3, these rear speaker stands are shipped with all the required hardware including base pads & screws.

Experience the Sanus difference. The SANUS adjustable height speaker stand comes with a 5-year warranty, and top-notch Minnesota based customer service. Our experts are ready to chat 7 days a week if you have questions or run into a snag.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
SANUS Adjustable Speaker Stands 
Top Quality Speaker Stands at a Great Value 
New speakers? Mount them up with ease thanks to these DIY-friendly SANUS speaker stands. Height-adjustable and made from premium materials, these stands not only complement the style of your room but inhale the sound quality of your speakers, giving you that movie theater, surround sound experience. 
Function + Style 
Height adjustable from 28" to 38", you can customize the position of your floor stand right at ear level for optimal acoustics. The heavy cast iron bases also provide stability for your small bookshelf or satellite speakers weighing up to 3.5 lbs. 
Universally Compatible 
These SANUS speaker stands are compatible with a wide range of brands such as Bose, Vizio, Harmon Kardon, Polk, JBL,Samsung, Sony and more, working with small bookshelf or satellite speakers weighing up to 3.5 lbs. 
It's a Match 
Our universal speaker stands have 3 different mounting methods: bottom plates, L-shaped brackets, and keyhole slot adapters fitting back-bolt & even bottom-bolt type speakers for the ultimate mounting flexibility. 
Best Selling Speaker Stands 
Elevate your home theater experience with these SANUS height-adjustable speaker stands pair. Crafted from heavy-gauge steel, these stands offer superior performance and stability, allowing you to enjoy high-quality sound like never before. With adjustable height from 28" to 38" and easy-to-use collar adjustments, you can customize your sound effortlessly without the hassle of additional tools. Also, say goodbye to tangled wires thanks to the built-in cable management channel, helping keep your setup looking sleek and organized. 
Designed to hold small satellite and bookshelf speakers up to 3.5 lbs, these stands are compatible with popular brands like Bose, Harmon Kardon, JBL, Sony, and Samsung. Plus, with three mounting configurations included, you can maximize compatibility with your speakers. Installation is also a breeze with all required hardware included and top-notch customer support so you know you can trust in the SANUS difference for peace of mind. 
What's in the box: 2x Lower pillars & 2x Upper pillars, 2x Bases & 2x Top plates, 2x Speaker pads & x2 Speaker brackets, 2x L-brackets & 2x Bracket knobs, 2x M5 x 12mm counter-sunk screws, 2x 1/4"-20 x 12mm counter-sunk screws, 4x M5 x 12mm pan-head screws & Four 1/4"-20 pan-head screws, 20x Self-adhesive pads

title: Saiyin On-Wall Speakers (Pair) Compact,Flexible Wall-Mountable Surround Speakers,Slim MDF Cabinet,4 Ohms,3.5-Inch Woofer with Horn Tweeter,2-Way Passive Speakers for Home Theater, Living Room,Office
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Surround Sound Systems
features: 2-Way Home Speaker System: The Saiyin On-Wall speakers deliver stereo sound to any room in your home or office. A solution for a total surround-sound system when space is limited and performance is key. The compact proportions make installation a breeze to bring huge dimensionality with a speaker that makes itself heard but without cluttering floor space.

Amplifier or Receiver Required: To use these passive speakers, you will need an amplifier or receiver to power them. Simply connect the speakers to your preferred amplifier or receiver, and you're good to go. The ON-WALL speaker features a unique down-firing bass port system, allowing for flexible room placement, even against a wall. ❗❗Please note that speaker wires are not included, so you'll need to acquire those separately.

Silk Square Horn Tweeters and 3.5” Bass Drivers: The surround sound speakers utilize the 3.5 inch horn tweeters producing crystal clear high frequencies & taking response up to 20,000 Hz for life-like high frequencies. For bass, the speakers use 3.5-inch drivers delivering smooth and rich low-frequencies. Each speaker also has a dual-horn reflex port that enhances the performance of the woofer.

Wall Mount Design: With the customized wall mounting kit, these speakers can be easily installed on any flat surface in your home or office. This design not only provides a clean and sleek look but also ensures wide-range sound performance without compromising on quality. The speaker bracket spacing is specifically designed to be only 3mm, allowing for a tight attachment to the wall using matching screws. This maximizes your limited space while delivering an unparalleled audio experience.

All-Wood MDF Cabinet: The wall speakers feature all-wood MDF cabinets, which effectively reduce cabinet resonance. The classic design and elegant wood finish of these cabinets make them suitable for both contemporary and vintage-themed setups. They add a touch of elegance and style to your sound system, meeting your requirements for the great audio experience.

title: Micca M-8S 2-Way in-Wall Speaker, 10.0"(W) by 14.1"(H) Cutout, Home Theater, Whole House Audio, Indoor or Covered Outdoor, 8" Woofer, 1" Tweeter, White, Paintable, Each
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Ceiling & In-Wall Speakers
description: NOTE: This listing is for one speaker, buy as many as needed! The Micca M-Series of in-wall and in-ceiling speakers have been designed for optimal performance in a wide variety of home entertainment applications, from providing relaxed background music to a high-impact 7-channel home theater system. Built with high-quality components and rigorously tested design, M-Series speakers deliver exceptional value and are well reviewed by owners and critics. Dynamic and Balanced The M-8S is a 2-way in-wall speaker with a high excursion 8" poly woofer and a 1" soft dome tweeter. This combination provides great flexibility in terms of application and suitability to different music tastes. In addition to smooth and natural vocals, the 8" woofer is capable of robust bass output. This allows the M-8S to be used without the need for a subwoofer in many installations, or seamless integration if a subwoofer is used. Imaging and Clarity The 1" soft dome tweeter provides abundant detail and clarity, generating solid and focused imaging for all sound sources in a spacious sound stage. Designed for a broadened listening sweet spot, the tweeter employs a diffuser to assist with the off-axis response as well as a pivoting mechanism to achieve proper aiming. Perfect integration between the tweeter and woofer is achieved through a 12dB crossover network. Once installed and set up, the M-8S projects a realistic sound stage with excellent resolution. Specifications - Woofer: 8" Mica-Poly Cone, Rubber Surround - Tweeter: 1" Silk Dome - Crossover: 12dB/Octave - Frequency Response: 40Hz-20kHz - Impedance: 8 Ohms - Sensitivity: 90dB 1W/1M - Power: 100 Watts (Each) - Outer Dimension: 10" (W) x 14.1" (H) - Cutout: 8.7" (W) x 12.7" (H) - Mounting Depth: 3.4"
features: UNCOMPROMISING AUDIO QUALITY - Micca Media Series in-wall speakers are designed for optimal performance in a wide variety of home audio applications, from relaxing background music to high-impact home theater systems. Their smooth and natural sound signature with robust bass output deliver an engaging listening experience.

EASY TO INSTALL - The built-in mounting tabs grab securely onto drywall or wood panels with no need for additional brackets or boxes. With durable construction and materials, Micca in-wall speakers are great for family rooms, living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, bathrooms, and covered outdoor porches, providing years of lasting enjoyment.

MODERN AND ELEGANT - Using a rimed grill design, the Micca Media Series in-wall speakers protrude minimally from the wall and blend unobtrusively into any decor. When painted to match the wall color, they become virtually invisible, giving you great sound without taking up valuable space.

ENGINEERED FOR GREAT SOUND - The M-8S utilizes a high excursion 8-inch poly woofer and a pivoting 1-inch silk dome tweeter that can be aimed to project a spacious sound stage. Perfect integration between the tweeter and woofer is achieved through a 12dB crossover network that ensures coherent transition in the critical upper midrange region.

SPECIFICATIONS - Frequency Response: 40Hz-20kHz; Impedance: 8 Ohms; Sensitivity: 90dB 1W/1M; Power Handling: 100 Watts (Each); Outer Dimension: 10.0” (W) x 14.1” (H); Cutout Dimension: 8.7” (W) x 12.7” (H); Mounting Depth: 3.4”

Get the right size 
Micca speaker sizes of "8-Inch", "6.5-Inch", and "5.25-Inch" are based on industry standard practice of approximate woofer size. Please do not rely on this size to determine if the speaker will fit a install location. 
To select the right speaker size for your project, please refer to the product dimensions, wall cutout dimensions, and mounting depth listed in the table above. 
Selection considerations 
The M-8S and M-6S shares common components and design with other Media Series in-wall/in-ceiling speakers, making for a perfect tonal match when mixed and matched. For a given installation location, it is always recommended to install the largest Media Series speaker model that will fit. Doing so provides the fullest sound and best performance at all playback levels. In locations where the larger M-8S will not fit, the smaller M-6S can be used instead.

title: Rockville (1) RockTower 68B Black Home Audio Tower Speakers Passive 8 Ohm
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Floorstanding Speakers
description: The RockTower 68B passive tower speaker delivers audiophile grade sound quality at an unbeatable price!. . Design. The Rocktower series of speakers come in 3 beautiful finishes. This listing is for the Black grain. We also offer it in classic wood grain, and white grain. The bottom of the speaker has a concealed and sturdy stand to finish the look. We also designed these to look great with the grills or without grills so you can rock the style you desire.. . Power. The power handling is an incredible 125 watts RMS each speaker! Even if you over-power these a little it would be fine because we under-rate their RMS power. The peak burst rating is 500 watts.. . 3-Way smart configuration. This speaker is built with a very smart configuration. It is a 3-way speaker that separated the highs, mids, and bass to different drivers. We use (2) 6.5" woofers to drive the bass, and (1) 6.5" driver dedicated to the midrange frequencies, and a 1" silk dome tweeter for crystal clear high frequencies.. . Enclosure. We enclose the speakers in a high quality MDF tower enclosure. (NO particle board Allowed!). We added a vent to the enclosure to give the low frequencies a boost. These sound great n their own and they sound even better with an added sub.. . Rear panel. Our rear panel features everything you want in a passive speaker. The gold plated 5-way binding post terminals give the flexibility to use banana plugs, spade terminals, or bare wire.. . Impedance options. This listing is for the 8 ohm version and it is perfect if you want to run 1 to each channel of your amplifier or if you want to run 2 in parallel to each channel of your amplifier.
features: Rockville RockTower 68B Black Home Audio Tower Speakers Passive 8 Ohm

RMS Power: 125 Watts. Peak Power: 500 Watts. Woofer: 6.5" x 2. Midrange: 6.5" x 1. Tweeter: 1" Silk dome tweeter. Each Woofer has a 15 oz magnet and 1.25" voice coil. Midrange has 8 oz magnet and 1" voice coil.

Cabinet material: Top quality MDF with beautiful vinyl wood grain finish. Silk dome tweeter gives crisp and realistic sounding highs (silk dome are generally more musical). Detachable grill (speaker looks amazing with and without the grill).

Vented enclosure gives a boost of punchy bass at low frequencies . Gold-plated 5-way binding post terminals can accept banana, bare wire, spade terminals, and more. Impedance: 8 ohm . Color: Black Grain (also available in white grain and classic wood grain).

Ultra-stiff Polypropylene dust cap on woofer. Built-in 3-way crossover separates frequencies so each driver can work together. Rubber surrounds on woofer. Frequency Response: 30Hz-20KHz. Sensitivity:87 dB 1W/1m. High Quality Golden Terminals. Dimensions of each speaker (inches): 10.43" x 7.87" x 41.73". One pc speakers Shipping carton dimensions (inches): 14.2*11.4*46.5inch. Weight per speaker: 26.2 lb.

The RockTower 68B passive tower speaker delivers audiophile grade sound quality. 
Design The Rocktower series of speakers come in 3 beautiful finishes. This listing is for the Black grain. We also offer it in classic wood grain, and white grain. The bottom of the speaker has a concealed and sturdy stand to finish the look. We also designed these to look great with the grills or without grills so you can rock the style you desire. 
Power The power handling is an incredible 125 watts RMS each speaker! Even if you over-power these a little it would be fine because we under-rate their RMS power. The peak burst rating is 500 watts. 
3-Way smart configuration This speaker is built with a very smart configuration. It is a 3-way speaker that separated the highs, mids, and bass to different drivers. We use (2) 6.5” woofers to drive the bass, and (1) 6.5” driver dedicated to the midrange frequencies, and a 1” silk dome tweeter for crystal clear high frequencies. 
Enclosure We enclose the speakers in a high quality MDF tower enclosure. (NO particle board Allowed!). We added a vent to the enclosure to give the low frequencies a boost. These sound great n their own and they sound even better with an added sub. 
Rear panel Our rear panel features everything you want in a passive speaker. The gold plated 5-way binding post terminals give the flexibility to use banana plugs, spade terminals, or bare wire. 
Impedance options This listing is for the 8 ohm version and it is perfect if you want to run 1 to each channel of your amplifier or if you want to run 2 in parallel to each channel of your amplifier.

Power The power handling is an incredible 125 watts RMS each speaker! Even if you over-power these a little it would be fine because we under-rate their RMS power. The peak burst rating is 500 watts. 
3-Way smart configuration This speaker is built with a very smart configuration. It is a 3-way speaker that separated the highs, mids, and bass to different drivers. We use (2) 6.5” woofers to drive the bass, and (1) 6.5” driver dedicated to the midrange frequencies, and a 1” silk dome tweeter for crystal clear high frequencies. 
Enclosure We enclose the speakers in a high quality MDF tower enclosure. (NO particle board Allowed!). We added a vent to the enclosure to give the low frequencies a boost. These sound great n their own and they sound even better with an added sub. 
Rear panel Our rear panel features everything you want in a passive speaker. The gold plated 5-way binding post terminals give the flexibility to use banana plugs, spade terminals, or bare wire. 
Impedance options This listing is for the 8 ohm version and it is perfect if you want to run 1 to each channel of your amplifier or if you want to run 2 in parallel to each channel of your amplifier.

Features: 
Rockville RockTower 68B Black Grain Home Audio tower Speaker
RMS Power: 125 Watts
Peak Power: 500 Watts
Woofer: 6.5” x 2
Midrange: 6.5” x 1
Tweeter: 1” Silk dome tweeter
Each Woofer has a 15 oz magnet and 1.25” voice coil
Midrange has 8 oz magnet and 1” voice coil
Cabinet material: Top quality MDF with beautiful vinyl wood grain finish
Silk dome tweeter gives crisp and realistic sounding highs (silk dome are generally more musical)
Detachable grill (speaker looks amazing with and without the grill)
Vented enclosure gives a boost of punchy bass at low frequencies
Gold-plated 5-way binding post terminals can accept banana, bare wire, spade terminals, and more
Impedance: 8 ohm
Color: Black Grain (also available in white grain and classic wood grain)
Ultra-stiff Polypropylene dust cap on woofer
Built-in 3-way crossover separates frequencies so each driver can work together
Rubber surrounds on woofer
Frequency Response: 30Hz-20KHz
Sensitivity:87 dB 1W/1m
High Quality Golden Terminals
Dimensions of each speaker (inches): 10.43” x 7.87” x 41.73”
One pc speakers Shipping carton dimensions (inches): 14.2*11.4*46.5inch
Weight per speaker: 26.2 lb

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
RX-V6A 7.2-channel 8K AV Receiver with MusicCast 
The Highest Resolution. This 7.2-channel AV receiver boldly explores entertainment possibilities for an advanced home theater with the latest in video and audio, including 8K60B, 4K120AB and the latest HDMI standards, along with Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos, DTS:X and more. 
Enjoy Movies and Games Like Never Before 
HDR10+ 
HDR10+ signals not only dynamic range (the ratio of light to dark) of video content on a scene-by-scene basis, it also provides the scene characteristics between light and dark to maintain important detail for a more realistic viewing experience. 
Enhanced Gaming Functionality 
Enhance your favorite games with features that include Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM) and Variable Refresh Rate (VRR). 
4K120 Ultra HD, 8K60B 
Get future-ready with this 8K AV receiver with 7 HDMI inputs. 8K60B, 4K120AB and support for the latest HDMI standards. 
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and AirPlay 2 
Use Wi-Fi for MusicCast multi-room audio, Bluetooth to stream in or out to headphones, and AirPlay 2 to stream from iOS devices to your receiver. 
Wireless Surround Speakers 
Combine this AV receiver with a MusicCast 50 or two MusicCast 20 wireless rear speakers (optional) to create a 5.1-channel home theater. 
YPAO R.S.C. with Multipoint 
YPAO (Yamaha Parametric room Acoustic Optimizer) measures up to 8 listening positions, allowing for a sweet-spot large enough for the whole family. 
Speak Up 
Just say the word and it's yours. Intuitively control a single MusicCast product or an entire whole-home system with ease using Alexa, Google Assistant or Siri voice control devices and hear your home come alive. 
Stream It All 
Explore a world of music with built-in streaming services. Use the MusicCast Controller app to access your favorite streaming services – plus downloads and more – straight from your receiver. It's never been easier to listen to your favorite songs and artists and discover new music.

items.text: Get future-ready with this 8K AV receiver with 7 HDMI inputs. 8K60B, 4K120AB and support for the latest HDMI standards.

items.text: Use Wi-Fi for MusicCast multi-room audio, Bluetooth to stream in or out to headphones, and AirPlay 2 to stream from iOS devices to your receiver.

items.title: YPAO R.S.C. with Multipoint
items.text: YPAO (Yamaha Parametric room Acoustic Optimizer) measures up to 8 listening positions, allowing for a sweet-spot large enough for the whole family.

items.title: Speak Up
items.text: Just say the word and it's yours. Intuitively control a single MusicCast product or an entire whole-home system with ease using Alexa, Google Assistant or Siri voice control devices and hear your home come alive.

items.title: Stream It All
items.text: Explore a world of music with built-in streaming services. Use the MusicCast Controller app to access your favorite streaming services – plus downloads and more – straight from your receiver. It's never been easier to listen to your favorite songs and artists and discover new music.

HDMI Out with eARC
Unlock the full potential of 4K and 8K content. Enhanced Audio Return Channel (also known as eARC) is the next generation of ARC – delivering full resolution for a realistic surround sound experience.

Zone 2
Zone 2, also known as Intelligent Amp Assign, allows you to enjoy stereo sound in a second room while the Main Zone uses 5.1-channels of power. Instead use two-channels for presence in the Main Room.

High Slew Rate Amplifier
Contributing to a precise signal transmission, this feature helps to produce a high resolution audio signal. An improvement on past slew rate amps, this new Yamaha design is more stable than ever.

HDMI Inputs
With 7 inputs and 1 output, you have the ability to connect multiple devices at once, including gaming consoles and streaming devices like Apple TV and Amazon Fire TV. Ready for 8K60B and 4K120AB

MusicCast Multi-room Audio
Listen in one room or connect to every room of the house with MusicCast multi-room audio. Stream wirelessly through Wi-Fi to other MusicCast devices to enjoy all your favorite streaming services.

features: Built for Pure Listening: Our center channel speaker is the ideal addition to any home theater system. It delivers exceptional clarity and vocal reproduction, even during action-packed scenes ,every word of dialogue you can be heard clearly.

Clear Crisp Highs: The center channel speaker features a horn tweeter that delivers crisp and clear high-frequencies and produces a dynamic and detailed soundstage.The horn shape helps to direct the sound directly towards to you, resulting in a more focused and accurate sound.

Tight, Powerful Bass: The 4 inch woven fiber woofer provides a rich and deep low-end response, adding depth and warmth to your audio experience. This is particularly important for movies and TV shows, where the sound effects and music can greatly enhance your viewing experience.

Classic Good Looks: With its acoustically inert, furniture-grade MDF cabinet construction and black oak finish, our center-channel speaker seamlessly blends into any home environment, regardless of where it is placed. Its elegant and classic design complements any of your home décor and makes a statement in any room.

Build Your Dream Home Theater: After you position your center speaker below your TV, final set up is super easy and straightforward. It’s designed to work with most home theater receivers or Amplifiers. Whether you’re sprawled out for movie night or grooving to your favorite artist’s discography, the center channel speaker is performance tuned for next-level listening enjoyment.
