title: AC Infinity CLOUDPLATE T7-N, Rack Mount Fan Panel 2U, Intake Airflow, for Cooling AV, Home Theater, Network 19” Racks
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Components › Internal Components › Fans & Cooling › Case Fans
description: An intelligent fan system designed for cooling audio video, DJ, server, network, and IT equipment racks. Protects rack-mount equipment from overheating, performance issues, and shortened lifespans. Programmable thermostat controller with automated speed control, alarm warnings, and backup memory. Premium anodized aluminum construction with CNC-machined detailing for a professional appearance. Size: 2U Rack Space | Design: Intake | Airflow: 50 to 220 CFM | Noise: 10 to 36 dBA | Bearings: Dual Ball Product Details An intelligent cooling fan system designed to be mounted onto a wide range of 19-inch racks requiring quiet or high airflow cooling. Maintaining an optimal temperature for rack-mount equipment prevents overheating, ensures constant performance, and extends their lifespan. The LCD digital controller features a programmable thermostat with automated speed control, alarm warnings, status alerts, and backup memory. The system is housed in a solid aluminum construction that takes up two rack units of space (2U). Each aluminum frame is anodized with a light-brush finish, then the corners CNC-machined and edges symmetrically cut for a high-end professional appearance. This model holds four custom-engineered dual-ball bearing fans rated at 67,000 hours, and certified by CE and RoHS. The fans are set to intake cooler air and should be positioned near the bottom of the rack; an exhaust version of this model is available, sold separately. This complete kit includes the 2U fan unit, corded 6-ft thermal probe, user’s manual, rack mount screws, cage nuts, and corded 6-ft power supply. Intelligent Cooling Programming includes an easy-to-use thermostat and a SMART mode that automatically adjusts the fan’s speed to react to varying temperatures. Additional features include alarm alerts, fan failure triggers, power savings setting, display lock, and backup memory. Six fan speeds are available with three screen brightness settings. Behind the unit is an expansion port that can control another CLOUDPLATE unit or an AC Infinity rack roof dual-fan kit. Performance and Applications This 2U rack cooling system features programmable fan speed control, enabling it to work for a wide range of rack mount applications. With a noise level that can reach 10 dBA, the fan system can be used for environments where low or minimal noise is required such as home theater, studio, DJ, and audio video racks. A max airflow rating of 220 CFM will provide sufficient cooling to server, network, IT and equipment racks requiring high airflow. This fan system contains premium dual-ball bearings, allowing it to be mounted horizontally or vertically. Product Identification Manufacturer AC Infinity Inc. aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
SA-RS3S 
Boost your surround sound experience 
Wireless rear speakers for BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 8, BAR 9), HT-A7000, HT-A5000, HT-A3000, HT-S2000, and STR-AN1000 
Optional wireless rear speakers 
Experience cinematic surround sound taken to a new level with the SA-RS3S wireless rear speakers. These speakers are specifically designed to seamlessly pair with BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 8, BAR 9), HT-A7000/A5000/A3000/S2000 Soundbars and STR-AN1000 AV receiver to complete the home theater experience. 
Connects wirelessly 
These speakers make a wireless connection with the BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 8, BAR 9), HT-A7000/A5000/A3000/S2000 Soundbars and STR-AN1000 AV Receiver so that the speakers can be placed in the most desirable locations without the hassle or worry that long, winding wires bring. 
Clear expansive sound 
These two way speakers feature booth a woofer and tweeter to achieve a rich, expansive soundstage with exceptional clarity. 
Wall mount-capable 
The SA-RS3S rear speakers easily mount to the wall if desired, giving your home theater setup a clean look and feel. 
Omnidirectional Block Design 
Complete your surround sound experience and tailor audio to your space with these free-standing or wall-mountable rear speakers. 
Easy set up 
Since the SA-RS3S wireless rear speakers were built specifically for use with the BRAVIA THEATER (BAR 8, BAR 9) HT-A7000/A5000/A3000/S2000 & STR-AN1000, setup is quick and easy. The speakers automatically connect when you power them up, so you can enjoy cinema-quality surround sound right away. 
Clear, expansive sound 
Two-way speakers feature both a woofer and a tweeter for a rich, expansive, and clear sound.

title: AC Infinity CLOUDPLATE T9-N, Rack Mount Fan Panel 3U, Intake Airflow, for Cooling AV, Home Theater, Network 19” Racks
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Computers & Accessories › Computer Components › Internal Components › Fans & Cooling › Case Fans
description: An intelligent fan system designed for cooling audio video, DJ, server, network, and IT equipment racks. Protects rack-mount equipment from overheating, performance issues, and shortened lifespans. Programmable thermostat controller with automated speed control, alarm warnings, and backup memory. Premium anodized aluminum construction with CNC-machined detailing for a professional appearance. Size: 3U Rack Space | Design: Intake | Airflow: 60 to 300 CFM | Noise: 12 to 38 dBA | Bearings: Dual Ball Product Details An intelligent cooling fan system designed to be mounted onto a wide range of 19-inch racks requiring quiet or high airflow cooling. Maintaining an optimal temperature for rack-mount equipment prevents overheating, ensures constant performance, and extends their lifespan. The LCD digital controller features a programmable thermostat with automated speed control, alarm warnings, status alerts, and backup memory. The system is housed in a solid aluminum construction that takes up three rack units of space (3U). Each aluminum frame is anodized with a light-brush finish, then the corners CNC-machined and edges chamfered for a high-end professional appearance. This model holds three custom-engineered dual-ball bearing fans rated at 67,000 hours, and certified by CE and RoHS. The fans are set to intake cooler air and should be positioned near the bottom of the rack; an exhaust version of this model is available, sold separately. This complete kit includes the 3U fan unit, corded 6-ft thermal probe, user’s manual, rack mount screws, cage nuts, and corded 6-ft power supply. Intelligent Cooling Programming includes an easy-to-use thermostat and a SMART mode that automatically adjusts the fan’s speed to react to varying temperatures. Additional features include alarm alerts, fan failure triggers, power savings setting, display lock, and backup memory. Six fan speeds are available with three screen brightness settings. Behind the unit is an expansion port that can control another CLOUDPLATE unit or an AC Infinity rack roof dual-fan kit. Performance and Applications This 3U rack cooling system features programmable fan speed control, enabling it to work for a wide range of rack mount applications. With a noise level that can reach 12 dBA, the fan system can be used for environments where low or minimal noise is required such as home theater, studio, DJ, and audio video racks. A max airflow rating of 300 CFM will provide sufficient cooling to server, network, IT and equipment racks requiring high airflow. This fan system contains premium dual-ball bearings, allowing it to be mounted horizontally or vertically. Product Identification Manufacturer AC Infinity Inc. title: Polk Signature Elite ES35 Slim Center Channel Speaker - Hi-Res Audio Certified, Dolby Atmos & DTS:X Compatible, 1" Tweeter & (6) 3" Woofers, Dual Power Port for Effortless Bass, Elegant White-Washed
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Center-Channel Speakers
description: Enjoy pristine audio quality and clear dialogues for your movies, games, and multi-channel music with Polk Signature Elite ES35 Slim Center Channel Loudspeaker. Featuring a Dynamically Balanced acoustic array with a 1” High-Resolution Terylene Tweeter, six 3” Mica-Fortified Polypropylene Woofer, and Cascading Crossovers, the ES35 delivers room-filling, highly detailed sound with the energy of live music – no matter what you’re listening to or where you’re sitting in the room. Polk’s Patented Power Port Bass Enhancing Technology extends the overall bass port and provides greater surface area for distortion-free, dramatic frontal impact. It is Hi-Res Audio Certified and ensures accurate sound reproduction from even the latest Dolby Atmos and DTS:X surround sound AVRs and amplifiers. The Signature Elite Series is designed with quality, timbre-matched Polk components to enable you to mix and match models and build your dream home theater or music listening environment. Add the Signature Elite ES60 tower pair, ES20 bookshelf pair and any sub for a complete 5.1 surround setup.
features: HIGH-PERFORMANCE SLIM CENTER CHANNEL - Polk Signature Elite ES35 features Dynamically Balanced Acoustic Array with Cascading Crossovers, a 1" Terylene Tweeter and (6) 3" Woofers that deliver room-filling, crystal clear sound in a life-like soundstage

NOT ONLY HEAR, BUT FEEL THE HEART-THUMPING BASS - With Polk's Patented Power Port Technology, the ES35 center channel gives you a dramatic frontal impact and carries almost 75 percent of the audio so you get louder, lower, and cleaner bass, distortion free

REALISTIC SOUND REPRODUCTION – ES35's high sensitivity and 4- & 8-Ohm compatibility delivers spacious, enveloping, and true to life music streamed online via Apple Music, Amazon Music HD, Spotify & more and even from the latest Dolby Atmos & DTS:X AVRs

LOOKS TO KILL - The Signature Elite series speakers with their bold, modern looks are sure to make heads turn and set feet tapping, no matter where you are sitting in the room. Their elegant and classy style will make a statement with any home décor

VERSATILE PLACEMENT OPTIONS - Place the ES35 on a shelf or a speaker stand (sold separately), or wall-mount it below the TV without blocking the IR sensor. Use as left and right channel speakers, in additional to center, and enjoy a cinematic experience

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME THEATER - The timbre matched Polk components ensures seamless speaker-to-speaker blending with the Signature Elite series. Combine with pairs of ES60 towers, ES20 bookshelf speakers & any sub for a 5.1 surround setup

manufacturerAttributes.value: Low Profile & Wall-Mountable Design for  Flexible L/C/R Placement  The ES35 slim center channel tucks in right below your TV to provide big-speaker sound without blocking your viewing area or IR Remote. The ES35's flexible, wall-mountable design enables it to also be used as left, right or surround channels for amazing home theater sound that doesn't require floor or shelf space.

Hear More Detail in Music and Movies You Love  ES35's Hi-Res Audio Certified, Terylene dome tweeter provides crystalline highs (40+kHz) ideal for high-resolution sound found in ultra-HD movies, multi-channel concert videos, and spatial audio mixed for Apple Music, Dolby Atmos or DTS:X.

Make Your Entire Home Theater the Sweet Spot  Experience a seamless, lifelike soundstage no matter where you're seated. Signature Elite ES35's Dynamically Balanced, seven-driver acoustic array with phase optimized, cascaded crossovers ensures focused dialogue that blends perfectly with other Signature Elite speakers.

Effortless Bass for Full Frontal Impact  Most conventional center speakers are narrowly tuned to reproduce voice dialog. But in most film and tv content, the center channel carries as much as 75% of the audio: voice dialog, music soundtrack, sound fx and more. Built-in, dual Polk Power Ports enable louder, lower, and cleaner bass from the ES35's smaller speaker enclosure, so you'll hear the full-range sound and feel the dramatic frontal impact that the director intended.

Five Decades of Speaker Engineering  The Signature Elite Series is the culmination of five decades of Polk's premium speaker engineering (Est. 1972) and were designed at our original facility outside of Baltimore, MD. We rely on our patented Dynamic Balance Array process to eliminate issues before they become a part of the finished speaker. We're so confident of this process, that we back the Signature Elite ES35 with a limited five-year to ensure years of listening pleasure.

Signature Details & Modern Styling  Gold-plated five-way binding posts ensure the most lossless connection possible. An acoustically inert, non-resonant, critically damped Medite MDF enclosure ensures low distortion for a more lifelike sound. Plus, Signature Elite Series' modern, bold look will make a statement with any home decor-available in stunning black, elegant white-washed, or contemporary walnut finishes.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
PREMIUM 9.4 CHANNEL AV RECEIVER WITH 110W, 8K AND 6 HDMI INPUTS 
Premium 9.4 channel 110-watt-per-channel amplification, Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, IMAX Enhanced and Auro 3D, 8K Ultra HD, and HEOS Built-in streaming. CINEMA 50 is a powerful AV receiver for very high-performance home theaters. Built upon decades of rich heritage, designed with timeless style, and engineered for utmost performance, the Marantz CINEMA Series is the foundation of the world's most demanding home theaters! 
Key Features 
Peerless Performance 
Immersive spaciousness, warm and rich tone, extraordinary detail and lifelike dynamics are legendary hallmarks of the Marantz sound. 
	
Technology Leader 
CINEMA 50 abounds with the latest immersive audio formats, 8K video, room optimization, streaming, and more technology to simplify and elevate your enjoyment. 
	
Exquisite Design 
A modern expression of timeless design principles, CINEMA 50 features the iconic Marantz porthole, symmetrical design, and front panel controls elegantly hidden from view. 
	
Performance 
The Marantz Sound Master meticulously tuned CINEMA 50 for amazing performance with our proprietary HDAM amplification circuitry to create the Most Musical Sound in your home. 
Style 
Excellence is heard and seen. CINEMA 50 features architectural design that can be featured or remain discreet in any luxurious environment. 
Customizability 
Thoughtfully selected connectivity options, flexible speaker arrangements, and fine-tuning ability allow you to make CINEMA 50 your own. 
Effortless 
Included remote, accessible front-panel controls, and an intuitive on-screen setup process make you feel like an expert user right away. 
Technical Specifications

title: Optoma UHZ66 Compact Long Throw True 4K UHD Laser Home Cinema and Gaming Projector, 4000 Lumens
inStockText: Only 5 left in stock (more on the way).  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
description: The Optoma UHZ66 is a compact and powerful home cinema and gaming projector that offers an immersive viewing experience. It utilizes DuraCore laser light technology for a dependable light source with up to 30,000 hours of maintenance-free operation and an IPX6 dust resistance rating for enhanced durability. Its long throw lens is a great choice for large living rooms and home cinema, offering a 120" image from 12.2’ away. With true 4K Ultra High Definition resolution, you'll enjoy highly detailed video with 8.3 million distinct addressable on-screen pixels. The UHZ66 also boasts an enhanced game mode with lightning-fast response times for 1080p240 and 4K60 resolutions along 4K HDR and 1080p HDR signal input, delivering rich cinematic colors and an impressive 500,000:1 contrast ratio. This advanced projector is both compact and energy efficient, measuring just 8.5" x 10.79" and consuming only 45% of the power used by typical lamp-based projectors. It's equipped with dual HDMI 2.0 ports and USB-A Power port, making it compatible with a wide range of 4K UHD next-gen gaming consoles, gaming PCs and streaming devices. ARC/eARC support allows easy connectivity to compatible Dolby Digital 5.1/7.1 Soundbars and home theater speaker systems. And, with 4,000 lumens of brightness, there is no need to wait for the evening to watch video content or start playing.
features: TRUE 4K ULTRA HD AND HOME THEATER AUDIO SUPPORT: Enjoy superior home cinema with 8.3 million distinct addressable on-screen pixels. ARC/eARC support allows you to route multi-channel audio to compatible home theater systems for a truly cinematic experience
LONG THROW LENS: With a projection distance range of up to 30.8’, it's great for medium and large spaces. It projects a 120" image from 12.2’ away
ENHANCED GAME MODE: Lightning fast responses time deliver best in class gaming performance with 4ms for 1080p240Hz, 8ms for 108p120Hz and 16ms for 4K60Hz
ULTRA BRIGHT: Enjoy 4,000 lumens of brightness in your home theater room, family room, gaming room – or even outdoors for backyard movie nights
HDR & HLG COMPATIBLE: Enjoy brighter whites and deeper black levels for an enhanced viewing experience of images and videos, enabled by HDR10 & HLG technologies

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
About us 
In the late 20th century, Pyle established itself as a premium source for replacement speakers and car audio. By the year 2000, Pyle had undergone a massive transformation, expanding into the nascent market spaces of competitive car audio, home audio, marine audio, and professional audio & musical instruments - our Pyle Pro line. As you sit in your car, you are isolated from outside noise and surrounded by speakers. You become enveloped in sound. We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. You’d be surprised at how much better your music can sound with an upgrade from the factory speakers and amplifier. 
Pyle Car: 
We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. And we don’t just focus on audio at Pyle Car. Cars are a big part of our lives, and we offer a variety of products and accessories that can enhance your experience and turn your car into a modern media system on wheels, including navigation systems, DVD players, and iPod interfaces. At Pyle, we also care about your safety. That’s why we’ve also got a full line of rear and front-facing cameras that can be wired to a monitor in your car – so you can park in those tight spots or see around corners with ease. 
Pyle Home: 
Start with your home theater, a stalwart of any modern house. We’ve got projectors, TVs, mounts, and stands, just to get started – all fully equipped with state-of-the-art HD technology, compatible with beautiful video game consoles like Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Wii, as well as your favorite Blu-Ray players, for crisp, hi-res images that explode in your eye on a mind-blowing scale. Of course, Pyle Home also carries all the cables and adaptors you need for a fully operational setup that’s sure to be the envy of your neighbors. 
There’s plenty more to keep you entertained. Bass-expanding mini speakers that run on rechargeable batteries and play your digital music, wherever you go. Perfect for the dorm room or sitting by the pool. Headphones. Vintage turntables – get the look of yesterday’s classic phonographs with today’s high-quality manufacturing standards. Power amplifiers, horn speakers, and waterproof speakers for your garden. Tripods and speaker stands. 
Pyle Pro: 
features a huge range of musical instruments, DJ equipment, and accessories for your every need. All of our products have been designed with the professional in mind. You don't just see or hear the quality - you feel it. And whether you're a hard-working musician, studio engineer, or even a budding amateur, Pyle Pro has something to offer. 
Among Pyle Pro’s most popular items are our PA Systems. Pyle is constantly modernizing these powerful devices to meet the demands of the modern user. Our flagship PAs include wireless microphones, rechargeable batteries, and iPod/iPhone docks. They’re great for use in large areas and events – at churches for weddings, at schools, gyms, birthday parties – anything indoor or outdoor where your voice needs to be heard loud and clear. And they’re easily transportable, thanks to caster wheels and telescoping handles. Use it for any audio – voice, guitar, CD, MP3 player – they handle everything. 
Pyle’s emerging guitar line is also grabbing the attention of the music industry. Models are available in double-cutaway and Les Paul styles, with solid rosewood bodies in a variety of colors. Beginner kits including Pyle has also introduced a huge variety of effects pedals. Rounding out Pyle Pro’s line are our USB-to-analog converters, including a 2-channel mixer with USB input and output.

Start with your home theater, a stalwart of any modern house. We’ve got projectors, TVs, mounts, and stands, just to get started – all fully equipped with state-of-the-art HD technology, compatible with beautiful video game consoles like Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Wii, as well as your favorite Blu-Ray players, for crisp, hi-res images that explode in your eye on a mind-blowing scale. Of course, Pyle Home also carries all the cables and adaptors you need for a fully operational setup that’s sure to be the envy of your neighbors. 
There’s plenty more to keep you entertained. Bass-expanding mini speakers that run on rechargeable batteries and play your digital music, wherever you go. Perfect for the dorm room or sitting by the pool. Headphones. Vintage turntables – get the look of yesterday’s classic phonographs with today’s high-quality manufacturing standards. Power amplifiers, horn speakers, and waterproof speakers for your garden. Tripods and speaker stands. 
Pyle Pro: 
features a huge range of musical instruments, DJ equipment, and accessories for your every need. All of our products have been designed with the professional in mind. You don't just see or hear the quality - you feel it. And whether you're a hard-working musician, studio engineer, or even a budding amateur, Pyle Pro has something to offer. 
Among Pyle Pro’s most popular items are our PA Systems. Pyle is constantly modernizing these powerful devices to meet the demands of the modern user. Our flagship PAs include wireless microphones, rechargeable batteries, and iPod/iPhone docks. They’re great for use in large areas and events – at churches for weddings, at schools, gyms, birthday parties – anything indoor or outdoor where your voice needs to be heard loud and clear. And they’re easily transportable, thanks to caster wheels and telescoping handles. Use it for any audio – voice, guitar, CD, MP3 player – they handle everything. 
Pyle’s emerging guitar line is also grabbing the attention of the music industry. Models are available in double-cutaway and Les Paul styles, with solid rosewood bodies in a variety of colors. Beginner kits including Pyle has also introduced a huge variety of effects pedals. Rounding out Pyle Pro’s line are our USB-to-analog converters, including a 2-channel mixer with USB input and output.

title: Denon AVR-X8500HA 13.2 Channel (150 W/Ch) Receiver for Home Theater, Advanced 8K Upscaling, Supports Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, IMAX Enhanced, Auro 3D & More, Built-in HEOS, Amazon Alexa Voice Control
inStockText: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.  Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Television & Video › AV Receivers & Amplifiers
description: The Denon AVR-X8500HA 13.2 channel 8K UHD AV receiver sets the standard for the true home theater enthusiast. Upgrade your expectations with 13.2 channels to power the most immersive surround sound experience, with audio formats like Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, DTS:X Pro, IMAX Enhanced, and Auro-3D. Stream your music throughout your home with HEOS-Built-in for services like Spotify, Amazon Music HD, Pandora, TIDAL, and more. Enjoy exceptional video performance thanks to the latest HDMI technologies such as 8K/60Hz pass-through or upscaling, various HDR format support including HDR10, HDR10+, Dolby Vision, Hybrid Log-Gamma (HLG) and Dynamic HDR, as well as the latest gaming technologies such as 4K/120Hz pass-through, Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), and Auto Low Latency Mode (ALLM).
features: POWERFUL 13.2 CH AVR WITH THE LATEST HOME CINEMA TECHNOLOGY - With an advanced power amplifier design, the Denon AVR-X8500HA (150W X 13) delivers immersive 3D audio with Dolby Atmos Height Virtualization, DTS Virtual:X, DTS:X Pro, IMAX Enhanced, & Auro-3D

ADVANCED HDMI VIDEO SECTION WITH 8K UPSCALING - Features a dedicated 8K input that supports 8K/60Hz or 4K/120Hz video pass-through. All HDMI inputs support 4:4:4 Pure Color Sub Sampling, HDR10, HDR10+, Dolby Vision & HLG for exceptional color and clarity

OPTIMUM DIGITAL AUDIO PROCESSING - Denon's proprietary AL32 Processing Technology provides multi-channel, ultra-hi-res digital audio filtering on all audio channels and delivers a natural soundstage with enhanced sound imaging for all your entertainment

UNLIMITED WIRELESS STREAMING - Enjoy the same song in all rooms or a different song in each room with built-in HEOS multi-room streaming. Stream music from popular services like Spotify, Pandora, Amazon Music HD, and more via Wi-Fi, Airplay 2 or Bluetooth

FULL VOICE CONTROL - Adjust volume, change tracks & switch inputs with a voice command via Amazon Alexa. Also compatible with Google Assist, Apple Siri, and integrates with home-automation systems like Josh, through the iOS/Android compatible HEOS app

ENDLESS CONNECTION OPTIONS - Features 8 HDMI In / 3 Out, 2 Digital, 6 Analog, 2 Coaxial, and 1 Phono Input for connecting various audio sources like CD Players, Blu-Ray, Turntables and more. Features 2 Pre-Outs to connect subwoofers for additional bass

SMOOTH, SOOTHING & CLEAR SOUND - Features Audyssey MultEQ XT32 that dynamically optimizes all speakers to your listening levels, while Audyssey Dynamic EQ & Audyssey LFC provides full-range clarity and impactful bass for an extraordinary audio experience

DENON'S 100-YEAR LEGACY - With Japanese precision technology, Denon brings purity of sound and joy to your lives. Immerse yourself in multi-dimensional, 3D audio and enjoy 7.1.6 or 9.1.4 surround sound for an unmatched home theater & entertainment system

title: Rockville Rock Shaker 6.5" 200W Powered Subwoofer for Home Theater, Wood Finish, Includes Remote, Solid MDF Enclosure, RCA Input/Output, Variable Crossover-Perfect for Movies, Studio, and Home Audio
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Subwoofers
description: The Rock Shaker 6.5 is an all in one powered 6.5” subwoofer perfect for any home theater system or studio application. This product uses high grade components from the ground up and delivers clean sound with tight and thumpy bass you can really feel. The enclosure is made of high quality MDF which delivers superb sound. We use a highly efficient class “D” amplifier that is engineered to be perfectly matched with the woofer and enclosure. We tested the rear firing port and determined it delivers the best bass response where you get optimal reflection that will disburse the sound throughout the room. The woofer is top quality with foam surrounds and features a Y30 grade magnet, and a 4-layer voice coil. Our subwoofer has RCA inputs and outputs as well as high level speaker inputs and outputs to support any setup.
features: Rockville Rock Shaker 6.5 Wood 200 Watt Powered 8" Home Theater Subwoofer.

High-grade vinyl enclosure covering with a beautiful finish. The enclosure is built with the perfect air space to maximize sound quality and punch. The rear firing port is engineered for optimal sound.

Class “D” Amplifier Circuitry with Auto-Switching Power Supply. High-grade woofer with foam surround and paper cone. Woofer has a Y30 grade magnet. Distortion-Free Playback Even at Max Volume Listening! Very Clean Sound!. Enclosure is filled with fire resistant poly cotton. Detachable foam grill

title: Fosi Audio BT20A Amplifier Stereo Receiver Bluetooth 5.0 Mini Power Amp 2 Channel 200W for Home/Outdoor/Garage/Ceiling/Passive Speakers Theater System
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Home Theater › Receivers & Amplifiers › Amplifiers
features: Outdoor & Garage Setup: The BT20A is a class D integrated amplifier with a compact design that is highly suitable for various audio systems, including outdoor, garage, desktop, bookshelf and home theater systems
Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity: BT20A amplifier offering a wireless robust connection range of up to 50 feet, streaming music stably and losslessly

Great Powerful Sound Quality: BT20A equipped with two Texas Instruments TPA3116 chips, delivering an impressive 100W RMS per channel at 4 ohms, 20 Hz - 20 kHz, 0.04% THD, the amplifier produces powerful and clear HiFi sound. It allows fine-tuning of bass and treble to suit your preferences and can drive speakers up to 280 watts at 8 ohms or 320 watts at 4 ohms. Suitable for passive speakers only, not powered speakers

Easy To Use & Setup: The Amplifier offers both Bluetooth and RCA inputs, along with passive speaker outputs. This versatile amplifier enables you to build a high-quality 2.0 CH audio system, allowing seamless connections to your phone, computer, TV, tablet, and more
What You'll Get: BT20A stereo audio amplifier receiver x1, 24V/4.5A power supply x1, User Manual x1

title: Polk Audio MagniFi Mini Home Theater Surround Sound Bar | Works with 4K and HD TVs | Compact System with Big Sound | Wireless Subwoofer Included
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Sound Bars
description: The MagniFi Mini delivers the big, room-filling home theater experience you’d expect from a full-size sound bar in an ultra-compact design. Compatible with most TVs, it’s easy to set up and features Polk’s Voice Adjust and SDA surround sound technologies with 5.1 Dolby Digital decoding, ensuring crystal clear dialogue and immersive surround sound—plus an included wireless subwoofer for deep bass impact you can feel. Convenient to use as it works with any TV, cable box or satellite IR remote control—no need for two remotes. Stream your favorite music through Bluetooth, and Google Home Chromecast for Audio. The one-button Night Mode lowers the bass and increases Voice Adjust delivering clear dialogue all without raising the master volume.
features: SMALL SIZE, BIG SOUND - Packed in its compact design is a collection of powerful drivers and tweeters, which produce exceptionally clear sound. At only a little over a foot long, these sound bars are a must-have if you have space limitations for your home theater system.Waterproof : No

EXPERIENCE IMMERSIVE SURROUND SOUND WITH POLK's PATENTED SDA AUDIO TECHNOLOGY and 5.1 Dolby Digital coding. The INCLUDED WIRELESS SUBWOOFER fills your living room, bedroom, or media room with multi-dimensional surround sound

Polk's exclusive Voice Adjust Technology even lets you INDEPENDENTLY CONTROL VOICE LEVELS maximizing sound clarity and minimizing voice delays and muzzled sounds. Equipped with INDEPENDENT MODES FOR MOVIES, MUSIC, AND SPORTS, it delivers balanced sound clarity so that you hear every word, making your movie, sports and music experience absolutely exquisite

WIRELESSLY STREAM MUSIC with GOOGLE CAST from your smartphone, tablet or other compatible Android devices for a multi-room system. Cast your favorite music tracks to your sound bar via streaming services like Pandora, Spotify and others
QUICKLY AND EASILY SETUP THE SOUNDBAR SYSTEM IN MINUTES using the included HDMI and optical cables, the Google Home app on your Android or iOS devices

At less than 15 inch long, MagniFi Mini can fit almost anywhere 
Polk. Expect Great Sound. 
Having built our reputation as 'The Speaker Specialists' for more than 40 years, we take pride in our superior sound and build quality, which features many patented and award-winning audio innovations. For the people of Polk, building audio products is not just a job—it’s a passion. And if you’re going to remember one thing, remember this: We live by the truest principle of what audio should deliver—great sound for everyone! 
Polk MagniFi Mini Home Theater Sound Bar System 
Huge Polk Sound From a Mini Sound Bar 
The MagniFi Mini home theater sound bar system delivers the big room-filling audio and surround sound experience you’d expect from a full-size sound bar—all in an ultra-compact design that fits any space. technology and Dolby Digital 5.1 decoding creates incredible room-filling surround sound all from a sound bar that is less than 15 inch long. Compatible with nearly all TVs, the universal sound bar works with your TV, cable box or satellite IR remote control.

Ultra-Compact Size

Easy Setup (all cables included)

title: Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad Home Theater System, Surround Sound Systems with 16 Speakers, Supports Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced, Home Theater Sound System (HT-A9M2)
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Television & Video › Home Theater Systems
description: Experience a new level of entertainment with the surround sound system for tv offered by Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad. This tv surround sound system is equipped with 16 speakers and 360 Spatial Sound Mapping, transforming your living room into a cinematic paradise. The wireless surround sound system feature of the Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad is a game-changer for movie buffs. With the wireless surround sound system for tv, you can experience cinema-quality surround sound in the comfort of your own home. The Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad is not just a tv speaker, it's a smart system that optimizes your audio to match your room's acoustics. The bravia theater quad guarantees perfectly balanced and clear sound every time. The home theater speakers of the Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad can be placed anywhere in the room for the perfect audio experience. The home theater audio system also allows for free-standing or wall-mounted placement, making the slim speakers a seamless addition to your room's decor. The Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad comes with dolby atmos speakers that can be managed effortlessly from your smartphone with the BRAVIA Connect app. These atmos speakers support 4K HDR, 8K HDR, Dolby Vision and HDMI 2.1 gaming features like 4K120, VRR, ALLM, guaranteeing the best viewing and gaming experience.
features: HIGH-QUALITY AUDIO: Dive into the world of high-quality audio with the Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad, a top-notch surround sound system for tv. With 16 meticulously designed speakers, it delivers a rich, full-bodied sound that fills every corner of your room. Whether you're a movie enthusiast or a gamer, this tv surround sound system ensures that every sound, from the faintest whisper to the loudest explosion, is heard with crystal-clear clarity, creating a truly immersive entertainment experience.

WIRELESS CONVENIENCE: The Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad's wireless surround sound system offers convenience and flexibility. You can position the four wireless speakers virtually anywhere in the room, customizing your sound setup to suit your specific needs and preferences. Regardless of the room's layout or size, this wireless surround sound system for tv ensures optimal sound quality. Plus, the wireless design eliminates the need for cumbersome wires, making the setup process easier and the overall look of your entertainment area cleaner.

CINEMA-LIKE SOUND: Experience cinema-like audio at home with the Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad, a superior tv speaker. It supports industry-standard formats including Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced, delivering sound straight from the cinema. Whether you're watching a blockbuster movie, playing a high-octane video game, or simply enjoying your favorite music, the bravia theater quad ensures that every sound is heard as it was intended to be.

SMART CONTROL: Take control of your home theater experience with the BRAVIA Connect app, which allows you to easily control the Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad, a set of high-quality home theater speakers, from your smartphone. Change volume, sound profiles, and advanced settings with just a few taps. This level of control not only makes these home theater audio system easier to use, but also allows you to fine-tune your audio experience to suit your specific preferences.

SLEEK DESIGN: Enhance your home decor with the Sony BRAVIA Theater Quad's sleek, modern design. These dolby atmos speakers' dual-purpose stand allows the four slim speakers to be placed free-standing or wall-mounted, giving you the flexibility to choose the setup that best suits your space. The system's minimalist design ensures that these atmos speakers blend seamlessly into any room, enhancing your home's aesthetic while providing exceptional sound quality.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
BRAVIA Theater Quad 
Revolutionary surround sound 
Home Theater System 
Cinema is coming home 
Feel the emotion and excitement of the movies with BRAVIA Theater. Our decades of professional filmmaking experience allow us to faithfully recreate the creator’s vision at home with intricate surround sound and spatial audio. 
Unleash the full potential of surround sound 
360 Spatial Sound Mapping creates multiple phantom speakers around you and reflects sound off the ceiling and walls, enabling cinema-style surround sound from a handful of physical speakers. 
Room optimized sound for maximum impact 
Turn the whole room into a movie theater. Sound Field Optimization analyzes and calibrates sound to your room’s size, acoustic characteristics, and listening position, allowing you to place the speakers virtually anywhere in the room. 
Sound straight from cinema 
Bring authentic cinema surround sound quality to your living room. BRAVIA Theatre supports industry-standard formats including Dolby Atmos, DTS:X, and IMAX Enhanced certification.

Enhance the cinematic experience with optional wireless subwoofer SA-SW3 or SA-SW5 (sold separately) to feel every thud and boom reverberate the room. 
Wireless speakers 
Position the four speakers virtually anywhere in the room and they wirelessly sync with the control box connected to your TV via HDMI. 
Free-standing or wall-mounted 
The four slim wireless speakers can easily be placed free-standing or mounted on a wall, thanks to the supplied dual-purpose stand/bracket. 
BRAVIA Theater and BRAVIA TV 
Pair with BRAVIA TV for a cinema-like experience. Hear people’s voices clearly with Voice Zoom 3 when connected with compatible BRAVIA TV. 
BRAVIA Connect app 
Use BRAVIA Connect app to easily control BRAVIA Theater from your smartphone and change volume, sound profiles, and advanced settings. 
Support for the latest formats

Wireless music streaming 
Support for Spotify Connect, Apple AirPlay 2 and Bluetooth lets you wirelessly stream music and enjoy every detail in high-quality up-mixed sound.

title: Nakamichi Dragon 11.4.6 Home Surround Sound System with Dolby Atmos and DTS:X Pro. Soundbar Meets AV Receiver
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Surround Sound Systems
features: BF STARTS NOW! LOWEST COST EVER, WHILE SUPPLIES LAST @ $2999 (save $1000). WORLD’S FIRST 21-CHANNEL WIRELESS SURROUND SOUND SYSTEM with quad subwoofers, 2 Omni-Motion Reference Surrounds, 7 AMT tweeters and 15 digital amplifiers. DRAGON can render Dolby Surround formats (Dolby TrueHD and Dolby Atmos, etc.) identical to high end AVRs and is the first wireless system to be equipped with DTS:X Pro technology. A world-class home entertainment experience is achievable within minutes, wirelessly.

EXCLUSIVE: WIRELESS QUAD 8” SUBWOOFERS: Each subwoofer enclosure packs a pair of 8" subwoofers in a dual-opposing configuration, unlocking maximum kinetic energy in a compact footprint with limitless placement options. Hear potent room-filling bass that can go as deep as 20Hz. To accommodate individual user preference and room dynamics, each subwoofer can also be independently switched on or off.

EXCLUSIVE: SIX UPFIRING DRIVERS render X.X.6 vertical sound objects at precise height levels to depict the true perception of a multi-altitude soundscape. Our PerfectHeight Mechanism allows the rear upfiring drivers to be rotated up to 180° for the most optimal height effects angle regardless of room shape and seating position. The Adaptive Height Dispersion (AHD) technology completes the picture by tailoring height effects to your listening environment.

EXCLUSIVE: OMNI-MOTION REFERENCE SURROUNDS integrate side, rear and height channels together to deliver a 360° soundscape, a level of multi-directional sound quality that far exceeds any competition. Weighing 9 pounds, each speaker is designed in a bipolar configuration with three drivers and a pair of Hi-Fi grade Air Motion Tweeters (AMT) to produce breathtaking surround sound effects with pinpoint accuracy, enveloping the audience with amazing clarity that will stimulate all senses.

58” MAIN UNIT with 14 speaker drivers replicates a true-to-life grand soundstage of a cinema or concert hall. Every speaker channel has its own dedicated enclosure, ensuring perfect air movement for immaculate sound separation and flawless audio reproduction. 3 exposed Hi-Fi grade Air Motion Tweeters (AMT) tweeters elevate the experience by delivering treble effects and fast transients with unparalleled clarity.

COMPLETE CONTROL at your fingertips with the Bluetooth and IR Remote, On-Screen Display and Remote App. Enjoy the best audio and video resolution possible with HDMI eARC and 3 HDMI inputs (w Dolby Vision and 4K HDR pass-through). Qualcomm aptX️ HD also brings you 24-bit high-resolution wireless audio streaming. Get up to 4x more wireless range with Bluetooth 5.0. Devices can also be connected via Optical or 3.5mm Aux-in.

title: Optoma HD30LV Compact Gaming and Home Theater Projector, 1080p with 4K HDR Input, High Bright 4,500 Lumens for Day and Night Use
inStockText: In Stock  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
description: The Optoma HD30LV is a compact but powerful home theater and gaming projector that offers an immersive viewing experience. Its long throw lens projects a 120" image from 13'10" away and can be placed up to 32'9" from the projection surface, making it ideal for medium to large size spaces. With 1080p HD resolution, you can enjoy sharp and detailed content without any downscaling or compression. The HD30LV also boasts an enhanced game mode with lightning-fast response times and compatibility with 4K HDR input, which provides rich cinematic colors and an impressive 22000:1 contrast ratio. It's equipped with dual HDMI connectors and a USB connector, making it compatible with a wide range of gaming consoles and streaming devices.
features: STANDARD THROW LENS: With a projection distance range of up to 32'9", it's great for medium and large spaces. It projects a 120" image from 13.07' away
1080P HD RESOLUTION: Displays sharp and detailed 1080p (1920x1080) high definition content without downscaling or compression
ENHANCED GAME MODE FOR FAST RESPONSE TIME: Delivers low input lag of 8.4ms @ 1080p120Hz and 16ms @ 1080p60Hz

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Compact Footprint 
With dimensions of 9.6" x 12.4", the HD30LV can easily fit on smaller surfaces. It's easy to move from room to room, or even outside for outdoor movie nights. 
	
Standard Throw Lens 
The HD30LV can display a 100" image from 10.8 feet away, and a 120" image from 12.2 feet. It's a good choice for medium to large spaces. 
	
Full 1080p HD Resolution 
Displays sharp and detailed 1080p (1920x1080) high definition content without downscaling or compression. 
	
HDMI 2.0 Connector with 4K HDR Input Support 
The HDMI 2.0 connector accepts native 4K HDR input and processes HDR10 and HLG content for rich, cinematic color even while outputting a 1080p sHDR/HLG image. Dynamic Black technology provides deeper blacks, whiter whites, and accurate, saturated colors across the spectrum. 
	
Enhanced Gaming Mode for Faster Response and a Competitive Edge 
On high performance gaming systems, milliseconds can mean the difference between victory and failure. Choose Enhanced Gaming Mode and enjoy a low input lag of 8.4ms @ 1080p120Hz and 16ms @ 1080p60Hz. 
	
Day and Night Viewing for Entertainment, Any Time 
The HD30LV is equipped with a powerful 4,500 Lumen lamp, so you don’t need to wait until dark, or even turn off the lights to enjoy crisp, colorful imagery. Gone are the days when you had to wait until late at night and close the curtains!

items.text: The HDMI 2.0 connector accepts native 4K HDR input and processes HDR10 and HLG content for rich, cinematic color even while outputting a 1080p sHDR/HLG image. Dynamic Black technology provides deeper blacks, whiter whites, and accurate, saturated colors across the spectrum.

items.title: Enhanced Gaming Mode for Faster Response and a Competitive Edge
items.text: On high performance gaming systems, milliseconds can mean the difference between victory and failure. Choose Enhanced Gaming Mode and enjoy a low input lag of 8.4ms @ 1080p120Hz and 16ms @ 1080p60Hz.

items.title: Day and Night Viewing for Entertainment, Any Time
items.text: The HD30LV is equipped with a powerful 4,500 Lumen lamp, so you don’t need to wait until dark, or even turn off the lights to enjoy crisp, colorful imagery. Gone are the days when you had to wait until late at night and close the curtains!

features: ✅【Latest 5G WiFi & Bluetooth 5.3】WBJ's Mini WiFi Projector supports the most advanced 5G WiFi technology compatible with Android/iPhone/Windows. With no additional conversion cable required for screen mirroring, you can connect your device to the smart projector at any time. Also, The outdoor movie projector built-in bluetooth 5.3 chip allows you to instantly connect wireless bluetooth headphones or speakers.(Note: Bluetooth does not support connection with smartphone)

✅【2024 Upgraded Projector & Full HD 1080P】The video projector supports latest 1080p Full HD resolution. Powered by advanced LED technology and a uniform illumination method achieve 12000LM brightness. The vision beam projector guarantees exceptional image quality,delivering a dynamic and color-vibrant effect. Brings you a 50% brighter images than similar projectors in market. For optimal performance, we recommend using video projector in a dark environment to fully enjoy its capabilities.

✅【Low Noise & HiFi Stereo Speaker】The mini projector with WiFi and bluetooth has the most up-to-date high-efficiency cooling technology, brings you a 50% less fan noise than similar projectors in market. Movie projector built-in HiFi stereo speakers to meet your sound quality requirements when watching movies or listening to music.

✅【±15° Keystone Correction & Zoom 50%】This Bluetooth projector can adjust vertical and horizontal angles ±15° via the keystone correction function. With the ZOOM function, this outdoor projector can reduce the image size to 50% without moving the projector. WBJ portable projector provides a 35~200 inches projection size.

✅【Wide Compatibility & Ultra Small Size】The size of the mini projector is 6.1*4.6*2.8 in, which is the size of a woman's palm. Just enjoy the this lightweight and handy projector with you wherever you go. WBJ outdoor projector provides multiple input source interfaces like HDMI, USB, AV, and Audio ports, catering to a wide range of equipment needs. (NOTE: Due to copyright issues, Netflix/Disney/Hulu prohibits playing movies directly from the projector, please use a TV Stick to play.)

We offer a wide range of mounting options （Wall Mount, Ceiling Mount, Tripod Mount，Put on the table）to install our projectors in a way that best suits your requirements
Ultra Small Size - Take it Anywhere

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Surround Sound Arrangement 
The Cable Matters Double-Gang 5.1 Surround Sound Distribution Wall Plate connects 5 speakers and 1 subwoofer in a 5.1 Surround Sound system. It provides a simple way to connect speakers across the room. Conceal speaker wire in the wall instead of fastening it to the baseboard for a secure and professional-looking installation. Connect the binding posts with 12 to 18 AWG bare speaker wire, banana plugs, or spade connectors. The subwoofer coupler port connects a subwoofer cable. 
Sturdy Construction 
This sturdy wall plate is built to last. Painted screws are included with this three-piece wall plate for a professional-looking installation. 
Important Notes 
Compatible with a standard double gang low-voltage wall bracket
Some models of banana plug connectors may not fit when used on both sides due to the length of the terminals
This wall plate is not interchangeable with a Decora wall plate
Simple Home Theater Installation 
Connect the speaker wire and subwoofer cable to the rear of the insert
Fasten the insert to the wall plate with the shorter screws
Attach the assembled wall plate to the wall bracket
Connect the speaker wire or banana plugs and subwoofer cable to the front
Screw-Type Binding Post 
Accepts banana plugs, spade connectors, or bare speaker wire
Connect a banana plug on one side only
Use 12-18 AWG wire on the other side
	
Subwoofer Connection 
Connect a digital audio coaxial cable
Plug & Play to your subwoofer
	
Package Contents 
2x Wall Plate Inserts
1x Double-Gang Wall Plate
8x Mounting Screws
	
5.1 Wall Plate 7.1 Wall Plate with HDMI 7.2 Wall Plate 7.2 Wall Plate with HDMI

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description

300 Watt Subwoofer Amp Home Theater 
Our Story 
Fosi Audio was founded with a simple goal: Build products that sound great and make people want to listen to music every day. We design, manufacture, and sell many Hi-Fi audio products on the market. We pursue your perfect music journey. Enjoy Hi-Fi music with Fosi Audio audio products! 
Bluetooth Subwoofer Amplifier Full-Frequency Mono Amp 
Mini Stereo Audio Amp with SUB Frequency Control 
Power Adapter: 24V/4.5A
DC Input Range: 15V-32V
Terminating Impedance: 2 - 8 Ohm
RMS Power Output: RMS 220 watt @ 4ohm, RMS 150 watt @ 8ohm
Full Frequency Response Range: 20Hz-20KHz(± 3db)
Bass Frequency Range: 20-200Hz
Input Sensitivity: ≤ 0.2mV
SNR ≥ 102dB
THD ≤0.05%
2 Channel Power Amp: BT10A, BT20A, TB10A, TB10D, V1.0B, V1.0G, TDA7498E, ZK-1002, ZK-502T. 
2.1 Channel Power Amp: BT30D, BT30D Pro, BL20A, BL20C, ZK-TB21. 
DAC: Q4, K5 Pro, DS1, DS2. DAC Amplifier: PH04, DA2120A, DA2120C. 
Subwoofer Amp: TP-02, M01-BT, M02, M03, M04. 
Phono Preamp: BOX X1, BOX X2, BOX X3, BOX X4. Tube Preamp: P1. 
Tube Headphone Amplifier: T20, T20X, P2. 
Class AB Amplifier: T3. 
Switch to PBTL, it's a Full-Frequency Mono amp for driving passive speakers and a powered subwoofer. Switch to SUB, it's a subwoofer amplifier for driving passive and powered subwoofers. 
	
Adopt TDA7498E Chip, MAX power output up to 300 watts, providing 220 watts RMS into 4-ohm loads or 150 watts to 8-ohm loads. The TDA7498E embeds an overcurrent protection circuitry to protect the device from unwanted current peaks. 
	
Upgrade DC Connector is safe and solid. With a built-in power protection circuit, there are no sparks flying when you plug the power adapter into the amplifier. 
	
The sound is more delicate with sub freq and gains independent control, the shocking auditory effects make you feel like in the cinema. The subwoofer amp provides clean, clear, powerful (but not overpowering) bass. 
	
Compared with other subwoofer amplifiers, the M01-BT power amp has a modern feature that is Bluetooth connectivity. Bluetooth 5.0 is aimed at low-power devices, with wider coverage and a four-fold increase in speed. 
	
The audio input of the subwoofer amp M01-BT is Bluetooth and RCA. The output is a passive speaker or subwoofer, and a powered subwoofer. Get the full range of subwoofer ability.

title: Definitive Technology ProMonitor 1000-2-Way Satellite or Bookshelf Speaker for Home Theater, at Par with Any Large Speaker (Single, Black)
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Bookshelf Speakers
description: Product DescriptionRemarkably sophisticated with the sound quality of much bigger speakers, the ProMonitor 1000 incorporates top-of-the-line Definitive Technology features for amazing home theater experiences. The speaker features BDSS driver coupled with a pressure-driven low-frequency radiator, a pure aluminum dome tweeter and a non-resonant PolyStone speaker cabinet that together produce rich, warm lifelike audio with smooth high-frequency reproduction. Small enough to hide yet attractive enough to show off, the speakers can be placed on a shelf, on a stand or mounted on a wall. The best satellite speaker in the acclaimed Pro Series, ProMonitor 1000 speakers pair with a ProCenter 2000 and matching ProSub for a complete ProCinema sound system.From the ManufacturerThe ProMonitor 1000 is Definitive's largest and best satellite speaker in the acclaimed Pro Series. Four ProMonitor 1000s along with a ProCenter 2000 and ProSub 1000 makes a complete ProCinema 1000 system. All the components of the system are packed and sold separately allowing you to mix and match Pro Series components to build the system that best suits your needs. Small size speaker has remarkable sophistication and huge sound Easy to place with the built-in keyhole mount. View larger Bass radiators enhance low frequency performance for more true-to-life sound Rubber-tipped tripod stand ensures slip and mark-free shelf mounting Don't let the ProMonitor 1000's small size and affordable price fool you -- it is a remarkably sophisticated product with huge sound. The 1000 incorporates many of the same technologies as Definitive's top-of-the-line models including BDSS drivers, pure aluminum dome tweeters, and planar pressure coupled mid/bass radiators for home theater sound quality that will shock your friends and family when they hear your system for the first time.The Secret to Their Big SoundCompeting satellite speakers of this size usually have weak lower-midrange response; that part of the audio range that contains the "warmth" and "body" of voices and musical instruments. Listen to a male vocal on typical small satellite speakers and you will instantly hear the weakness in the lower midrange. The ProMonitor satellites avoid this critical problem by pressure-coupling exclusive BDSS technology driver to an equal-sized mid/bass radiator cleverly placed on the top of the satellite. This technique doubles the lower-midrange radiating area of the speaker without increasing the size of the enclosure. You’ll enjoy the kind of rich, warm and life-like sound quality that you thought was only possible with big, hard to place speakers.Easy to Place, Easy to UseSmall enough to disappear in a room but beautiful when in plain view, the 1000 satellites can be shelf-mounted with their unique tri-lobed base, wall-mounted using the built-in keyhole mount, or mounted using optional ProMount 90 articulating pivot wall mounts (sold separately).The SoundSonically, the ProMonitor 1000 satellite is a revelation in terms of achieving incredible sound at an affordable price. Their imaging is absolutely boxless, spacious and three dimensional while delivering pinpoint specificity and localization when called for. They are velvety smooth with you-are-there presence which is hard to find at any price and unheard of in this price range. The 1000 is dynamic but capable of great subtlety so it excels equally with music or movies.Technical SpecificationsDimensions: 6.25 by 10.88 by 6.5 inches (W x H x D)Dimensions: 6.25 by 10.88 by 6.5 inches (W x H x D)Frequency response: 47 Hz to 30 kHzFrequency response: 47 Hz to 30 kHzRecommended amplification: 10 to 200 wattsRecommended amplification: 10 to 200 wattsEfficiency: 90 dBEfficiency: 90 dBDriver complement: 1 x 5.25" bass/midrange driver; 1 x 5.25" planar low-frequency radiator; 1 x 1" aluminum dome tweeterDriver complement: 1 x 5.25" bass/midrange driver; 1 x 5.25" planar low-frequency radiator; 1 x 1" aluminum dome tweeterMagnetic shielding: YesMagnetic shielding: YesFinish: Gloss blackFinish: Gloss black
features: 11” TALL TOP-OF-THE-LINE-SPEAKER – Features a proprietary 5-1/4" BDSS driver coupled to a 5-1/4" pressure-driven planar low-frequency radiator, & a 1" pure aluminum dome tweeter for DETAILED AUDIO, EXCEPTIONAL SOUND QUALITY & DEEP POWERFUL BASS

UNIQUE DESIGN FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE - The perpendicular woofer & bass radiator, with an elliptical cabinet reflects Definitive Technology's exemplary design engineering, capable of filling any room with three-dimensional surround sound
VERSATILE USAGE - Use as standalone speakers in a 2.0 channel system, or in a 2.1 channel system with a powered subwoofer, or as satellite surround speakers in your existing home theater setup

CREATE A FULL PROCINEMA 1000 SYSTEM FOR A THRILLING & IMMERSIVE CINEMATIC EXPERIENCE – With a ProCenter 1000 center channel, a ProSub 1000 Subwoofer and 4-8 ProMonitor 800 speakers, you can build an unbeatable home theater in your living room or bedroom

MULTIPLE PLACEMENT OPTIONS – The included pedestal foot helps you safely place the speaker on a shelf or a ProStand (sold separately). For wall/ceiling mounting, use the rear-panel keyhole slot or a 1/4"-20 threaded insert on the back of the speaker

title: Silver Ticket Products STR Series 6 Piece Home Theater Fixed Frame 4K / 8K Ultra HD, HDTV, HDR & Active 3D Movie Projection Screen, 16:9 Format, 135" Diagonal, Woven Acoustic Material STR-169135-WAB
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Television & Video › Accessories › Projector Accessories › Projection Screens
description: The Silver Ticket Products STR-169135-WAB Fixed Frame projection screen offers powerful performance for the price. This screen features real projection screen material, not a sheet. The material is a white, woven 1.1 gain material that is designed for speakers to be placed behind it with no noticeable sound reduction or distortion. This screen truly assembles much faster than any other brand available! Forget about tucking the screen material into the frame - the Silver Ticket Tension Rod System saves you time and frustration. How does the material connect to the frame? Each side of the material has a pocket. A rod slides through the pocket to attach to the frame. This saves you time during assembly, but also removes any puckers or wrinkles in the viewing surface. The rod holds the material perfectly square all around the whole frame. This pocket and rod system remains hidden behind the frame so you only see the movie. Forget about tricky installations - this fixed frame screen mounts on the wall much like a large picture frame. The sturdy aluminum frame is WRAPPED, not flocked, with a light absorbing black velvet fabric to absorb over-projected light so you don't have to be a professional when aligning your projector. While other brands use square tubing in their frames, this screen is built with durable extruded aluminum that contours down to the projected image so you won't have any ugly shadow on the image area. Join the thousands of satisfied customers -- buy Silver Ticket today!
features: Wall Mounted Fixed Frame Projection Screen (Overall Size 72.3" Tall x 123.8" Wide) (Viewing Area 135" Diagonal x 66" Tall x 117.5" Wide) No option for Legs or Stands with this product. Recommended for projectors with Native 16:9 Resolution

Acoustically Transparent (Speakers may be placed behind the screen surface) 1.15 Gain White screen surface with an exceptionally wide viewing angle at 160 degrees with no resolution loss at any viewing angle. Works great with Long, Short and Ultra Short Throw projectors.

3 1/8" heavy duty beveled aluminum frame wrapped in light-absorbing black velvet material for a beautifully crisp viewing image; Enjoy beautiful movies, pictures, and games in FULL HD, 4K and Active 3D

Quick and easy assembly with tensioning rod system ensures that you can bring cinema-quality entertainment to your home in just a few minutes. Secure top and bottom mounting brackets that allow horizontal adjustment
Before purchasing, project an image on wall to determine the size works for the projector and watch the step by step instructional video listed.
Some UST projectors are not compatible with the STR frame. If using a UST projector it is recommended to purchase the S7 frame series.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers like the picture quality, ease of assembly, and build quality of the projection screen. They mention it looks great, is easy to put together, and the clips are easy to connect the screen to the border. Some appreciate the value for money and functionality.

title: Polk Audio Reserve Series R300 Compact Center Channel Loudspeaker for Dynamic, Detailed Audio, 1" Pinnacle Ring Tweeter & Dual 5.25" Turbine Cone Woofers, Hi-Res Certified Wall Mountable Walnut Brown
inStockText: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Center-Channel Speakers
description: Polk Reserve R300 Compact Center Channel Speaker for Immersive Audio Performance. The Polk Reserve R300 Center-Channel Speaker is a high-performance loud speaker that delivers ultra-clear and crisp highs, smooth and detailed midrange, and effortless bass. It features a 1" Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter and dual 5.25" Turbine Cone Woofers with Hi-Res Audio Certification to produce high-quality sound with pure detail. Whether you're listening to music, watching movies, or playing video games, the R300's cross-braced cabinets minimize interior resonances and acoustically inert anti-diffraction magnetic grilles offer a clean aesthetic without sacrificing sound quality. The premium, large 5-way binding posts ensure an easy and efficient setup with loss-less connection. Place this compact center speaker on a stand, shelf, tabletop, any flat surface, or mount it on the wall using integrated rubber feet. Pair with two R100 or R200 bookshelf speakers, and two R600 tower speakers or with two R350s as L/R surroundsl, and add R900 height module for depth (all sold separately) to create a multichannel surround sound system. The R300 is compatible with the latest file formats like DSD, FLAC, WAV, ALAC, and MQA, so you can experience superior audio performance at home.
features: MODERN, COMPACT CENTER CHANNEL SPEAKER - The Polk Reserve R300 Center Channel Loudspeaker features a 1" Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter and dual 5.25" Turbine Cone Woofers that deliver ultra-clear, crisp highs, smooth, detailed midrange & effortless bass

IMMERSIVE AUDIO PERFORMANCE - With Hi-Res Audio Certification, this bass speaker delivers a high-frequency response with clear, crisp vocals and intelligible dialogue for movies and shows. Supports hi-res audio formats like DSD, FLAC, WAV, ALAC, and MQA

CAREFULLY ENGINEERED DESIGN - Features a fully sealed enclosure with carefully cross-braced cabinets that minimize interior resonances, and acoustically inert anti-diffraction magnetic grilles that offer a clean aesthetic without sacrificing sound quality

COMPLEMENTS ANY HOME THEATER SYSTEM - This center channel loud speaker is the voice of any multichannel setup that brings your movies, music, and games to life. The premium, large 5-way binding posts ensure easy & efficient setup with loss-less connection

VERSATILE PLACEMENT OPTIONS - Place the speaker on a stand (sold separately), shelf or tabletop, or mount it on the wall, you can hear it from any corner of the room. The integrated rubber feet allows stable placement and protects the mounting surface

manufacturerAttributes.value: These bookshelf speakers can be used for the front stage of any home theater as well as side and/or rear surrounds. To add immersive vertical sound, Reserve R900 height modules are compatible (R900 sold separately).

manufacturerAttributes.key: High Definition Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter
manufacturerAttributes.value: Over 40 years of tweeter innovation, design and prototyping has led to the development of the new 1" high definition Pinnacle ring radiator tweeter. Developed by Polk Audio, it delivers ultra-clear, crisp highs without unwanted coloration or distortions. The Pinnacle tweeter features a finely tuned waveguide that dramatically improves the dispersion of high frequency energy ensuring a broad "sweet spot" while the critically damped rear-chamber helps defeat any unwanted resonances. Hi-Res Audio certified, the Pinnacle Tweeter is designed for today's two-channel music listening as well as multi-channel 3D audio found in movies, sports, and video game soundtracks.

Polk developed the Turbine cone specifically for our flagship products to ensure the natural reproduction of the mid-range, to which human ears are particularly sensitive. The Turbine cone combines Polk's proprietary foam core and molded Turbine geometry which dramatically increases stiffness and damping, without adding mass. You will hear every detail and experience a smooth, detailed mid-range and effortless bass.
The Reserve R300 center channel speaker is available in three classic vinyl finishes: Midnight Black, Satin White and Chestnut Brown. Satin White and Chestnut Brown coming late 2021.

Polk believes cabinets should be beautiful and add nothing to the playback. Polk Reserve cabinets, braces, and internal enclosures are carefully engineered to minimize unwanted internal standing waves and eliminate unwanted resonances. The result is a cabinet that rigidly holds the transducer array while it faithfully reproduces recordings.
The R300 features a fully sealed enclosure to prevent resonances and distortions.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Complements Your Home Theater 
These bookshelf speakers can be used for the front stage of any home theater as well as side and/or rear surrounds. To add immersive vertical sound, Reserve R900 height modules are compatible (R900 sold separately). 
	
High Definition Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter 
Over 40 years of tweeter innovation, design and prototyping has led to the development of the new 1" high definition Pinnacle ring radiator tweeter. Developed by Polk Audio, it delivers ultra-clear, crisp highs without unwanted coloration or distortions. The Pinnacle tweeter features a finely tuned waveguide that dramatically improves the dispersion of high frequency energy ensuring a broad "sweet spot" while the critically damped rear-chamber helps defeat any unwanted resonances. Hi-Res Audio certified, the Pinnacle Tweeter is designed for today's two-channel music listening as well as multi-channel 3D audio found in movies, sports, and video game soundtracks. 
	
5.25" Turbine Cone 
Polk developed the Turbine cone specifically for our flagship products to ensure the natural reproduction of the mid-range, to which human ears are particularly sensitive. The Turbine cone combines Polk's proprietary foam core and molded Turbine geometry which dramatically increases stiffness and damping, without adding mass. You will hear every detail and experience a smooth, detailed mid-range and effortless bass. 
	
Sleek Modern Design 
The Reserve R300 center channel speaker is available in three classic vinyl finishes: Midnight Black, Satin White and Chestnut Brown. Satin White and Chestnut Brown coming late 2021. 
	
Cabinets Built for Better Performance 
Polk believes cabinets should be beautiful and add nothing to the playback. Polk Reserve cabinets, braces, and internal enclosures are carefully engineered to minimize unwanted internal standing waves and eliminate unwanted resonances. The result is a cabinet that rigidly holds the transducer array while it faithfully reproduces recordings. 
	
Fully Sealed Enclosure 
The R300 features a fully sealed enclosure to prevent resonances and distortions.

From the manufacturer
About Us 
RCA (Radio Corporation of America) is an iconic brand that has endured from generation-to-generation. Its timeless logo and technological advances have permeated worldwide culture as a symbol of quality and reliability. Today, the RCA brand symbolizes American ingenuity worldwide. Its iconic name can be found on flat-panel and 4K televisions, tablets, smartphones, home appliances, and many other extraordinary products. From our biggest public moments to the smaller, more personal ones, RCA has been part of our lives and will continue to be today, tomorrow, and for years to come. RCA is in tune with inspiration and innovation for your future needs.

title: Monoprice SSW-8 Slim Powered Subwoofer - 8 Inch Woofer, 100 Watt, Low Profile, Powerful Amp, Low Pass, RCA and Speaker Level Terminal Inputs, Black
inStockText: In Stock  Only 3 left in stock - order soon.

description: The Monoprice ssw-8 is a 8" 100-Watt powered subwoofer that helps alleviate subwoofer placement in any room. This slim, low profile ported subwoofer can be placed under your favorite chairs, behind your TV stand, or under your sofa. The subwoofer includes on-wall mounting brackets, allowing you place it on the wall, if you prefer. Fortunately, you will not have to skimp on bass output, as the ssw-8 has been specifically engineered to take advantage of its distinctive enclosure.
features: Slim, low profile: the Monoprice ssw-8 features a ported cabinet that's designed to deliver ample bass output from a slim, low profile enclosure. You can slide it under your favorite chair or sofa, place it behind your TV stand, or even Mount it on your living room wall

8" Ported design: the ssw-8 features a full-sized 8" Woofer housed in a ported, bass-reflex enclosure that is designed to maximize bass output from its slim, low profile design. With a frequency response that extends down to 30Hz, you won't have to skimp on the bass

Powerful amplifier: the ssw-8 is outfitted with a 100-watt amplifier designed specifically for subwoofers. It features the ability to set volume, low Pass filter, phase, and is equipped with both line level RCA jacks and speaker level Terminal inputs
Buy with confidence: Monoprice not only stands behind every product we sell with a 1 year Replacement warranty, We offer a 30-day money back guarantee as well!
Quality at a fair price: Monoprice's rugged design and rigid quality control standards deliver high quality products at fair prices

title: Panamax M8-AV-PRO Home Theater Power Management (Black)
inStockText: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.  Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Accessories & Supplies › Power Strips & Surge Protectors › Surge Protectors
description: Product DescriptionKeep your home theater equipment safe with this 8-outlet surge protector that features an 1875-joule rating and cable, satellite, antenna, telephone and network line protection to protect components from power spikes and surges.From the ManufacturerThe M8-AV-PRO is designed to provide noise isolation between the two isolated outlet banks so that any noise created by an A/V component in one bank cannot contaminate the power to the equipment that is plugged into the other outlet bank.   M8-AV-PRO eliminates voltage irregularities and protects your AV system.Click here for a larger image  Home Theater Power Management AC power, telephone and coax lines can provide direct pathways for surges and spikes to enter and damage expensive audio/video equipment. M8-AV-PRO eliminates voltage irregularities & protects your AV system.Reduces Cross-Contamination Between Components The M8-AV-PRO is designed to provide noise isolation between the two isolated outlet banks so that any noise created by an A/V component in one bank cannot contaminate the power to the equipment that is plugged into the other outlet bank.Monitors Incoming Line Voltage Panamax's patented AVM circuitry continuously monitors the incoming line voltage and disconnects your equipment in the event of an over voltage or undervoltage (brownout). Power is automatically reconnected when voltage returns to a safe level, eliminating service calls or system downtimeImproves Picture and Sound Quality The M8-AV-PRO's Power Cleaning and Premium Filtration eliminate common symptoms of contaminated power (including loss of detail, hisses, hums and visual artifacts) and allows your A/V equipment to perform up to its full capability.M8-AV-PRO FeaturesPremium Filtration Improves Picture and Sound. Provides clean power by filtering out noise common to household power.AVM (Automatic Voltage Monitoring) Protects equipment against prolonged over/ under voltages by disconnecting the power and reconnecting it when safe power returns.COAX/SAT Protection Protects equipment from electrical surges that travel over Cable, Satellite, and Antenna lines.12 Volt Trigger Allows source equipment to activate or deactivate outlets 5-8 on the M8-HT-PRO.Telephone/LAN Line Protection Protects equipment from electrical surges that travel over Telephone and network lines.8 Outlets More outlets for all of your power needs.Surge Protection Exclusive Protect or Disconnect circuitry. In the event of a catastophic surge such as lightning, it completely disconnects AC power to connected equipmentHi-Def Ready Designed to work with your High Definition system.The Panamax Family of Floor Model Power Protection Solutions for Home Theater and Home Office Applications  What's in the Box

12-volt trigger allows source equipment to activate or deactivate four of eight outlets

features: [5G/2.4G Dual-Band WiFi] The projector with wifi and Bluetooth boasts 5G+2.4G dual-band WiFi tech capable of receiving a WiFi signal on 2 frequencies at the same time, allowing more flexibility and bandwidth to transmit smoother and speed faster. When you are projecting a video on your phone or gaming on X-box, PS4/5, Switch, you can enjoy a smooth viewing and gaming experience.

[4K Support & 12000L] FUDONI 4k projector brings movies in native 1080P resolution and true 12000 lumen brightness in a dark environment. Its brilliant colors and high contrast will provide more explicit, brighter images, bringing you a cinema viewing experience, which is ideal for enjoying outdoor movie nights, FIFA nights, and exciting gaming.

[Bluetooth 5.1 & High-fidelity Sound] The Bluetooth projector built-in Hi-Fi speakers, restore every detail sound effect and bring you stunning and loud sound enjoyment for home theater. Bluetooth 5.1 connection tech allows you pair with an external Bluetooth speaker/headphone/soundbar to enhance audio effects anytime and anywhere.

[Max 300" Display & Zoom Function] The projection size ranges from 30 to 300 inches, it can achieve a stunning projection size within a short projection distance despite the limited space. The outdoor projector also provides zoom of 100% to 50% which means you adjust the screen size at a fixed place, you don't need to move the portable projector anymore. The detachable dust filter can effectively resist dust, reduce black spots and image loss, and extend the lifespan of the projector.

[Wide Compatibility & User-Friendly] The movie projector has HDMI, USB, AV ports, which can be properly compatible with a TV Stick/smartphone/PC/laptop for more fun in your home entertainment. It can be timed shut down and supports desktop placement, tripod mount, and ceiling mount. Perfect for home, outdoor movie nights, parties, camping, games, and other entertainment needs.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Why Do We Highly Recommend the FUDONI 4K Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth？ 
5G + 2.4G Dual Band WiFi Connection
Native 1080P, 4K Supported Resolution
12000 Lumen High Brightness & 10000:1 Contrast Ratio
Bluetooth 5.1 & HiFi Speaker
Max 300 " Display & 50%-100% Zoom
3.6ft-32.8ft(1.1m-10.4m) Projection Distance
32"-300" Projection Size 
80000 Hours Lamp Life & Detachable Dust-proof Filter
Ceiling Mount/Floor Standing/Table Mount/Wall Mount
100 Inch Projector Screen Included
Bluetooth 5.1 Connection 
Equipped with Bluetooth 5.1, the Bluetooth projector has a long transmission distance and high speed. It can wirelessly connect your Bluetooth speakers, Bluetooth headphones, Airpods and Soundbars or other audio devices anytime. Movie projectors unlocked the shift from built-in high quality speakers to stereo surround sound around the environment, you can enjoy excellent and loud sound quality in different scenes. 
Note: When you are trying to connect to a Bluetooth device, please make sure the Bluetooth device is in Pair Mode before click the scan button. 
300" Mega Screen, Immersive Viewing Experience 
The movie projector provides a max 300" display, bring you a real, dynamic, and colorful 1080P high-definition projection image quality. With included 100" projector screen also allows you to enjoy movies outdoor so you can slow down in this fast-paced life. 
Built-in HiFi Stereo Speaker 
Built-in dual HiFi stereo speakers (5W) with SRS sound system. With double clear sound quality, the speakers can restore every sound detail to offer you delicate, real sound effects, bringing you an immersive viewing experience. It also provide 5 Sound Modes (Movie/Music/Sports/User/Standard), allow you to customize the sound mode you want. 
Long-Lasting Lamp Life 
The 4K projector is equipped with a high-quality LED lamp which can offer you bright, clear, sharp image even during daytime. Besides, the projector is equipped with 2 cooling fans, which maximizes heat dissipation and reduces lamp power consumption to extend the lamp life more than 80,000 hours. 
Detachable Dust-proof Filter 
The projector dust-proof filter can prevent dust entering the machine or falling on the lens, ensured that no black spots on clarity image, thus extend the lifespan of your movie projector. 
Your life will become more interesting with this movie projector: 
Celebrate sports events in front of the 300'' big screen
Holiday decoration projection(fake window, birthday party, celebration, graduation. etc)
Immersive experience the world in the game
Watching favorite movies with friends outdoors/camping
Lie in bed and enjoy your time alone with a movie
Watch the video together to memory the sweet time in the past
Enjoy fitness course at home
Sewing, art creation, etc.
Warm Tips: 
1.It is recommended to use the home theater projector in a dark environment, it will perform the best effect. 
2.Please make sure that the projector and your phone connect to the same router WiFi, and keep your projector on the "Screen Mirroring for iOS/Android System" page before using your smartphone to project the screen. 
3.Please note that keystone correction is vertically ±15°, if half of the projection image is blurry, please adjust the height of the lens. 
4.For the Bluetooth 5.1 function, the Bluetooth projector can be used as a Bluetooth transmitter to connect to Bluetooth/speakers/earphones, etc., but it cannot be used as a receiver to connect to mobile phones and computers.
