title: Polk Audio Reserve R100 Small Bookshelf Speaker for Dynamic, Detailed Home Theater Audio, 1" Pinnacle Ring Tweeter & 5.25" Turbine Cone Woofer, Dolby Atmos & IMAX Enhanced, Wall Mountable, White
inStockText: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Bookshelf Speakers
description: Polk Reserve R100 Small Bookshelf Speaker with Exceptional Audio Performance The Polk Reserve R100 Bookshelf Speaker is a high-performance loudspeaker that delivers ultra-clear and crisp highs, smooth and detailed midrange, and effortless bass. It features a 1" Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter and a 5.25" Turbine Cone Woofer that produce unmatched audio clarity with Hi-Res Audio Certification, Dolby Atmos, and IMAX Enhanced support. Whether you're listening to music, watching movies, or playing video games, the R100's bass reflex cabinet with a rear-firing port and Polk's Patented X-Port Technology with Eigentone Filter (ETF) ensures tight, distortion-free bass for an immersive audio experience. The premium, large 5-way binding posts ensure an easy and efficient setup with a lossless connection. Place this loudspeaker on a stand, shelf, tabletop, or any flat surface, and add another R100 speaker & pair it with two R500 towers and an R300 center channel, or pair it with three R350s as L/R surrounds and center channel, and add R900 height module for depth (all sold separately) to create a multichannel surround sound system. The R100 is compatible with the latest file formats like DSD, FLAC, WAV, ALAC, and MQA, so you can experience superior audio performance at home.
features: TECHNOLOGICALLY SUPERIOR, SMALL BOOKSHELF SPEAKER - The Polk Reserve R100 Bookshelf Loudspeaker features a 1" Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter & a 5.25" Turbine Cone Woofer that deliver ultra-clear, crisp highs, smooth, detailed midrange & effortless bass

EXCEPTIONAL AUDIO PERFORMANCE - With Hi-Res Audio Certification, Dolby Atmos and IMAX Enhanced, this speaker delivers clear and dynamic high-frequency response with unmatchable audio clarity. Supports hi-res audio formats like DSD, FLAC, WAV, ALAC and MQA

DEEP, IMPACTFUL BASS - Features a bass reflex cabinet with a rear-firing port and Polk's Patented X-Port Technology with Eigentone Filter (ETF) that eliminates unwanted noise, offering tight, distortion-free bass for your music, movies, and video games

COMPLEMENTS ANY HOME THEATER SYSTEM - This small but loud speaker can be used as a front, side, and/or rear surround for any multichannel surround sound system. The premium, large 5-way binding posts ensure easy, efficient setup with loss-less connection

CAREFULLY ENGINEERED, ELEGANT DESIGN - The Reserve Series cabinets are carefully cross-braced to minimize interior resonances, while the acoustically inert anti-diffraction magnetic grilles offer a clean, modern aesthetic without sacrificing sound quality

manufacturerAttributes.key: High Definition Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter
manufacturerAttributes.value: Over 40 years of tweeter innovation, design and prototyping has led to the development of the new 1" high definition Pinnacle ring radiator tweeter. Developed by Polk Audio, it delivers ultra-clear, crisp highs without unwanted coloration or distortions. The Pinnacle tweeter features a finely tuned waveguide that dramatically improves the dispersion of high frequency energy ensuring a broad "sweet spot" while the critically damped rear-chamber helps defeat any unwanted resonances. Hi-Res certified, the Pinnacle Tweeter is designed for today's two-channel music listening as well as multi-channel 3D audio found in movies, sports, and video game soundtracks.

Polk developed the Turbine cone specifically for our flagship products to ensure the natural reproduction of the mid-range, to which human ears are particularly sensitive. The Turbine cone combines Polk's proprietary foam core and molded Turbine geometry which dramatically increases stiffness and damping, without adding mass. You will hear every detail and experience a smooth, detailed mid-range and effortless bass.

Polk's newly patented X-Port incorporates an Eigentone Filter (ETF) offering distortion-free, effortless bass. Consisting of a set of closed-pipe absorbers that are specifically tuned to catch and eliminate traditional speaker distortions. X-Port ensures that the upper bass and mid-range are free of port and cabinet resonances for smooth, detailed audio.
Reserve RlOO bookshelf speakers are available in three modern finishes: Midnight Black, Satin White, and Chestnut Brown. Satin White and Chestnut Brown coming late 2021.

Polk believes cabinets should be beautiful and add nothing to the playback. Polk Reserve cabinets, braces, and internal enclosures are carefully engineered to minimize unwanted internal standing waves and eliminate unwanted resonances. The result is a cabinet that rigidly holds the transducer array while it faithfully reproduces recordings.

Your sound is only as good as your source. With Hi-Res Audio certification, the Polk Reserve R100 delivers clear and detailed high-end response. Female vocals are particularly smooth and without coloration.

High Definition Pinnacle Ring Radiator Tweeter 
Over 40 years of tweeter innovation, design and prototyping has led to the development of the new 1" high definition Pinnacle ring radiator tweeter. Developed by Polk Audio, it delivers ultra-clear, crisp highs without unwanted coloration or distortions. The Pinnacle tweeter features a finely tuned waveguide that dramatically improves the dispersion of high frequency energy ensuring a broad "sweet spot" while the critically damped rear-chamber helps defeat any unwanted resonances. Hi-Res certified, the Pinnacle Tweeter is designed for today's two-channel music listening as well as multi-channel 3D audio found in movies, sports, and video game soundtracks. 
	
5.25" Turbine Cone 
Polk developed the Turbine cone specifically for our flagship products to ensure the natural reproduction of the mid-range, to which human ears are particularly sensitive. The Turbine cone combines Polk's proprietary foam core and molded Turbine geometry which dramatically increases stiffness and damping, without adding mass. You will hear every detail and experience a smooth, detailed mid-range and effortless bass. 
	
Polk Newly Patented X-Port (ETF) 
Polk's newly patented X-Port incorporates an Eigentone Filter (ETF) offering distortion-free, effortless bass. Consisting of a set of closed-pipe absorbers that are specifically tuned to catch and eliminate traditional speaker distortions. X-Port ensures that the upper bass and mid-range are free of port and cabinet resonances for smooth, detailed audio. 
	
Sleek Modern Design 
Reserve RlOO bookshelf speakers are available in three modern finishes: Midnight Black, Satin White, and Chestnut Brown. Satin White and Chestnut Brown coming late 2021. 
	
Cabinets Built for Better Performance 
Polk believes cabinets should be beautiful and add nothing to the playback. The result is a cabinet that rigidly holds the transducer array while it faithfully reproduces recordings.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
TX-NR696 7.2-Channel Network AV Receiver 
This SMART AV Receiver gathers Chromecast built-in*1, Works with Sonos, AirPlay 2, and DTS Play-Fi with streaming services for smooth multi-room audio. 
THX CERTIFIED 
With literally thousands of tests, before earning the THX-certification logo: no matter what input is used, no matter what combination of the many built-in features for the AVR, preamplifier, or amplifier, there can be absolutely nothing added, nothing taken away from the source material. 
KLIPSCH OPTIMIZE MODE 
Klipsch Optimize Mode allows you to easily integrate your Klipsch Reference and Reference Premiere speakers seamlessly with your Onkyo AV receiver. Klipsch and Onkyo teamed up to implement the precise crossover values for specific new Reference Premiere speakers. Now, you can simply select the model speakers you’ll be using for each individual channel, and the optimized crossover setting will be automatically applied. 
SMART AV RECEIVER 
SMART AV Receiver is the heart of your home entertainment system. Access streaming content from Amazon Music*1, Pandora*2, Spotify*2, TIDAL*2, Deezer*2, and TuneIn*2 and share sound as part of a multi-room system via Works with Sonos, AirPlay 2, DTS Play-Fi, and FlareConnect. 
DOLBY ATMOS 
Dolby Atmos and DTS:X wrap the audience in the latest films and games by moving effects from effects moving from speaker to speaker. aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Monolith M2100X Multi-Channel Home Theater Power Amplifier 
2x90 Watts Per Channel with RCA & XLR Inputs

The Monolith M3100X features high quality, class AB amplification and is the perfect amplifier to upgrade your amps in a receiver, handle height/effects channels in a larger system, or to be the backbone of a home theater system in smaller rooms. The M3100 is a three-channel power amplifier that delivers 90 watts per channel into 8 Ohms (all channels driven) with less than 0.02% THD and a signal to noise ratio greater than -100dB. Hook up is a breeze by utilizing either the unbalanced RCA inputs or unbalanced XLR inputs make it easy to connect to any receiver or pre/pro. The Monolith M3100 multi-channel amplifier combines power and performance to deliver high quality music or home theater sound quality in any application.

The unique subwoofer offers big box sound in a space-efficient, cylinder-shaped enclosure for deep, solid bass. Our Nero-TubeBass10 is a down-firing subwoofer by design and coupled with the cylindrical design allows extremely low distortion and clean deep bass. 
Space-efficient, cylinder-shaped enclosure 
Decoupled with feet so not in direct contact with the floor 
10” down-firing driver serves up distortion-free bass 
Variable Size Range 
We want you to have options, and with multiple size ranges from Single 8”, Dual 8”, and up to 12”, we have the right size subwoofer for your needs. 
	
In-Wall to Floor Standing Designs 
Some customers would rather hear than see their subwoofer, which is why we offer sub options from a discreet trimless in-wall to powerful floor standing designs. 
	
Bold Deep Bass 
Enjoy deep, smooth, low bass to deliver extreme sensory pleasure to your Home Theater, Media Room, or 2 Channel Stereo System. 
	
High-Power Handling 
Our subs offer efficient high-power handling for optimal sound output. Improve otherwise thin-sounding speaker setups with spine-tingling bass notes.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
About us 
In the late 20th century, Pyle established itself as a premium source for replacement speakers and car audio. By the year 2000, Pyle had undergone a massive transformation, expanding into the nascent market spaces of competitive car audio, home audio, marine audio, and professional audio & musical instruments - our Pyle Pro line. As you sit in your car, you are isolated from outside noise and surrounded by speakers. You become enveloped in sound. We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. You’d be surprised at how much better your music can sound with an upgrade from the factory speakers and amplifier. 
Pyle Car: 
We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. And we don’t just focus on audio at Pyle Car. Cars are a big part of our lives, and we offer a variety of products and accessories that can enhance your experience and turn your car into a modern media system on wheels, including navigation systems, DVD players, and iPod interfaces. At Pyle, we also care about your safety. That’s why we’ve also got a full line of rear and front-facing cameras that can be wired to a monitor in your car – so you can park in those tight spots or see around corners with ease. 
Pyle Home: 
Start with your home theater, a stalwart of any modern house. We’ve got projectors, TVs, mounts, and stands, just to get started – all fully equipped with state-of-the-art HD technology, compatible with beautiful video game consoles like Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Wii, as well as your favorite Blu-Ray players, for crisp, hi-res images that explode in your eye on a mind-blowing scale. Of course, Pyle Home also carries all the cables and adaptors you need for a fully operational setup that’s sure to be the envy of your neighbors. 
There’s plenty more to keep you entertained. Bass-expanding mini speakers that run on rechargeable batteries and play your digital music, wherever you go. Perfect for the dorm room or sitting by the pool. Headphones. Vintage turntables – get the look of yesterday’s classic phonographs with today’s high-quality manufacturing standards. Power amplifiers, horn speakers, and waterproof speakers for your garden. Tripods and speaker stands. 
Pyle Pro: 
features a huge range of musical instruments, DJ equipment, and accessories for your every need. All of our products have been designed with the professional in mind. You don't just see or hear the quality - you feel it. And whether you're a hard-working musician, studio engineer, or even a budding amateur, Pyle Pro has something to offer. 
Among Pyle Pro’s most popular items are our PA Systems. Pyle is constantly modernizing these powerful devices to meet the demands of the modern user. Our flagship PAs include wireless microphones, rechargeable batteries, and iPod/iPhone docks. They’re great for use in large areas and events – at churches for weddings, at schools, gyms, birthday parties – anything indoor or outdoor where your voice needs to be heard loud and clear. And they’re easily transportable, thanks to caster wheels and telescoping handles. Use it for any audio – voice, guitar, CD, MP3 player – they handle everything. 
Pyle’s emerging guitar line is also grabbing the attention of the music industry. Models are available in double-cutaway and Les Paul styles, with solid rosewood bodies in a variety of colors. Beginner kits including Pyle has also introduced a huge variety of effects pedals. Rounding out Pyle Pro’s line are our USB-to-analog converters, including a 2-channel mixer with USB input and output.

title: Monoprice 2-Way Carbon Fiber In-Wall Center Channel Speaker - Dual 5.25 Inch (Single) Easy Install For Home Theater - Alpha Series,Off-White
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Center-Channel Speakers
description: This carbon fiber in-ceiling speaker is the perfect combination of performance and style. The use of carbon fiber for the woofer means that the speaker can hit harder, go lower, and handle more power with significantly less distortion than conventional drivers. The silk dome tweeter produces clean, crisp, and clear highs and mids. You can fine tune the blend of sound using the built-in high frequency attenuator in case the sound is too bright. The metal grille can be painted to match your ceiling and attaches easily using magnets.  All Alpha series in-wall and ceiling speakers are sonically matched to provide a uniform sound stage across you entire listening area. Simple two channel listening rooms to full screening rooms with 7.2.4 Atmos and DTS-X immersive cinema systems will benefit from the matched components of the Alpha series carbon fiber installation speakers.
features: Carbon Fiber drivers hit harder with deeper bass and handle more power significantly less distortion than conventional drivers.
Immerse yourself in airy detailed clarity with defined vocals and dialog from 1” silk dome tweeters of these installed speakers.
Enjoy Alpha speakers as main home theater speakers and whole home house systems or add as surrounds and immersive sound sources.
No logo SlimFit Magnetic Grills add to the minimal look and increases the “Wife Acceptance Factor”.
Buy confidently with a 30-day money-back guarantee and our 1-year warranty.

manufacturerAttributes.value: Sound Quality: Life is too short for speakers that don't sound great! We believe that the whole point of listening to music is to hear it as the artist intended. Our engineers and audio experts have spent countless hours listening to and comparing various speakers until we were satisfied we had found models that fit our demanding standards.

Style: While Monoprice believes in function over form, there is nothing wrong with having speakers that look good, too. This in-wall speaker helps reduce clutter by getting your speakers off the floor or bookshelves, and the magnetic metal grille can be painted to match your wall, so it virtually disappears from view.

Simplicity: Installation is as easy as it can get. Use the included cutout template to mark your wall, make the cut, then using only a screwdriver, secure the speaker to the wall with the easy install mounting tabs.

title: Bose Acoustimass 6 Series V Home Theater Speaker System (Black)
inStockText: Usually ships within 12 to 13 days
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Surround Sound Systems
description: The Acoustimass 6 Series V home theater speaker system delivers theater-like 5.1 surround sound. The small Virtually Invisible Series II speakers have been redesigned with a slimmer profile and can be mounted flush to the wall, so they better match flat-panel TVs. The Acoustimass module provides deep low-note performance - and it can be hidden out of sight behind a couch or curtain. Together, they bring Bose performance to TV, sports, movies, video games and music. You'll enjoy all your entertainment more, every day. Pair the speakers with your choice of A/V receiver, and you'll experience theater-like sound with powerful bass. The Acoustimass module has adjustable controls for volume and low-frequency effects. The system includes cables and connectors that are clearly marked for easy installation and setup.
features: The most popular Acoustimass system from Bose delivers surround sound best suited for average sized rooms
Redesigned Virtually Invisible Series II speakers are low profile and can mount flush to your wall
Deep low notes from powered Acoustimass module
Adjustable controls for volume and low frequency effects
Cables and connectors included and clearly marked for easy setup

Bose Acoustimass 6 Series V home theater speaker system 
Theater-like 5.1 surround sound for all your entertainment. 
The most popular Acoustimass system from Bose delivers surround sound best suited for average-sized rooms 
Redesigned Virtually Invisible Series II speakers are low profile and can mount flush to your wall 
Deep low notes from powered Acoustimass module 
Adjustable controls for volume and low-frequency effects 
Cables and connectors included and clearly marked for easy setup 
Theater-like sound, right at home 
Pack a little punch into your movies, music and sports with this popular home theater speaker system from Bose. The Acoustimass 6 Series V system features five Virtually Invisible Series II cube speakers for quality surround sound. A powered Acoustimass module offers low-frequency effects that lend realism and emotional impact to everything you watch. 
Small speakers. Surprising performance. 
Slim and stylish Virtually Invisible speakers only stand about 3.5 inches high. But they reproduce a level of sound that belies their size. The kind of sound that adds impact to action sequences and a newfound power to your music. Newly redesigned, the speakers fit snug to your wall with optional brackets, so they blend in nicely with your HDTV as well. 

What’s in the box 
5 Virtually Invisible Series II cube speakers 
Powered Acoustimass module 
1 system input cable – 20 ft 
2 rear speaker cables – 50 ft 
3 front speaker cables – 20 ft 
Adhesive-backed rubber feet 
Power cord 
Low notes. Low profile. 
Virtually Invisible speaker redesigned with a slimmer profile for mounting flush to the wall. 
The powered Acoustimass module adds a big assist to the small cube speakers by providing deep, low notes. Whether it’s a haunting score or an oncoming storm, you’ll feel the realistic effects at any volume level, without audible distortion. And you can tailor those effects to your liking with adjustable controls for volume and low-frequency effects. And to preserve your desired room aesthetics, you can even place the module out of view behind a couch or curtain.

title: Klipsch 3.1 Ebony Home Theater System with 2 RP-5000F Front Speaker, 1 RP-504C Center Speaker, 1 SPL-120 Subwoofer
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Surround Sound Systems
description: Klipsch RP-5000F Floorstanding Speaker: The Klipsch RP-5000F floorstanding speaker takes your movies and music to a new level. Featuring our proprietary hybrid Tractrix horn-loaded technology and dual 5.25" spun copper Cerametallic woofers, this floorstanding speaker is the ideal home theater audio solution.Klipsch RP-504C Center Channel Speaker: Room-filling sound from Klipsch What makes the Klipsch Reference Premiere Home Theater System? The RP-504C is the largest and most powerful center channel in the series - perfect for large rooms where you want to be pulled directly into the action as it unfolds on the screen. It features four 5-1/4" spun-copper woofers for punchy bass and dynamic midrange, and Klipsch's signature 1" horn-loaded tweeter for exceptionally accurate dialogue and center-stage sound effects.Klipsch SPL-120 Subwoofer: The SPL-120 subwoofer is a step up from the Klipsch Reference series. Featuring a high-efficiency Class-D amplifier and spun copper Cerametallic woofer, the Klipsch SPL series subwoofers deliver best-in-class low-frequency output. The built-in, high efficiency amplifier features an analog preamp design, which maintains the original signal path for cleaner, true-to-source reproduction. The Class D output stage ensures maximum efficiency for maximum output, detail, and low frequency power.

features: PREMINUM SPEAKER WIRE – Use this GearIT Pro Series Speaker Wire Cable that’s build quality stranded conductors to build this professional grade speaker wire audio cable

CUSTOM INSTALLATIONS – You can use this speaker wire to pair with banana plugs, spade tips, or bent pin connectors to connect your speakers to your A/V receiver or amplifier with this GearIT Pro Series speaker wire.

ADVANTAGE OF CCA (COPPER CLAD ALUMINUM) – Here are the facts about CCA vs Oxygen Free Copper. CCA wire offers the same signal frequency and reliability in terms of corrosion resistance to copper wire. The advantage of the CCA speaker wire is lighter and more flexible than copper wire. The cost of CCA vs Oxygen free copper is much lower and you can enjoy the same functions and reliability as copper wire without paying the extra cost for the installation.

HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIAL AND TIER 1 MANUFACTURE PROCESS - The cable is made of CCA Copper Clad Aluminum, ensuring high fidelity sound quality and providing maximum's conductivity and durability without paying the additional cost. The product go through many states of testing to ensure the highest performance and reliability of the products.

PRO SERIES LIFETIME GURANTEED – We stands for the highest quality product and customer satisfaction. If you are not happy with the product in anyway we offer an easy return policy. All product come with our top rated lifetime warranty service.

title: Klipsch 9.2 Ebony Home Theater System with 2 RP-8000F, 1 RP-504C, 6 RP-502S, 2 SPL-120 SUB
inStockText: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.

description: Klipsch RP-8000F Floorstanding Speaker: The Klipsch RP-8000F floorstanding speaker delivers incredible cinematic sound by leveraging our proprietary Tractrix horn-loaded technology and dual 8" copper-spun Cerametallic woofers.Klipsch RP-504C Center Channel Speaker: Room-filling sound from Klipsch What makes the Klipsch Reference Premiere Home Theater System? The RP-504C is the largest and most powerful center channel in the series - perfect for large rooms where you want to be pulled directly into the action as it unfolds on the screen. It features four 5-1/4" spun-copper woofers for punchy bass and dynamic midrange, and Klipsch's signature 1" horn-loaded tweeter for exceptionally accurate dialogue and center-stage sound effects.Klipsch RP-502S Surround Sound Speakers: The Reference Premiere RP-502S surround speakers deliver the highest performing and encompassing sound possible. No other brand can bring this theater-quality surround sound experience into your home like Klipsch. Reference Premiere Piano Black speakers undergo a painstaking three-layer paint and polish process that results in a deep, vivid reflection for a bold yet elegant finish.Klipsch SPL-120 Subwoofer: The SPL-120 subwoofer is a step up from the Klipsch Reference series. Featuring a high-efficiency Class-D amplifier and spun copper Cerametallic woofer, the Klipsch SPL series subwoofers deliver best-in-class low-frequency output. The built-in, high efficiency amplifier features an analog preamp design, which maintains the original signal path for cleaner, true-to-source reproduction. The Class D output stage ensures maximum efficiency for maximum output, detail, and low frequency power.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
OSD NERO HTA7200 7 Channel 210W/Ch Surround Sound Home Theater Amplifier 
The OSD Nero HTA7200 is a high-performance home theater amplifier with seven channels, each offering up to 210 watts at 4 ohms & 145 watts at 8 ohms. It features both XLR & RCA inputs for versatile connectivity & low noise, along with a 12V trigger. The amplifier's design includes channel LEDs to monitor its status & a high signal-to-noise ratio to ensure a wide dynamic range for superior sound clarity. Ideal for audiophiles, the HTA7200 is capable of delivering cinema-quality sound levels. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
The OSD Nero HTA7200 Multi-Channel Home Theater Amplifier is engineered for audiophiles who demand precision and power. This advanced amplifier now offers an enhanced power output of 210W per channel, significantly upgraded from the previous 180W, providing robust and dynamic sound performance. 
High Wattage Output 
This amplifier delivers a robust 210W per channel across seven channels, ensuring dynamic & powerful sound suitable for high-definition home theaters 
Surround Sound 
With its 7-channel output, the HTA7200 creates a rich, immersive surround sound environment that enhances the audio of your movies, music, & games 
Easy Integration 
Whether you’re connecting professional-grade equipment or standard home audio sources, the RCA & XLR options allow for seamless integration 
12V Trigger 
With an integrated 12V trigger, the HTA7200 ensures that the amplifier can be easily activated or deactivated from a centralized control point​

Balance XLR Input

Integrated 12V Trigger

Speaker Terminals

title: Acoustic Audio PSW-15 Down Firing Powered Subwoofer (Black)
inStockText: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Subwoofers
description: Acoustic Audio's Audiophile Series powered subs immerse you in the action of your fast-paced movies and sports. Add impact to your favorite movies and full-bodied bass to your favorite tunes with a sub that's barely a cubic foot. Its stylish design and superior sound make it a smart addition to any home theater. Its elegant black ash finish is refined and complements most flat-panel displays. It features a high-current, 600-watt amp which effortlessly drives its down-firing 15" woofer for dynamic low-frequency effects. The high and low inputs let you use any receiver or processor. The 15" woofer utilizes a long excursion cone for deep, accurate response. The MDF bass-reflex enclosure features internal bracing, and a 22Hz to 250Hz frequency response delivers thumping bass from all your action movies and CD albums.
features: HOME THEATER POWERED SUBWOOFER - Standard RCA inputs easily connect to your home theater receivers dedicated Subwoofer Output. Save power with the added Signal Sensing Auto ON/OFF feature
600 WATTS PEAK POWER - Integrated high efficiency power amplifier, 22 - 250 Hz with 99dB at 8ohm, Auto ON/OFF and 0 - 180 degree Phase control switches, Gain and 40 - 140 Hz Crossover control knobs

15 INCH DOWN FIRING WOOFER - Long throw woofer with high rigidity PVA Treated cone, bottom slotted port, Bass Reflex cabinet design with vibration absorbing feet, high quality MDF with added internal bracing and black ash finish

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - Standard US 110V grounded wall plug, any home theater receiver with dual or single RCA dedicated Subwoofer passive output, home receiver or stereo with raw wire outputs. Use for home theater and surround sound systems

WHAT'S IN THE BOX - Acoustic Audio by PSW-15 powered subwoofer, 6 foot dual RCA cable, RCA "Y" adapter, instruction manual - Standing sub with feet size is (H x W x D) 14.6" × 16.5" × 18.5" - NOT LFE Compatible
Included components: 1 Powered Subwoofer Speaker, 1 Dual RCA 6 Foot Cable, 1 RCA "Y" Adapter, Instruction Manual

The amplifier additionally features adjustable independent gain/level control, phase control switch, low level and speaker level inputs/outputs, signal sensing auto On/Off function and variable low pass frequency control.

manufacturerAttributes.key: Internally Braced and Damped MDF Bass Reflex Enclosure
manufacturerAttributes.value: PSW Subs feature a ported enclosure that is internally braced and lined with gray batting to ensure the subwoofer stays stable and steady even at radical volume levels, for more efficient use of power. They are engineered for perfect volume, tuned for distortion free low frequencies and equipped to eliminate resonances.

PSW Subs have a subtle long throw subwoofer located on the bottom of the enclosure. Our sub utilizes a long excursion, high rigidity PVA treated cone for the most accurate response. The enclosure includes a bottom slotted bass port and sleek triangular feet to more efficiently produce maximum bass impact.

The low profile enclosure with beautiful black finish and modern style complements the decor of any home theater. As the finishing touch of the PSW Sub, the discrete black ash wood finish creates an immersive feel to an already impressive subwoofer.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Acoustic Audio by Goldwood PSW Home Theater Powered Subwoofers 
Where Power Meets Style... 
Acoustic Audio by Goldwood PSW Powered Subs are designed with your unique style in mind! Our sleek design and unmatched sound make it a necessary addition to any home theater. The elegant black ash wood finish is subtle and complements most home audio systems, seamlessly. Immerse yourself in the action of fast-paced movies or sports, raise the impact of your favorite TV shows and add full-bodied bass to your favorite tunes! 
PSW Subs feature a built-in high efficiency amplifier which effortlessly drives the down firing subwoofer for a clean, crisp bass sound. Our woofer utilizes a long excursion cone for deep, accurate response. Combining just the right driver materials, speaker geometry and enclosure construction techniques has a synergistic effect that produces cleaner, clearer low frequency sound. 
The MDF bass-reflex enclosure is internally braced and damped to eliminate internal standing waves and other performance-robbing resonances. This unique configuration uses a specially tuned and directed port to more efficiently produce maximum bass impact. The high and low inputs allow you to use any receiver or processor and the easily accessible line and speaker level inputs & speaker level outputs allow simple connection to most systems. 
PSW Subs outperform the competition with durable, resonance-free dynamic balance driver materials that stay stiff and move fast. You will experience deep, musical low frequencies and thrilling effects with Acoustic Audio by Goldwood's superior system blending. 
Also Shown Here... 
Acoustic Audio by Goldwood Home Theater Bookshelf Speakers - AA351B x 2 and AA40CB. 
Applications 
In Wall Home Entertainment 
In Ceiling Home Entertainment 
Home Theater Systems 
Surround Sound Systems 
Multiple Room Systems 
Subwoofer Features 
Built In Digital Drive Amplifier 
Effortlessly drive the PSW Sub with its built in high efficiency amplifier for house-shaking power with exquisite control. The amplifier additionally features adjustable independent gain/level control, phase control switch, low level and speaker level inputs/outputs, signal sensing auto On/Off function and variable low pass frequency control. 
	
Internally Braced and Damped MDF Bass Reflex Enclosure 
PSW Subs feature a ported enclosure that is internally braced and lined with gray batting to ensure the subwoofer stays stable and steady even at radical volume levels, for more efficient use of power. They are engineered for perfect volume, tuned for distortion free low frequencies and equipped to eliminate resonances. 
	
Down Firing Long Throw Subwoofer 
PSW Subs have a subtle long throw subwoofer located on the bottom of the enclosure. Our sub utilizes a long excursion, high rigidity PVA treated cone for the most accurate response. The enclosure includes a bottom slotted bass port and sleek triangular feet to more efficiently produce maximum bass impact. 
	
Elegant Black Ash Wood Finish 
The low profile enclosure with beautiful black finish and modern style complements the decor of any home theater. As the finishing touch of the PSW Sub, the discrete black ash wood finish creates an immersive feel to an already impressive subwoofer.

title: Klipsch 7.1 Walnut System - Model RP-6000F II, RP-404C II, RP-500M II, RP-500SA II, RP-1200SW
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Speakers › Surround Sound Systems
description: The Klipsch RP-6000F II 7.1 home theater system delivers incredible cinematic sound by leveraging a larger Tractrix® horn, updated 6.25” copper-spun Cerametallic woofers, a vented tweeter design, and Tractrix ports. The second-generation of the acclaimed Klipsch Reference Premiere speaker series features updated technology to deliver the cleanest, most dynamic sound possible, while aesthetic updates make these speakers true showstoppers. Model # RPW-327600002000
features: System includes: (2) RP-6000F II floorstanding speakers, (1) RP-404C II center channel speaker, (1) pair RP-500M II bookshelf speakers, (1) pair of RP-500SA II Dolby Atmos speakers, (1) RP-1200SW 12-inch subwoofer
BIGGER HORN | BETTER SOUND: A new, larger 90° x 90° silicone composite hybrid Tractrix horn
LTS TITANIUM DIAPHRAGM TWEETER: The exclusive 1” LTS minimizes distortion for enhanced, detailed performance. LTS tweeters are a hallmark of previous Reference Premiere Series.

ALL-NEW CERAMETALLIC WOOFERS: A signature feature on the Reference Premiere series speakers, the Cerametallic woofers have been updated for absolutely flawless sound reproduction, minimum distortion, and maximum efficiency.

Dual input terminals for bi-wiring / bi-amping capabilities separate high and low-frequency current into different speaker cables, reducing distortion for clearer midrange. Bi-amping allows for customization using outboard crossovers when using separate amplifiers.

attributes.value: Floorstanding speakers, center channel speaker, dolby atmos surround sound speakers, bookshelf speakers, subwoofer

attributes.key: Item Dimensions D x W x H

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
BIGGER HORN | BETTER SOUND 
A new, larger 90° x 90° silicone composite hybrid Tractrix horn provides incredibly efficient transfer of high-frequency waves into the listening area for crisper, clearer sound. The phase plug and compression-molded silicone face ensure smooth frequency response. 
LTS TITANIUM DIAPHRAGM TWEETER 
The exclusive Linear Travel Suspension (LTS) minimizes distortion for enhanced, detailed performance. LTS tweeters are a hallmark of previous Reference Premiere Series, making it a core component of some of the best speakers in the world. 
VENTED TWEETER DESIGN 
The vented tweeter housing reduces standing waves that create unwanted harmonics, resulting in enhanced detail and clarity in high-frequency reproduction. 
ALL-NEW CERAMETALLIC WOOFERS 
A signature Reference Premiere series speaker feature, the Cerametallic woofers have been updated for absolutely flawless sound reproduction, minimum distortion, and maximum efficiency. 
TRACTRIX PORTS 
Utilizing Tractrix geometry, the Reference Premiere ports allow for the most efficient, fastest air transfer from the cabinet, which reduces port noise for punchier low frequencies and cleaner, more powerful bass. 
BI-WIRING/BI-AMPING CAPABILITY 
Dual input terminals for bi-wiring / bi-amping capabilities separate high and low-frequency current into different speaker cables, reducing distortion for clearer midrange. Bi-amping allows for customization using outboard crossovers when using separate amplifiers.

title: Bose CineMate 520 Home Theater System
inStockText: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Television & Video › Home Theater Systems
description: With the Bose CineMate 520 home theater system, you'll enjoy the beauty and power of true surround sound. The five Direct/Reflecting Series II speakers have been redesigned with a slimmer profile and can be mounted flush to the wall, so they match flat-panel TVs. The wireless Acoustic mass module provides impactful bass even if you hide it out of sight behind furniture. Plus, the small control console offers simple access to settings, displays which source you've selected, and includes four HDMI inputs to ensure high-quality sound from connected sources. A universal remote simplifies your everyday experience and helps deliver easy access to your entertainment. What's in the box: Control console, 5 Direct/Reflecting Series II speakers, Acoustic mass module, Speaker cables, HDMI cable, Power cords (2), Universal IR remote with 2 AA batteries and ADAPTiQ headset.
features: True 5.1 surround sound from five slim-profile speakers

Wireless Acoustic mass module can be placed out of sight in your room. NOTE: the Acoustimass/subwoofer makes a wireless connection to the control unit, but the rest of the speakers for this system (and all of Bose's home theater systems) are wired.
Small control console with 4 HDMI inputs, display for source selection
SoundTouch enabled for streaming music via Wi-Fi (adapter sold separately)
Universal remote controls system and most connected components

description: Acoustic Audio CS-IC63 Cinema Series 6.5" in-ceiling surround sound 3-way speakers are ideal for any home, office or entertainment area because they are designed with supreme performance in mind. Each speaker handles 300 watts of power and includes: a 6.5" Poly cone woofer for improved motion and higher bass response, a butyl rubber surround, a progressive spider for greater control and higher excursion capabilities, a poly mica midrange, a 13mm soft dome tweeter for detailed high frequencies and a 3-way passive crossover for greater fidelity. Spring loaded push terminals allow for easy connectivity and its low profile baffle housing was designed for simple installation and an improved frequency response. The white grill will coordinate well with any interior, or can be painted to match individual décor. Included is a cutout template to aid in the installation process and full instructions.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
About us 
In the late 20th century, Pyle established itself as a premium source for replacement speakers and car audio. By the year 2000, Pyle had undergone a massive transformation, expanding into the nascent market spaces of competitive car audio, home audio, marine audio, and professional audio & musical instruments - our Pyle Pro line. As you sit in your car, you are isolated from outside noise and surrounded by speakers. You become enveloped in sound. We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. You’d be surprised at how much better your music can sound with an upgrade from the factory speakers and amplifier. 
Pyle Car: 
We have a wide range of speakers, amplifiers, and head units that will enrich your car audio experience. And we don’t just focus on audio at Pyle Car. Cars are a big part of our lives, and we offer a variety of products and accessories that can enhance your experience and turn your car into a modern media system on wheels, including navigation systems, DVD players, and iPod interfaces. At Pyle, we also care about your safety. That’s why we’ve also got a full line of rear and front-facing cameras that can be wired to a monitor in your car – so you can park in those tight spots or see around corners with ease. 
Pyle Home: 
Start with your home theater, a stalwart of any modern house. We’ve got projectors, TVs, mounts, and stands, just to get started – all fully equipped with state-of-the-art HD technology, compatible with beautiful video game consoles like Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and Wii, as well as your favorite Blu-Ray players, for crisp, hi-res images that explode in your eye on a mind-blowing scale. Of course, Pyle Home also carries all the cables and adaptors you need for a fully operational setup that’s sure to be the envy of your neighbors. 
There’s plenty more to keep you entertained. Bass-expanding mini speakers that run on rechargeable batteries and play your digital music, wherever you go. Perfect for the dorm room or sitting by the pool. Headphones. Vintage turntables – get the look of yesterday’s classic phonographs with today’s high-quality manufacturing standards. Power amplifiers, horn speakers, and waterproof speakers for your garden. Tripods and speaker stands. 
Pyle Pro: 
features a huge range of musical instruments, DJ equipment, and accessories for your every need. All of our products have been designed with the professional in mind. You don't just see or hear the quality - you feel it. And whether you're a hard-working musician, studio engineer, or even a budding amateur, Pyle Pro has something to offer. 
Among Pyle Pro’s most popular items are our PA Systems. Pyle is constantly modernizing these powerful devices to meet the demands of the modern user. Our flagship PAs include wireless microphones, rechargeable batteries, and iPod/iPhone docks. They’re great for use in large areas and events – at churches for weddings, at schools, gyms, birthday parties – anything indoor or outdoor where your voice needs to be heard loud and clear. And they’re easily transportable, thanks to caster wheels and telescoping handles. Use it for any audio – voice, guitar, CD, MP3 player – they handle everything. 
Pyle’s emerging guitar line is also grabbing the attention of the music industry. Models are available in double-cutaway and Les Paul styles, with solid rosewood bodies in a variety of colors. Beginner kits including Pyle has also introduced a huge variety of effects pedals. Rounding out Pyle Pro’s line are our USB-to-analog converters, including a 2-channel mixer with USB input and output.

title: AudioSource Digital Amplifier, 2 Channel Stereo Power D Amplifier AD1002 for Home Sound Systems
inStockText: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Home Audio › Home Theater › Receivers & Amplifiers › Amplifiers
description: Experience the vibrancy of our home sound system. A great sound system relies on a great amplifier--they’re an integral element to a full soundscape. Create a multi-room audio environment, build a home theater, or expand your system to the outdoors. AudioSource’s amplifiers are top of the line so you’ll always have high-quality sound. Our Power (D) Digital Amplifier AD1002 has 2 channels rated at a power output of 50 watts into 8 ohms. It has a power output of 75 watts per channel into 4 ohms. 160 watts are bridged to a mono channel at 8 ohms. This power-efficient Class D amplifier produces less heat than other units and saves circuit board space for additional features like overheating and overcurrent protection. It is also rack mountable and includes rack ears. Born out of Portland, Oregon, AudioSource began designing and manufacturing high-grade, affordable, and great sounding audio products in 1978. Our goal is to exceed your expectations for value and performance. Specifications: Interrupt priority switching. Input Sensitivity: Variable, .350mV to 2.8V for rated power at 8 ohms. Frequency response: 20Hz to 20Hz. Channel Crosstalk: 60 dB. Less than 0.2% THD into 8 ohms at rated power. S/N Ratio: 100 dB A-weighted.
features: POWER YOUR SOUND SYSTEM: 2 channels rated at 50 watts into 8 ohms. 75 watts per channel into 4 ohms. 160 watts bridged mono at 8 ohms.

HIGHLIGHTS: Rear mounted treble and bass controls. High efficiency class D topologies. Black anodized brushed aluminum faceplate. Bridgeable outputs. OTP Protection. OCP Protection. LED status indicator lights. Manual, auto, or triggered on/off. Rack mountable (Rack ears included). Stereo line outputs.
AUTOMATICALLY STARTS AND STOPS: Program your amplifier any way you prefer with our auto on/off function. You can turn it off and on manually, set it to do so automatically, or create a trigger.
PERFECT FOR ANY HOME AUDIO SYSTEM: Our stereo amplifiers are great for home theaters and outdoor systems. Enjoy professional quality audio in the comfort of your own home.
SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR MULTIPLE ROOMS: Our amplifiers allow you to deliver high quality sound and power to multiple rooms for the ultimate surround sound experience.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Ultimate home entertainment 
Enjoy an exceptional audio experience with the Technical Pro 2000W Bluetooth Amplifier with Digital Spectrum. This powerful amplifier system is perfect for home entertainment setups, parties, and professional audio installations this is the ultimate choice for DJs, Karaoke hosts, parties, bands. With 2000 watts of peak power and high-fidelity audio reproduction, the Technical Pro 2000W Bluetooth Amplifier delivers stunning sound for all your entertainment needs and delivers exceptional sound quality with amazing clarity and depth. 
2-WAY MOUNT SPEAKER 
Experience versatile audio placement with our 2-Way Mount Speakers, offering the flexibility of in-wall or in-ceiling flush mount installation. These stereo sound speakers feature convenient speaker terminals, ensuring a quick and hassle-free connection to speaker wires during any custom installation. Whether seamlessly integrated into your walls or ceilings, these speakers provide a discreet yet powerful audio solution, blending effortlessly with your decor. Enjoy the convenience and high-quality sound reproduction these speakers bring to your home or office space, adding a touch of sophistication to your audio setup. 
Elevate your audio experience 
Elevate your audio experience with our cutting-edge amplifier featuring precision balance, bass, and treble controls, allowing you to fine-tune every nuance of your sound. Immerse yourself in the richness of deep bass, thanks to the built-in bass booster, while exploring a range of 8 pre-set amplifier equalization modes tailored for diverse audio preferences. With 4 banana binding post speaker outputs, connect effortlessly and enjoy premium audio quality. This amplifier puts control at your fingertips, ensuring a personalized soundstage for music, movies, and games. Whether creating a party atmosphere or indulging in a quiet listening session, this amplifier delivers versatile and exceptional audio, transforming your auditory experience. 
	
Works with all the latest devices today 
Introducing the Technical Pro 2000W Bluetooth Amplifier, meticulously crafted to seamlessly integrate with today's latest devices, including mobile phones, iPads, and laptops. This cutting-edge amplifier is engineered for compatibility with a wide range of contemporary gadgets, ensuring a hassle-free and versatile audio experience. Whether you're streaming music from your smartphone, enjoying multimedia content on your iPad, or connecting your laptop for an immersive sound setup, this amplifier delivers exceptional performance, making it the ideal choice for modern audio enthusiasts. Elevate your audio game with the fusion of state-of-the-art technology and powerful amplification provided by the Technical Pro 2000W Bluetooth Amplifier. 
	
Immerse yourself in audio excellence 
Immerse yourself in audio excellence with our Flush Mount Design midbass stereo sound speakers, offering a seamless and uncomplicated in-wall or in-ceiling installation experience. These speakers boast a sophisticated 1'' high-temperature voice coil, engineered to produce a compelling and rich sound profile, making them equally adept at delivering powerful audio for dynamic listening or providing a soothing backdrop for quiet background music. Elevate your space with these speakers that not only enhance your audio environment but also blend effortlessly with your interior, thanks to their discreet flush mount design. Experience the perfect fusion of sleek aesthetics and impressive sound quality with these midbass stereo sound speakers.

title: AuKing Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 2024 Upgraded Mini Projector, Full HD 1080P Home Theater Video Projector, Compatible with HDMI/USB/VGA/AV/Smartphone/TV Box/Laptop
inStockText: In Stock
breadCrumbs: Electronics › Video Projectors
features: [AuKing 2024 Upgraded Projector & Ultra-fast WiFi 6] - 2024 AuKing WiFi projector leverages state-of-the-art WiFi 6 technology for swift, stable and frame-drop-free screen mirroring. Immerse yourself in your favorite movies, music, and games on a larger screen within seconds, experiencing seamless enjoyment

[5.1 Bluetooth Connection & Dual HiFi Stereo Speakers] - The latest Bluetooth 5.1 chip ensures stable connections to a variety of devices, such as Bluetooth speakers and headphones, catering to diverse audio needs across different occasions. Moreover, AuKing Bluetooth projector is equipped with dual HiFi stereo speakers and advanced noise reduction technology, delivering crystal-clear and rich sound for an authentic cinematic experience

[Huge Screen & Zoom Function] - Immerse yourself with a massive 200" projection screen, providing an unparalleled viewing experience. Effortlessly adjust the distance between AuKing movie projector and the wall to achieve the perfect viewing size, ranging from 35 to 200 inches. The recommended range is 40 to 120 inches. The zoom function is an added delight, allowing you to easily adjust the image between 100% and 50% without moving the portable projector, accommodating your desired display

[Full HD 1080P & Eye Protection] - Full HD 1080P AuKing video projector incorporates 99% NTSC technology and a fully sealed engine, ensuring the accurate reproduction of every detail on the screen for a vivid and true-to-life viewing experience. By leveraging the principles of diffuse reflection imaging and a non-direct light source, it not only enhances enjoyment but also effectively protects eyesight

[Multiple Devices Connection & First-class customer service] - Compatible with multiple devices, it meets all your needs. Equipped with HDMI, AV, and USB ports, it seamlessly connects to smartphones, laptops, tablets, USB drives, and TV boxes for a versatile experience. Due to copyright of Apps, Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, etc. can only play via TV Stick, Roku, etc. 2-year warranty and lifetime professional technical support with a response time of within 12 hours ensure your peace of mind
